I tried using a regular one but after watching her prepare it - it wasn't the same and it didn't have that same frothy taste.  I'm curious for the regular Matcha drinkers how many glasses they make a day or if just one.  She also said I could add it to my protein shakes as well in the morning if I didn't like the taste and it would give me the same health benefits.  Love it.
As the previous reviewers have stated this is the best matcha I have ever used.  It is bright green and wonderful.  You really do get what you pay for.

I compared 4 different brands of matcha green teas. Here's how they rate:

#1 DO 2nd Harvest, excellent flavor, texture, and color, expensive, organic

#2 Serendipi, great flavor, best price for the quality, organic

#3 The Tao of Tea, local Portland Oregon company, fair flavor, price slightly lower than DO, organic

#4 Maeda-en, available at Uwajimaya. Difficult to dissolve. Less favorable flavor and not organic

Uwajimaya has best selection of Matcha teas with several others I have not tried yet. Whole Foods carries both DO and Tao of Tea. New Seasons currently does not carry Matcha. Serendipi is available on Amazon for $17/4 oz. box, best tea for your money!

It is very good matcha tea, no doubt about that. But I've found very comparable matcha for one tenth the price. Your have to search a bit -- try search on "iMatcha Green Tea Powder". If you found it you'll know -- 1LB of it is equal in price to 2 OZ of this, or a little less. Like I said - one tenth the price.

If you really believe you have to pay large money to get quality matcha, then you might want to re-assess your belief system, to see if it is really helping you or not.
Not much to say here except that this is superb matcha. Excellent flavor and color. I drink it nearly everyday and it makes me feel great.
Prefer this over the other DoMatcha teas due to it's milder taste; not as vegetative or astringent. And of course, Amazon has the best price I've found for this grade of matcha.

This is the best brand, so I bought it.  It payed off big time.  This is the golden standard of brands of matcha to try.  All others can bow down to this one.  I would say that when I drank it, my whole world seem to align and I was able to focus and not to mention the flavors of this matcha are intense.  Not for the average tea drinker!

There's no question this product is very high quality, it's just I prefer a smoother tasting, less tangy Matcha. It's not for me, but you might enjoy it. I liked the DoMatcha 2nd Harvest Matcha Green Tea, 2.82-Ounce Tin better.

The flavor isn't as complex as others I've had, but it is pleasing and more than adequate. The color is a nice deep "matcha green". The aroma and taste of the dry powder are good. It whisks into an even, fine foam. I recommend it.

This was the first time I had ever tried Matcha Tea. I read the reviews and thought it sounded great. I decided to pay the high price for this tea because of the reviews it got. I was absolutely shocked when I received the tea, however. It comes in a tiny tin. Inside the tiny tin is a tiny foil pouch. Inside the tiny foil pouch is a silicone packet to keep the tea dry. There was a lot of tea "stuck" to this little packet. So basically you get about two tablespoons of tea, if that, for well over $20. To me it looked like a "sample" product that would be worth a couple of dollars.

Yes, the tea is a lovely shade of green. I made my own recipe of chai spices with ginger, cloves and cinnamon. I added frothed, unsweetened almond milk. It was good, but not good enough to justify paying that much. Fortunately I am never dissatisfied with Amazon.com because, as always, they offer immediate refunds for products that don't live up to their standards of customer satisfaction.

I'm going to try another organic green tea that is highly rated next time. I probably won't be able to tell any difference. I'm sure this product is good tea. The question is whether or not it's so much better than the other highly-rated green teas that it is worth close to $24 for a couple of cups. For me it is not. This is yet another experience with Amazon that proves I can't go wrong buying through them. Thanks, Amazon, for truly making shopping a risk-free adventure.

I am now editing my original review and I have changed the rating from 2 to 4 stars. There is no other matcha tea like this one. It gives me energy. It tastes great. The kind of energy it gives me is a sense of calm, well-being, and energy without any jittery feeling. It lasts many hours, but I don't "crash." I like it, and it's worth the extra money. I will be ordering it again.
Matcha tea is wonderful. The seller was prompt. Their are so many health benefits to Matcha - I am turning all my family into Matcha tea lovers.

I had tried some matcha prior from Red Leaf Tea (admittedly their mid grade matcha of which they have 3) and I did enjoy it but found that the experience was not worth the premium I paid.

I again am overwhelmed at the cost. I'm sure I could buy quality illegal substances on the street for cheaper. If like the more vehement proponents claim it is the cure for depression, cancer, heart disease, human suffering and Donald Trump it might be worth it, but scientifically it seems to be only the more basic claims have been substantiated. That's enough for me to work my way into the matcha world, but there is that retirement I've been eyeing.

That having been said I will say that the increase in price is certainly in line with the increase I have tasted in quality. I am very happy with this DoMatcha matcha. The color is almost neon green, it bubbles up quite a bit and has a mellow but full sweet/grassy vegetal taste. It's fairly strong but mild and smooth if that makes sense.

All in all very impressive but since I plan to drink about 5 cups of green tea a day that would run me hundreds per month, so I'll have to find a sweet spot between quality and price and I'm not sure this is it.

If you want a treat I would get this or the highest quality ipoddo (which seems to come much higher recommended), but for a daily drinking tea I might recommend Red Leaf's caramel matcha lowest grade.

The first time I ever tried Matcha, it was almost a brownish-green color, which I eventually learned, is not a premium grade. This DoMatcha was nearly 4x the price (ounce vs. ounce), but the quality is clearly way, way better. Not only that, this DoMatcha tea gives me great energy, without any jitters or feeling spacey, like the other one made me feel.

I have always been a big Starbucks Green Tea Latte kind of guy. I love those things to death. BUT, the Vente would cost me $4.30 every day. Even with the very high price tag of this DoMatcha, I can duplicate the same formula for almost 1/4 the price, and I can also use a sweetener of my choice, which is Xylitol. I can keep it low glycemic, organic, and sugar free, and pay a fraction of the Starbucks price. It's great.

My only beef with the DoMatcha is the packaging. The tin is great, but the tea itself comes in a sealed silver pouch inside, which is VERY messy. I eventually dumped the tea out of the pouch into the tin, but I probably lost 1/2 to 1 full serving in the process. Powder was flying everywhere. Perhaps I'll get better at the exchange in time, but that was the ONLY bad thing I have to say about this premium Matcha formula.

I'll definitely be buying again, but perhaps the 2nd Harvest one the next time, since it's about 1/2 the price, but still remains organic.

Of the Matcha I have tried, this has the best taste by far--bright and fresh, not "fishy" or grass clipping flavored like cheaper stale matcha one often finds for sale.  It may seem like a small amount for one's money but one only needs a teaspoon per cup, and it's health benefits are akin to about 6 cups of regular bag-green tea.  I think it's an investment, and also, since it is organic, there is going to be no pesticide residue to worry about.
This is my first time trying matcha and I was unsure how I would like it. I was plesantly surprise with this. I purchased this brand because of all the the great reviews and I am glad I did.

This is easily my favorite matcha that I have ever purchased for home use.  It is an incredibly bright and vibrant green and tastes divine.  For the price I do not think you could beat the quality.  I have tried about five other brands, most of which more expensive, and have no been happier than with this product.
I make the matcha by boiling hot water and adding honey. It delicious! It's a great, healthy drink to have. It really is bright green so expect many people to pester you with questions!

The only reason I give this product a 4 star rating instead of a 5 is that the caffeine level in this tea is very high.  I read a previous review on Amazon that said it was better than coffee because it had only a mild "kick" from caffeine, however, my experience was different.  I get a jolt about an hour after I drink it and it's uncomfortable for a little while, then it's okay.  I love the flavor because it's so rich and earthy (which deserves 5 stars).  I do highly recommend this product if you can handle the caffeine.

OMG!!!  This Matcha is absolutely wonderful!  It has a smooth taste that is not in a least bit bitter!  It's also a beautiful bright green color.  I have bought other cheaper brands before and they didn't compare.  They were bitter and virtually impossible to drink.  I won't be buying it again though because it's so rediculously expensive. Just wanted to try real quality matcha, and this was it!
I love this Matcha powder. I do not have anything to compare it too but it is organic and makes delicious tea. It can also be used in cooking.
I love this tea....the flavor is very nice.  The container is very small, but a little of this tea goes a long way; I drink it hot with milk and honey ~ very nice!
Love this tea -  Quality seems really good for the price!  Will order again when mine runs out (which will be soon)  lol
This was the first time I ordered this product. Everything went smoothly, and the tea is great.  I would purchase again.

This was my first purchase of matcha green tea. I have always been a big green tea fan and I heard about the health benefits of matcha so I decided to try it. The benefits are definitely there, as you are ingesting the whole tea leaf.

This stuff is pretty cool, brightly colored green like nothing you have ever seen before. But, to be honest the taste is nothing special. Maybe I'm making it wrong but I don't know where these other reviewers are coming from. I'll keep trying different methods in an attempt to make this stuff taste better.

Regardless I can say this stuff is better than coffee for a boost in energy. And I love coffee. Does not have the negatives associated with coffee, such as jitters, or crashing, but instead you feel alert and attentive all day.

I had hartley green tea bags(sancha I think) and I liked the taste of that much better.

This tea yields a good tasting cup of green tea, IMO.  I try to drink a few cups of green tea daily for its health benefits, and because the price of this product makes that an expensive undertaking, I don't rely on this product exclusively.  Nevertheless, I do like it and will continue to buy it, especially when it's on sale!

I found this to be  wonderful matcha. It has a bright green color and a very smooth taste. It is not bitter at all and whips into a nice green froth easily. I would highly recommend it. Amazon also has another matcha (Teazone) that I buy for lattes and the like but it's not nearly as tasty ( much cheaper though).

Pros:
Great color (meaning high quality)
Mild taste
Sealed packaging

Cons:
Price

Overall, I really enjoyed this tea. I have made it a few different ways, including my own "Latte" style matcha where I use milk and froth. I really have enjoyed the taste, as it is non-bitter and smooth.

I drink only the best tea. There is a huge difference between tea bags and premium quality teas.

I had yet, however, tried the Matcha tea. Being the tea-snob that I am, I decided to get the best one for my first try.

The very first try was a disappointment. Its taste, much to my surprise, was substantially different from tea-leaf green teas. It actually had LESS taste than the premium leaf green teas. It also didn't have the same "kick" I get with preimium leaf green teas. Thinking I didn't put enough tea into my cup, so I decided to put little more.

Then I tried to sleep and I couldn't.

The caffeine rush in this tea is VERY subtle yet powerful. You will hardly feel it. You will feel like you are driving a Mercedes on a straight line going 100mph. You know you are going fast, but just won't feel it.

The 2nd try, I was hooked. I realized it had only one taste: Umami. Umami is called the "5th taste" that has been scientifically validated as the 5th taste our taste buds are capable of detecting. Unlike sweetness and saltiness, Umami is subtle.

If you have never tried Matcha tea, I highly recommend this tea. The only reason I won't give it 5 stars is because I have yet to try other Matchas and I have no idea if this one is actually better than the ones that cost half its price.

I LOVE THIS BRAND OF JAPANESE MATCHA. I HAVE TRIED OTHERS BUT THIS ONE STANDS OUT TO ME AS ONE OF THE BEST I HAVE BOUGHT SO FAR. IT IS PRICEY BUT YOU WILL GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR IN THIS TYPE OF PRODUCT. IT IS BRIGHT GREEN, VERY FRESH AND THE AROMA IS VERY EARTHY, ACROSS BETWEEN ALFALFA AND FRESH CUT GRASS. IT IS A VERY HEALTHY PRODUCT WITH A VAST ABUNDANCE OF ANTOXIDANT AND OTHER HEALTH BENEFITS. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

This tea is very delicious! The only problem is the price... Not really a good alternative for a coffee addict, there is simply not enough caffeine. But overall, I would recommend it for anyone to try at least once!

Pound for pound highest antioxidants vs any food, also noticed increases energy level during my work outs. I can run, swim, bike, longer, faster, and harder than if I do not drink this matcha tea. Not only do you physically feel stronger, mentally as well.

Orgasms are much stronger and last longer, I am an athlete and my body is sensitive to what I eat, this matcha tea is phenomenal, why do you think the japanese have such healthy sexual appetites?! Got to be the food and tea they are drinking! This tea is expensive, but it gets 5 stars because it is worth every penny.

This is a great product but it is item is way overpriced here. The can is much, much smaller than it appears in the photo. I thought for sure that they had made a mistake when I opened the box. This can is less than half the size of what they sell at my local health food store. This is a very, very, small can. It is only 1.06 ounces.

At my local health food store, normally very expensive as it is a small store, they charge only $1 more for a 2.82 oz can.

ALSO, YOU CAN NOT RETURN THIS ITEM. THEY MUST KNOW THEY ARE RIPPING YOU OFF SO THEY MAKE IT A DO NOT RETURN ITEM.

SAVE YOUR MONEY AND DON'T BE RIPPED OFF.

The flexibility and reliability these ballasts offer is well worth it, working with either High Pressure Sodium (HPS) or Metal Halide (MH) and they don't cost too much.  They run cool and make very little noise.  While they don't have the dimming capability of others, they do run on 120, 208 or 240v, and are generator friendly.  600w are actually the most efficient HPS, beating 400 and even 1000w bulbs!

This is by far the BEST and MOST REAL honey I have ever come across with in my lifetime. It is also one of the better tasting honeys in its category. It is indeed 100% natural raw honey, which is obviously never heated, filtered or strained; hence preserving all the natural vitamins, minerals, enzymes and antioxidants found in honey. The fact that the producers decided to add pollen, propolis, and crushed honeycomb to the jar is also brilliant. Eat two table spoons of this honey everyday, I swear your life span will go up by several years. This honey is simply incredible, what a great gift from mother nature!

The jars are also very cute. At the cost of a very reasonable shipping price, I have received my first two jars within 36 hours in perfect shape after my order. Thanks for the super fast shipping Wee-Bee.

Don't waste this honey by spreading it on your toast or in your tea. Eat it up all by itself from the jar whenever you feel like it. This is beyond your standard honey, which is totally spoiled by heating and filtering -thanks to the profit oriented industrialists in the honey business. Wee-Bee honey is the real deal, and it is very reasonably priced. What a piece of heaven! I can't wait to order more. Thank you Wee Bee!

I haven't ordered this product from Amazon, but I buy it at my local health food store. Fortunately, there is ONE store of all the health food stores in my area that carries this brand. As the previous customer commented, WeeBee honey is the REAL DEAL! It is the best tasting honey I've ever experienced in my life, to ditto the other reviewer!! Lets put it this way, I and my daughter keep the health food store in business!!!  Although I never ordered directly from the WeeBee company, since I can get it locally, I have dealt with them via E-Mail. I had questions when I made my first purchase and I can honestly tell you they are the friendliest and most knowledgeable people there are in the honey business! A+++ for WeeBee Honey and their company!!!!!!!!!!!!

This is the best raw honey. I won't repeat what the other two reviewers said, because they summed it up perfectly! But, I will tell you that you can actually taste flowers (as orange blossom honey has a citrus flavor, this has a floral taste). It's heavenly. I've been using it as "cough medicine" since I caught my son's cold and I've never used anything more effective. I will continue to eat a couple of tablespoons of this a day to get all of the minerals, antioxidants, etc. It really is the BEST raw honey I've ever purchased, and I'm shocked I bought it from a health food store and not a local farmer's market! You will NOT be disappointed!!

Wow what a great concept on these products.  I can see me taking these products on the run!  what a great way to make sure you stay healthy:) I like the pkg size it so easy to take.  I am going to review all of these products.  I just loves the concept !

This is my favorite gluten-free pasta.  I cook it exactly as the directions tell you to and I rinse it with warm water very well before serving.  It does have a slightly different flavor/texture than regular wheat pasta but if you have allergies, you can't compare everything to what you use to eat.  Rarely do I ever find anything that compares to what I ate before, but after you eat this a time or two, you will think you have been eating it all along.  My husband eats gluten/wheat and over time I stopped buying different noodles for each of us and our family eats these.  If you have children, I doubt they would even notice a difference.  These are great to have around if you are pressed for time and need a fast gluten-free meal.  I have had other pasta products from De Boles and I will admit that the other types of noodles (lasanga, penne) do not taste as good but I still use them.  You can tell they are not wheat noodles.
My 3-year-old with celiac loves this pasta.  It tastes as good as wheat pasta once the sauce is on it.  I love it because it cooks fast,

My husband has gluten sensitivity, so we've tried several gluten-free pastas.  This one does not hold together, even with the minimum cook time, and it turns into smaller bits, making my pot of spaghetti runny and not noodly enough.  I won't buy it again.

I tried this spaghetti with the hopes that it would in some way resemble the wheat pasta I used to love to eat, but it doesn't even come close.  The taste is ricey and bland, and it falls apart despite following the cooking directions.  There are many good wf/gf pasta products out there these days, but this isn't one of them.

This is by far the best GF & corn free pasta out there!! I served it to my whole family and they didn't even notice! The only down side that I have found is that after it cools...it gets really hard. So serve it fresh and don't bother to keep the leftovers!

**UPDATE**
I have found that if you pour the spaghetti sauce over the noodles for storage, it keeps much better.

If I could eat gluten containing pasta I would not eat this product. But I can not eat wheat or gluten. This is the best gluten free pasta I have found. It is good as regular spaghetti with a sauce. We also use it in stir fries. Good in both. But not as good as wheat pasta.

This pasta is NOT good - not for Italian dishes, at least, although it might be okay for Asian noodle dishes.  Besides the taste, it also goes gummy and sticky really easily.  Try Tinkyada's brown rice pastas instead - Tinkyada tastes almost the same as regular pasta, and cooks up firm.  You don't have to settle for strange tasting pasta just because you can't eat gluten!
My family will eat it. I have Celiac and am allergic to wheat. These taste great. Thats why I bought the case here.
I like this pasta because its a great alternative to wheat pasta that I cant eat due to food allergies. I make different dishes with it and like its versatility.

DeBoles Spaghetti turns out perfectly, pot after pot. The trick is bringing the water (with a little olive oil in it) to a rolling boil, before adding the pasta. Then boil for ten minutes, remove immediately, and drain. The pasta is al dente and never sticky, hard, or mushy. I will continue to buy this pasta. It is much better than NRG and other brands.
I love this extract so much that after I purchased an 8oz bottle of it, next time I ordered a 16oz bottle because I went through the 8 ounces so fast!  Need I say more?

This is like berry wine; very intense just slightly sweet flavor very reminiscent of a good dark wine, or a port. My use will be maximized by using it in my kombucha brew: maximizing the anti-oxidant potential and making a little bit go a long way. I would highly advise doing this, you can just combine an oz with other fruits in a smoothie or juice. If you can really stretch out the volume it somewhat justifies the cost. Maqui berries have yet to be fully analyzed on the ORAC scale but they are widely known to be higher than acai which ranks just over 100K, with only a dozen or so above it. Bottom line if you can make this bottle last for several months at least by combining it with other drinks you'll find it's well worth it.

These Crepe Belgian Chocolate Biscuits are quite simply put the BEST! They are very light and airy. The biscuit is very thin and covered in the milk chocolate.  They are addicting so get ready to want more. I first bought them last year at Christmas.  They are now a tradition at my house.

The box says the flavor has been "improved" which is a shocking claim in light of the absolutely digusting flavor and appearance of this pasta. Besides rice flour, it also contains rice bran, which I guess is supposed to give it a texture closer to wheat pasta. Well, it doesn't work, and it also gives the pasta a disturbing beige hue and a truly vomitous taste. My two year old and I spit it out almost simultaneously. The baby ate it, but she also eats lint, so what does she know.

One of my son's favorite foods is noodles, and now that he's on a gluten-fee and corn-free diet, there wasn't much out there that he can eat. We bought these last week and tried them, and he went crazy over them! He even ate a large bowl plain, with nothing on them, then later with spaghetti sauce.

You do need to be careful to cook them long enough that they are not a very gross version of "al dente," and not to overcook them to the point where they start to dissolve and get slimy. Be sure to also rinse with cold water, as the directions on the box indicate. As other reviewers mentioned, cooking for 10 minutes seems to work well.

We had tried one box from the grocery, and we are now planning to buy a case here at Amazon. If you are looking for alternative noodles for a gluten-free family, I definitely recommend giving these a try. My son felt like he was back to getting what everyone else gets, and that was very nice for him.

HORRIBLE!

Package said cook 5-7 minutes. Set the timer for 6 and promptly drained the pasta. Many of the spirals had broken down into...lumps. But, I stupidly figured it would be fine with sauce on it. It tasted like paste. Or, maybe envelope glue. Either way it was awful. Nobody would touch it. Thank goodness for take out Mexican food, I guess. Entire dinner went in the garbage.
I have bought this pasta several times. The spirals fall apart every time. It ends up being just tiny noodle pieces. I will not buy them again.
This is the best wheat and gluten free pasta I have tasted, (and there have been many)
We are gluten-free and this is the best rice pasta we have found.  Very important to only boil it for 10 minutes.  We love it!

We just tried this product ,  do not overcook it..  we added a little pesto and  it was very good ... I did not notice an icky color, but we are used to whole grain food... overall we had very nice wheat free meal.

Absolutely love the lemon & herb VERI PERI sauce.  Marinated a bunch of chicken thighs and sauteed a mixed vegetable medley of zucchini, summer squash, onion, garlic and mushroom to go with it.  Love this sauce!  It's so flavorful.  You can use it as a marinade, as a sauce in your skillet or work, it's even great as a condiment (dip).  Try it...you'll like it!!

I used to live in Africa and "discovered" Veri Peri on a visit to South Africa and brought some home. I was delighted to find it on Amazon.com now I'm living back in the States. However, I didn't know it came in flavors (or flavours, if you prefer). I'm looking forward to trying the garlic and the lemon & herb.
I ordered this thinking it would have the same wonderful character of the regular Peri peri Sauce.  Wrong!  The off taste is rather putrid to say the least.  I had to throw it away.

I tried Veri Peri for the first a few weeks ago and I must say that I was very impressed with this sauce/marinade. I have since tried them all (including the Veri Hot which is not for the faint of heart) and I love them all, but I will just talk about the Lemon and Herb here. The first thing I noticed about this sauce is how many different ways you can use it. It works wonders as a marinade or you can saute with it, or use it to replace other spices and herbs you might have otherwise used. I seem to find this flavor to work best with chicken and fish but don't let my amateur opinion stifle your creativity. I love the taste of this sauce, the lemon is just strong enough to give that little bite I love in a lemon and herb sauce and there are so many more flavors waiting to jump out at you from the South African herbs. This is definitely a must try for anyone who is serious about exploring new wonderful ways to prepare food. I recommend it to everyone and I always use Veri Peri when I want my food to impress.

I'm a Manhatten and old fashioned freak; best cocktails on the planet if made right. And Fee's Whiskey Barrel Aged Bitters are just about the best tasting bitters that I've, well, ever tasted...period. Use Maker's Mark or a high-end rye whiskey with Fee's (and a really good vermouth)and you'll have yourself a supremely tasty drink, my friends. My best advice is to drink alone --like all true Vikings do--and you won't have to share with anyone else.

Nothing worse than lipstick on a glass anyway...

I decided to try these on a whim when I saw them at The Spuyten Duyvel Beer Shop in Williamsurg about a year ago. I have been a convert ever since! In fact, my usage of bitters has even gone up CONSIDERABLY since I started using them since I like them so much! They fall along the angostura lines, but have a distinctive richness and complexity. I've used them ever since and am about to pick up multiple bottles since I hate running out!
good product, good packaging, good time. nothing bad. would buy again. thanks the bitters are pretty tasty in a old fashioned. give it a go

Bought this to add to a recipe by Jason Schiffer for a Maple Manhattan.  It's a great bitters and played really well with the Bourbon and Maple Syrup I was using.  Great product!  As with any bottle of bitters, 4 oz. is going to last you a LONG, LONG time so this is a great value as well.  I don't think you can go wrong with any of the Fee Brothers bitters!  Have fun with them and experiment!
This tea is very good and perfect for the price....you can't go wrong with this product. A must buy for the tea lover.

I make iced tea at work for the entire office. It used to be tea for me... but everyone loved the smell of my fruity tea so now its an office thing. As an office we used to go through about 3 gallons of tea a week. Now that we have the peach we go through 6! Everyone loves the delacate fruitiness and refreshingly not bitter taste of this wonderful peach tea. I highly recommend it!
this was very good and rare hard to find in the usa. Im glad i got to try this. I could't stop eating it, and the whole family loved it!

Oh, boy, I guess I'm just a nut person.  Pistachio is a real winner when it comes to flavoring up halva.  The sesame flavor is great by itself, but blending it with pistachio takes it to another level.  Nutty goodness times two!  :^)

Imported from Istanbul, Turkey, Koska halva is absolutely the best and completely outdoes the competition. Personally I prefer the pistachio or chocolate varities to the plain, but all three taste wonderful. The plastic containers keep it nice and fresh. A word to the wise: this Middle Eastern treat is so outrageously good that it is hard to stop eating it. Cut yourself a quarter-inch thick slice and then put the container away immediately, otherwise you will yield to the temptation of cutting more and more slices. Also, try to control yourself and eat it once a day. Needless to say, halva goes great with strong Turkish coffee and the two together will give you quite a burst of energy. The only way you could do better than Koska is to get real homemade halva which not easily available. Enjoy!

This stuff was so bitter, i got goosebumps and shudders. I also bought some rose flavored turkish delight and same reaction. Seriously, how do they manage over there? I read reviews about this Halva being SO GOOD that you have to restrain yourself from eating it in one fell swoop. I really can't see that happening. I can see it going into the trash tho if no one else in the house will eat it. Also it was nearly impossible to just slice up as it fell apart in crumbles.

These are very dense, moist snack bars; could even be a meal replacement if you're up for something smallish. There's actually 5 flavors of these, but I believe only this one (Banana Walnut) and the Chocolate Chip one are available right now (and I can't recommend the Chocolate Chip one, it does not taste good to me). I look forward to trying the Brownie and Peanut Butter versions, as well as the Cranberry one. But these are excellent.
Each bar contains 5g fiber, 12g whole grain, and 6g of protein. More info on this product and their other things at [...]. I only just heard of this company the other week when a relative gave me one of their bars, but their products look great (if a bit pricey; but high-quality costs more).
Update: these are all made much better by warming them up: remove from package, and heat them for 10-15 seconds in the microwave. Makes them smoother and softer, like soft cookies just out of the oven.

[Corazonas Banana Walnut Oatmeal Squares -- reviewed a few weeks after buying them.]

For years I've carried food-bars to eat when my blood sugar gets low, and for years I've had to deal with two kinds of bars: the kind that are gooey with frosting or with chocolate chips that have melted in the heat; or the kind which are crunchy and crumbly. In either case I'd have a mess on my fingers, or on my shirt, or on the furniture.

These oatmeal squares are neither gooey or crumbly. Instead they have a soft firm texture that's just what I want for travel. (I can't say the same for the CORAZONAS Oatmeal Squares, Chocolate Chip, 1.76-Ounce bags (pack of 12), since the chocolate chips can get messy.) They're also the right size to slip into a pocket.

As for taste, they're pleasant, but they seem a bit bland to me, perhaps because they're low sodium. However, taste is not my main concern when I want "fuel" to bring my blood sugar back up.
One of the best tasting bars on the market! Great taste! Fills you up! Keeps you going throug your day!

I am very pleased with this product.  Great tasting with coffee for a quick breakfast. After trying the banana walnut, I discovered the chocolate chip version and ordered it. Definitely, the chocolate chip is my favorite.
These squares are moist and taste pleasant. Personally, I find them too sweet and chewy. Other than the fact that they do contain too much sugar for my taste, they are a good snack.
These are so good it's hard to believe they're really good for you.  Lots of healthy, yet yummy ingredients.  So glad I found these.  They are thick and chewy and taste very good.

I got these for my mother.  My father is recovering from prostate cancer, and has completely changed his diet.  He treats these like desert.  He loves them, and they are so good for him.  Microwaved 15 sec, with some chopped banana a topped with greek yogurt.  They got 8 cases.

I cannot remember where I first heard about these oatmeal squares but I certainly am glad I did. I love the banana walnut and also the peanut butter. I have shared with a friend at work and now she buys them as well.
I take them to work with me and with some fruit that it makes a good lunch.
I will certainly continue to buy these - they are good tasting - good for you --- and inexpensive.
A friend recommended these bars and gave me one to try. I wasn't even done eating it when I ordered them in three flavors! A great healthy meal on the go.
Amazing taste.. lots of nuts... so tasty that it makes you wonder if it is health at all ;-)... many a days it serves as my breakfast.. personally like it better than the chocolate version
This is an excellent product which we plan to continue using. Will reorder very soon to maintain stock,plan to try the dark chocolate bars next and expect the same result.

This is a great quick snack or on-the-run breakfast bar. These bars are actually pretty tasty and accurately described. The banana walnut actually tasted like banana oatmeal bar and actually contained walnuts pieces. Texturally, it is fairly fibrous (hence the oats), but not overly so. Only complaint is that the size is on the smaller size, but that is more a personal preference.

We normally buy these at Costco and I think they are a little cheaper (maybe a couple of bucks) although the banana walnut bars come packaged WITH the chocolate chip bars so it's sadly double money.. two boxes for $20-25 ish. I love the oatmeal bars but cannot stand the chocolate ones. And I'm a chocolate lover. The chocolate ones taste like healthfood and have a scratchy texture that isn't pleasant to swallow. However, like the banana ones, they do fill you up.

The banana walnut bars are healthy (which is most important to me) moist, sweet (but not overpowering) and very dense for their size. So one bar and a cup of coffee fills me up for a breakfast on the go. The cholesterol lowering benefits are a HUGE plus.

I would give this product 5 stars but I feel that the price could be slightly lower for amazon. Based on my Costco experiences I think these should run $12-13 a box -just my personal opinion. If you can't afford $15 for 12 bars then consider making your own and freezing them. I enjoy a recipe for Baked Oatmeal snack bars on the Kath Eats Real food blog, which you will have to google if amazon deletes this link: [...]

All-in-all these bars are excellent and convenient as heck. If you don't mind the price and love having them delivered to your door then by all means order them :)

We go hiking a lot -- so i decided to try out different snacks to see which ones are best for us. These were very good. I was quite surprised to find them as soft and fresh as they were. The flavor tastes sorta like banana nut muffins minus extreme amounts of sugar. It also serves as a good snack and keeps you full for 2-3 hours :)

Banana Walnut is a classic combo and I think this bar will be a classic.  Good texture as they are nice and chewy and great taste.  I am trying to get in shape and they are perfect for an afternoon hike.  Like a little meal crossed with a dessert.

I purchased a box of chocolate chip from Costco and really enjoyed the one I ate; my 18 year old daughter discovered them and finished off the box.  I could not find them again at Costco, so I checked here...sure enough, I found them and more.  I found that banana walnut was available so I decided to give them a try and I love them. I think the taste comes very close to the real banana bread.  I am very happy with my purchase and the fast delivery.
This product arrived on time.  My wife loves these but they are sometimes hard to find in the stores.  Costco offers them for less when they have them which is not often.

I really love these bars; they taste just like banana bread. And, they have a great chew with none of that chalkiness or heaviness that some "all natural" products tend to have. My local store stopped carrying these- they are totally worth having to pay shipping.
These squares are delicious.  Good nutrition, and a great ski snack to have in your pack, or jacket pocket.
This is my 2nd purchase from amazon.  Im disappointed to receive a package of oatmeal squares that indicate a best buy date of aug 9 2011.  At least the other two boxes have a 2012 date.

These banana-walnut oatmeal squares by Corazonas were a colossal disappointment. I'm a dyed-in-the-wool banana bread fan, but there were no similarities here. The texture was slimy, yet gritty and  mealy, with not a walnut in sight. The taste was primarily of oatmeal, with the slightest essence of sourish banana. They were excessively sweet...coming in at fifteen grams of sugar. I wouldn't feed these to a dog, in fact, ours took a bite and turned up her nose. She does have her standards, after all! Fortunately for us all, we had some 'Beggin' Strips standin' by for appeasement purposes. Please know that I'm not a picky eater...I've had SOS countless times and enjoyed it...but, I couldn't abide these hideous things.

If you love crunchy potato chips but not the fat, these are a great choice.  I think they are great. I sometimes add salt (probably a no no) and enjoy them with lunch or as a snack.  Seem hard to find right now.

I usually do not write reviews, but when something is this good i have to tell someone.  I cannot say enough good things about these.  The entire bag only has 660 calories, so when you eat one serving there are a lot of them, and if you cant stop at just one serving, you dont feel so bad.  They are gluten free, great for us celiacs, but another plus for anyone.  The spice on them is just enough of a kick, my kids love them, so they arent too spicy, otherwise they would run screaming, they have a more sensitive tounge to spicy foods.  I found these at a local organic store and started picking up 3 bags every 2 weeks.  Now I order them from amazon in bulk, they are cheaper.

This is a great snack.  I first bought them for my 17 month old grandson, who has celiac disease.  He loves them; so do I.  One ounce of these chips is equivalent to one and one half servings of vegetables!  They are very lightly salted, and have 80% less fat than potato chips.  The chips are kind of cute - much smaller than potato chips and shaped like a tiny bowl.  My grandson will put one on the end of his tongue and wait for me to laugh - he's such a clown!

I bought Real Deal Veggie chips because sometimes I snack when I shouldn't.
The taste is great & slightly addicting.
They totally satisfy my late night munchie urges, with a fraction of the fat/salt etc..
Compared to the stuff I usually reach for.

Obviously, not as healthy as raw veggies but who wants to deal with all that when watching a little tv before bed.

I found these at a Nutter's Health food store in Nebraska, these are to die for, and you can't eat just one, very low fat, just enough salt and so crispy you better buy more than one bag and keep them around for snacking healthy, they are hard to beat and my hubby and i have tried many kinds and so far, these are by far the best so if ya get a chance to try some, you will be hooked for life...rsgarden
I ordered these on a whim, and found them wonderful. They are tart, crisp and delicious, and made a wonderful addition to sandwiches and cheese trays.

These are exceptional. I had them first at a friend's home. Her hummus was wonderful, and I asked her for her recipe. It really is the beans that make the difference. Thanks so much for your great product!!!

I am on my second 5 Lb bag of beans from Palouse, and I will keep coming back as long as the price is consistent. The quality of the beans is high: they are delicious, cook well, are packed nicely, and arrived with Amazon Prime shipping-speed (two days). I don't take advantage of the QR code identifier (to see which specific fields the product comes from), but it's a nice touch, and builds my trust in Palouse, the manufacturer.

Palouse is now my preferred option for both these garbanzo beans and brown lentils.

Also: I have found one pebble going through 7.5 Lbs of beans--this is a very good ratio, and means they properly sift through their beans before packaging them. Worth the price.

Upon receiving the product, I started a batch soaking to get them ready to cook. I soaked the beans overnight and cooked them up in the pressure cooker (after watching Good Eats episode on garbanzos/chickpeas). I am very happy with the quality of the beans. The cooked up tender and tasty. I used some in a soup, added some to a couple of salads and blended the rest up to make hummus. Each time I reflected on how much better I liked them over canned beans (even when cooked unsalted) and the last batch of dried chick peas I bought in the store. The burlap bag is kind of cool and the beans are in a plastic bag inside of that. Out of four cups of measured uncooked beans, I only encountered two beans that did not cook up soft. I will buy these again.

I am ordering these right now, simply because they are grown in the USA.  I am thrilled to buy American and will do so whenever I can.  Thank you for giving me this opportunity, I am sick of foreign foods with questionable safety standards.

These are very good, high quality Garbanzo Beans. I purchased these Garbanzo Beans for making raw hummus with, and I was not disappointed. They are very large and very good. They don't have that "off" taste that some garbanzo beans have. They make the best raw hummus I have ever made. They arrived plastic bag, inside a nice burlap sack. The beans were very clean and I have yet to come across a bad bean.

High quality bean, excellent taste. You can't beat the price, and 5 lbs. goes a very long way!

I would highly recommend this product.

I was a little nervous about ordering beans online, but am I glad I did! I make a lot of chick pea stews and hummus and I am amazed by the quality, texture and taste of these beans. If you are tired of canned beans, get these from Palouse and cook them up yourself. You will not be disappointed!

WOW! I don't think I've ever had a real fresh garbanzo before because I've never tasted one this good. I've never worked with dry beans before but this was real easy. Soak over night and boil for an hour. Couldn't be easier. And the taste of these is so amazing, I enjoyed eating them plain, in salads, cooked with a little chorizo, possibilities are endless. Next I'm going to make hummus with them. And they are on prime!! (I LOVE prime!) So I never have to be without them. I can't believe I waited so long to try these.

As far as the company goes, I had an issue with my whole shipment so I contacted them and they responded in minutes. (excellent customer service). First I had to contact amazon and then them again if it couldn't be solved.(I know, rookie mistake, contact amazon first) But of course amazon took care of it with out problem (also excellent customer service). Things are going to happen and it's comforting to know that if I have an issue it gets taken care of so easily. I will definitely be ordering these garbanzos and other products from this company through amazon again. I hope you love them as much as I do!

I had been eating, and thoroughly enjoying, Bush brand canned garbanzos as a vegetarian low glycemic index source of protein.  Sometimes my store doesn't have them in stock so I decided to buy dry and cook them myself.  I must say I prefer this way because I have the option of adding salt ot not.  These garbanzos are delicious plain and I often eat them that way.  Especially when I'm just having a couple tablespoons to get me through a hungry patch during the day.  I also add them to my bowls of cooked vegetables, along with olive oil, sea salt, pepper, etc., and nutritional yeast flakes. The garbanzos really round out the meal by adding substance and staying power to the vegetables.  I always make hummus for company and although I haven't made it yet with these garbanzos I have no doubt whatsoever that the hummus will be even better made with fresh beans.  After ordering I received an email from the grower thanking me and providing a link to their website.  To me this was a nice touch and the website is useful.  I found cooking directions there and as someone who can no longer read print I very much appreciate it when I can find directions online.  If you follow their cooking directions you cook one cup of beans and you get 2.5 cups of cooked.  Now I can easily eat 2.5 cups within the three days that they should be used but for calorie control reasons I freeze half of the cooked beans so I can stretch out how many days a batch lasts.  I'm totally happy with these beans and grateful for Amazon as a way to buy quality food I could not otherwise obtain.

The product arrived in less time than expected, in a neat burlap sack, with a QR code showing te exact lot of land this particular bag of beans was harvested from. I cooked up a large batch right away, and they are delicous and perfect. We love that they are a USA grown product. I found my new source for dry staples, and will be back to order more.

Hesitantly I purchased these dried beans but they turned out to be wonderful. Soak over night and they are ready for your recipes in the morning. I made hummus with these beans and some Sesame King Tahini... it was WONDERFUL. I made several batches and added different flavorings. Serve with fresh vegetables and so good for you!

My wife likes hummus and I didn't so I figered I would try to make it myself and if I needed to I could make it with a flaver that I liked. Didn't have to do alot of trying with these as the base. They were fresh, clean and tasted great. I like the burlap bag too.

great garbanzo beans... was very pleased.. I have cooked some and used them in salad as well as making some hummus.. I have also sprouted some .. I will definitely re-order them . I am glad that they are gmo free and grown in the U S A.
I was very impressed with the freshness of these beans.  They sprouted within 24 hours.  I will definitely buy again.

These are absolutely delicious. The flavor, texture, everything is wonderful. There is no similarity between these & those canned things.
I just placed a 2nd order because I didn't want to risk running out of them.

I had never used dried beans before so I was a little apprehensive about buying these, but it turns out they are super simple. I soak them over night in water. I then boil them with salt for about 90mins or until they are very soft. I use them to make hummus with. I use about two cups of cooked beans, 2-3tbs of tahini, 1/3 cup of olive oil, 2tbs of fresh lemon juice, and 3tbs of capers. I know that capers may sound weird but they really do add something. Everyone who eats this hummus loves it. There is also a recipe on Dr. OZ website for chickpea popcorn and that was my intention with these but have yet to get around to making it, but its another way to use these beans if you get tired of hummus. They don't taste anything like canned beans. Its truly amazing how different they taste.

Looking for affordable organic food that will stock the pantry.  I tried this company for the first time and are very pleased with them.  The beans are clean and nicely packed, and I feel safe eating them and serving them to the people I love.  Thanks go out to the kind and wonderful farmers who grew them for me.  I appreciate the work very much.  And btw, 5 pounds of beans works out to a lot of garbanzo beans!  They will last us for several months!  Highly recommend.
very fresh garbanzo beans, soaked only for couple hours, boiled for 1 hr - that's how fresh they are. Clean and fresh. Didn't have such a good quality for long time Thanks a lot

I dont know that these taste any different than any other dry chic peas, but they do taste great. The main thing for me though is the peace of mind that comes from knowing that they are GMO free. I really dont want any of my money going to Monsanto and their ilk, and would probably forgo chic peas forever if i didnt have that option. That would make me sad, as they are a staple of my diet. Fortunately, i dont have to make that choice.
Also, the packaging is appealing. Not a contributing factor in buying these, but nice nonetheless.

Enjoy!

These beans a exceptional and make the very best hummus.
I'm ordering my second bag within a month. (and trust me..
this bag makes a LOT of hummus. So far, I've made 30 cups of hummus
and still have some beans left over)
Do yourself a favor and grab a bag... you won't be
disappointed.

Once you make these, you won't ever eat chickpeas from a can again. Ever. This is an amazing product.

I like that you can see the field where the beans are grown. I like that they aren't genetically modified. I like that I control the salt. These make amazing hummus, wonderful to just eat in any way you like chickpeas.

Support small farmers. Buy these beans!

Might be crazy - but I LOVE that I can track back to see where these beans were grown.  That's super cool.  Even better that it is NOT in Mexico.  The quality of the product is terrific - and the packaging is ... well ... fun.  It just feels like high quality from beginning to end.  PLUS - buying these beans is supporting American farmers.  Maybe I am old fashioned - but that is important to me.  Thanks for a great product - I will buy again.

I bought this product to make channa masala.  It was interesting to see the reaction of the people who  only previously had canned chickpeas.  These were delicious and well worth the effort.  I only bought the 3 # pack to try them.  The next order will be for a larger quantity.
These are good beans. Not shriveled. Made a nice batch of hummus with them after soaking in crock pot for a few hours.

I just made delicious hummus with the garbanzo beans. The beans are way better than what I could get in the local grocery store. I am very happy with the quality and will buy from this seller again :)
Good quality beans!  Made some great hummus, which was my objective.  Better looking than some I found at my grocery store.

Delicious Garbanzos! A 3 pound sack seemed rather small, though. A five-pounder might have been a better buy, maybe. Supersaver shipping makes this a pretty good deal. I'll be buying another sack again at a later date, for sure.
Not a chickpea expert, and these seemed fine, but nothing extraordinary.  I just bought a bag at the indian grocer for $4.00 vs $14 for these.  These seem awfully expensive.

This stuff is awesome. At least I think so. I use it a lot to make Coffee Buttercream frosting. Also I've used it in cookies. I like it for the coffee flavor, and use it less for enhancing chocolate. I add Espresso powder to my baking too. Good quality. If you don't want to buy the entire quantity, I have spotted this same extract at Sunflower Market.

Got some of this at wally world ...maybe it was old or something but it was awful....bitter...useless....i threw it out...this price here is ridiculous... NOT RECOMONDED !!!! One reason I did buy it was because it was not in a clear bottle, olive oil should never be in a clear bottle, but when the oil in it is lousy i guess it doesent matter. Cant blame this on china i guess :|
This corn attracts more birds and squirrels than both my other feeders combined. Good deal bulk purchase, will definitely purchase more.
I have used mix this for over 20 years.  I have friends from the West to East coast who love my Enchiladas.

I started using Lawry's Enchilada Sauce seasonings packets years ago when we lived in CA. When we moved to MN 20 years ago I was able to find it in stores here but in the last couple of years it has been unavailable. I have requested the stores start carring it again, to no avail. I was so excited to learn I could order it through Amazon and did. One hint, I sift out all the dried onion flakes before I add the remaining spices to the tomato paste. I prefer to sprinkle fresh green onion over the homemade cheese covered Enchiladas or Chili Rellenos along with a couple of dollops of sour cream and 2 or 3 olives.

Wonderful!

I have used this for at least 25 years.  I do not like spicy things so this is perfect as it's mild yet flavorful.  I use for beef enchiladas but also add to my hamburger for tacos, burritos, etc.  My family and guests always love anything I prepare with this sauce. Old label used to indicate you could use an 8 oz can of tomato sauce and 2 1/2 cans of water rather than the tomato paste, and this is the method I still use.  Always try to have some prepared on-hand as it's so good.

I am not a yanky,but I am not from Mexico or a border state,(California,Arizona,New Mexico,or Texas)so I found I like the Mexican food but I didn't know how to fix it. I had used other Lawry mixes, and saw the Enchilada mix when shopping and tried it and my family was amazed that I could cook and prepare good enchiladas. It was my secret. Lawry's Enchilada mix and I can work wonders!

An American friend lives in Norway and can't get enchiladas or enchilada sauce. (She can't really get canned tomatoes either.) Her request was for the enchilada sauce she grew up with. So she gets a case of enchilada sauce. With any luck it will last a year....

My husband makes the best red chili enchiladas. Unfortunately, they do not carry Lawry's Enchilada Sauce in grocery stores in Albuquerque.  Which is odd since enchiladas are one of the staples for meals in New Mexico.  Finding it here on Amazon has been terrific.  My family can get back to eating their favorite enchiladas. Being able to buy it by the case is an advantage, also.

This is my go-to enchilada sauce mix. I'm not a fan of spicy, so it's perfect for me.  My kids love it too. Good flavor. For some reason, my local Safeway stores stopped carrying it. Thank goodness for Amazon!  I'm all stocked up now. yay!

I have always been a fan of Lawry's seasonings, but when I couldn't find the enchilada sauce or taco seasonings in our grocery store I went online and found both on Amazaon.com.  I was thrilled!  I won't make enchildas or tacos without Lawry's!

This is my absolute favorite packaged Enchilada Sauce mix.  It's better than any other packaged mix or jarred Enchilada Sauce that you can buy.  When prepared, it's not too thin and not too thick, consistency-wise.  I can definitely tell a BIG difference in my chicken enchiladas when I have to use a different sauce mix.  My husband and kids love these enchiladas when I use this sauce mix- they can even tell the difference. Lawry's is the best, hands down.

What can I say I went over to a friends house for supper and they fed me Enchilada's which I had never had one before.  I liked them so much I asked them to give me the recipe so I need the sauce mix went to my favorite shopping on line store an sure enough Amazon had it.  I ordered it and used it and will continue to order this product until I drop dead from eating too much Enchilada's.

This enchilada sauce is the best...much better than the canned varieties you find in stores. And each package makes a good amount (the equivalent of about three normal cans from the grocery store), so it is much more economical.

I live overseas and can't find enchilada sauce, which made making our tasty Mexican dishes impossible. I tried making my own but didn't find a recipe that tasted good. Happily, I buy this when I'm in the U.S. each year and can easily bring it back with me. I am so glad I found this product, and I can honestly say it's the best I have had.
I have made my own sauce from scratch in the past but thought I'd give this a try. It is too sweet and has no heat to it. Tastes more like spagetti sauce.

So far I have purchased enough for six gallons of this refreshing drink. It is amazing. It is thirst quenching without creating a need to keep drinking. It is soothing and delicious. I have tried other brands, but they don't equal this one. The purveyor is outstanding in service and packaging.

This is the only brand of Horchata mix that I drink.  I've tried other mixes and most of them have that powdery taste.  The Fiesta brand is one that I'm very familiar with.  I grew up in San Diego where it's easy to get authentic mexican food and a large Horchata, and I always remembered the Fiest logo on the drink mixers.  So when I found out I could get the same thing at home, I knew I wouldn't have to look any further for the Horchata taste I know and love.
After reading the reviews, I tried it. I love it but, it takes so much concentrate for one cup. It's bit pricy for the amount of cups. However, I would buy it again.

I tried Horchata at a Mexican restaurant and loved the drink. I live in an area where Horchata in a restaurant is very hard to come by. So I have tried several Horchata drink mixes in an effort to find a way to make it at home.  This one is the ONLY one that tastes like the kind I had in the restaurant.  I definitely recommend this drink concentrate!

I've tried many mixes to duplicate the Agua de Horchata I had at a mexican shop. This is the BEST!!! If you have ever made horchata, save the hours of waiting and get this concentrate. You won't be dissapointed.

not the best but its good! i like products without splenda and highfructose corn syrup and this has none of those.  this makes our stomach aches go away. my kids love it as well as everyone else.  the only one so far ive tasted thats better is natures horchata. but its very hard to come by horchata except with splenda in our stores. so i would buy this again

Pretty good product, especially for being a concentrate. A friend had brought into work some home made horchata using his families recipe and let me try it. I tested our friendship by drinking most of it. That was the first time I had tried horchata. Well I had been hooked and wanted to get some for home. I ordered 2 bottles of this concentrate. The first bottle I used water, the second 1% milk. I definitely recommend using milk. It was very close to being home made. Needs to be stirred every time before pouring. But the taste was there. Shipping was quick. Slightly pricey. Will order again when I need a fix.

This Horchata drink tasted just as good as the many many Mexican Restaurants I have been to in Texas. It is more on the cinnamon side than most I think. -- Use as much as you want to make it as sweet as you want. (It was sort of expensive, however.)

I bought the Klass and other powders... none compare to this syrup!  Im in Iraq right now and we have 1 liter water bottles here all over the place, one horchata bottle will make 4 liter waterbottles worth!  It goes fast!

This drink is sweet and sugary. The carbohydrate content (how much is sugar?) is listed as 27 grams. A serving size is 8oz. I used four to five tbsp to make a 12oz cup. I wouldn't recommend this for diabetics. You can used less, but it will taste watery. The drink is delicious though.

This thing might be 5"-7" however the fact that its the size of a pencil round is beyond ridiculous. I spent $6 more on one for my larger dog and that was well worth the money, this little thing was worth about half I paid. Buyer beware, the photos shown are of their larger bones, they just use them with the smaller ones to make it seem like your getting your moneys worth!! There is no way a 40lb dog would get real use out of this, maybe a 5lb dog!! What a joke!!

I shopped around a little after purchasing this antler chew, and I really don't think this one was a good deal. It is about 6 inches long, as advertised, but pretty thin. Also my dog, who usually goes crazy for elk antlers, isn't really interested in chewing it. I recommend ordering from Grateful Shed Antler Chews instead.

I never give my therepy dogs any food product made overseas.  I am alway concerned about lead and what ever else goes into products my dogs digest.  I friend told me about elk antlers.  I was very interested having read this was a natural product.  I also wanted something that would be hard like a bone to help with oral care and reduce plaque.  Well, my dogs love this! They chew for hours.  I belong to Windwalker Humane Coalation and could not wait to share this product at our next meeting.  I shared the information, now more dogs are loving this product.

I have an eight-month old Boston terrier puppy, so I will admit that she is probably much smaller than most dogs using this toy--but she is a CHEWER. This is one of the few toys that lasts more than a day for her! She loves it, and is always gnawing it at. It gets smaller, but so far I've found no sharp pieces or large chunks that could be a choking hazard.
I have never seen a dog love a toy as much as my dog loves her deer antler! These are great, and the perfect size for my little Shih Tzu / Yorkie mix. Great deal and fast shipping too!
This is a great deal on antlers.  My dogs love them, and they last a long time.  They arrive quickly, and as advertised.

My Dog is 12 years old. His vet says he has the cleanest teeth she has ever seen. We believe this is because he loves antlers whether deer or elk. We had been able to find our own but ran out. I had to find an alternative source. This product is great! He loves it.

We got this for our 10 week old puppy who was chewing everything and everyone in the house. I was very happy with the purchase. The antler is large and our puppy really enjoys chewing on it. It has been 6 weeks since we got it and it shows very little wear even though he chews on it daily. I will buy one again in the future.

I got this for my boston terrier, he seems to love it! He chased it around the house, pushing it along the floor, for a couple hours straight.

Edit: it is now his favorite toy!

I have used the antler to carve something, instead of giving It to a dog. The antler was very sturdy and did not chip at all. I am very satisfied and can only suggest it to other customers. Whether you use it as a treat for your dog, or use it for an art project... It is very high in quality.

This product was purchased for burnishing wood projects. It's 100% elk rack which is what I needed. If it had been fake, I would'nt have been able to use it.  Arrived within 2 days using first class mail.

Items were just as described. The dogs went absolutely bonkers over them! The only downside of that is that I need to order more now; I may go up a size this time in hopes that they will last longer than a month.

Good product.  Most of my dogs like it but do not chew on it all the time like I thought they would.  For the cost I thought that they would love it.  There are many times they will choose a different bone and let this one sit. Probably will not buy this product again because of cost.

Both our dogs, a pom who loves to chew and a pug who normally doesn't chew bones absolutely loved these elk antlers, they would chew for hours if we would let them. We will definitely be buying more, but it looks like these will last a long time.

We have an Australian Shephard puppy and she's been working on this antler for a few days now and she's given up.  It's just too hard for her to enjoy.  Perhaps she will enjoy it when she's a little older.

Maybe we just got the luck of the draw, and I get the feeling that some antlers can be harder or softer within a single 'brand.' But I ordered this antler and it was at least 7" long, as pictured, and wears slowly.

We have ordered antlers from many onlint sources and have found most have inferior quality.  This brand has always been a great value and great quality.  I  would reccommend this brand to anyone looking for antlers.......Why would you buy from some online store when you can have the best from Amazon!

I have 2 dogs (mini poodle 11# and bichon frise/mini poodle 12#) and they both enjoy gnawing on these natural antlers.  I feel comforted in knowing that they are not chewing and ingesting the plastic chew toys (going in the recycle bin) anymore but a natural and humanely produced product.  Although a little on the pricey side for a chew snack - it will last a very long time.

My miniature Golden Retriever looks like he is making love with this thing. It's so funny to watch him chew and massage it with care.  He's my service dog, so I appreciate a healthy, non messy treat that keeps him boredom free while I get through my day . I'm a Soldier and can eaily slide this in my trouser pocket and carry it on the go.  I tried local sstore versions and wasted my money - bleached white with no flavor.  I can take the CHASING OUR TAILS brand and boil with a buillon cube for 6 minutes to soften a bit; then pull back the harder exterior with needle nose pliers to expose more marrow for more hours of chewing.  A subsription is the only  way to go.  My dog's teeth are gleaming WHITE and his breath is pleasant. He should be in commercials to prove how important it is for dogs to chew. I will send Chasing our tails a picture of his teeth when I get time.

I see a lot of reviews complaining of the size. Mine arrived yesterday and is 7 inches long and as thick as the one pictured. I have no complaints whatsoever. Maybe it's the luck of the draw. Has more marrow than any other antler I have bought. Dog loves it.

I've bought 2 of these so far for my 1 year beagle that loves to chew. He loves them and goes between this and his retriever rolls. Received the antlers quickly both times and they were very clean and the perfect size for my chewer.
I have 2 american cocker spaniels. At least 1 of them is chewing or gnawing at this every day, they LOVE it! It is still the same size after 30 days.

My dog eats raw meat. She powers through anything I give her in less than 10 minutes, even meat with bone, which means she doesn't get her teeth as clean as they could be if she took more time. I bought this product to give her more chewing time.

When I first took it out of the package, she responded with interest, but then when I handed the antler to her, she seemed to lose interest, as if she didn't know quite what to do with it. Eventually she took it outside and buried it. The next night she brought it back in, and I took it away and put it in water (advice I got from others) to soften it and release some of the flavor.

After that, she was more interested and will now gnaw and gnaw on the antler, and lick the marrow. I limit her time with it in case she chews hard enough to break a tooth. She started with the wider end of the antler.

The product looks almost exactly like the photo. It is about 7" long and a good size for a small to medium dog with strong jaws (we have a Jack Russell terrier).

These elk antlers are great chew toys. I have a german shepard and pitbull who chew rawhide bones practically instantly. I was sick of constantly buying chew toys so I thought I would try the elk antlers and I'm very impressed! The dogs have been chewing for hours and the chews still look new!

This is the second time we've ordered a Chasing Our Tails Elk Rack Snack.  Our Pug, even though she's only small about 20lbs, loves these things!  She holds them between her paws and goes to town on it.  No pieces come off and it doesn't stain the carpet.  Keeps her busy for a long time.
These Elk antlers are dangerous - they splintered and shattered, and I worried that our dog might have swallowed sharp shards!  We have used deer antlers and they never splintered at all.

The items came well packaged and in a timely manner.  I am giving it 2 stars because out of the package it had dirt and what smelled like animal excrement on it.  I cleaned it twice before giving it to my dog.  The rack was almost completely black out of the package and after cleaning it myself it was the light brown that they normally are....but it has still retained the bad odor.  My dog is hesitant to use it because of the bad smell.  I have ordered other elk racks before and just be forewarned that this company does not clean the rack before shipment.  Other companies do.  I did not purchase this expecting to have to clean the dirt and animal excrement off it.  I'll be purchasing my next one (which is probably very soon since my dog won't touch this one) from another company.

These are so yummy.  They have the same nice corn taste as corn nuts but they are much lighter and easier on the teeth.  The barbeque flavor is perfect.  My local health food store charges a mint for these so I was excited to find them on Amazon.
I've tried many, many brands and types of noodles.  Mrs. Weiss' Kluski are the best noodles you can buy.  They taste just like homemade noodles without all the work.
Wonderful texture, great taste.  Thank you, Mrs. Weiss, for helping me remember my grandma's cooking.
I make a chicken noodle soup that just can't be made without these noodles. Even my Grandmother who made her noodles from scratch loved my version.

Kluski noodles have been a part of my family for as long as I can remember - both for my mom's exceptional tuna casserole, and just noodle side dishes.  All of my area grocery stores stopped carrying this noodle.  Gratefully I can still find them on Amazon, and buying in bulk made them very inexpensive.  Not a problem to have a case in my household.  I am now supplying friends who also prefer this pasta and can't find it.  Yum.....

They came packaged very nicely for shipping. They are excellent top quality noodles that take 16 minutes approximately to cook. They are made in Canada and I believe they are made of top quality ingredients and have a nice one year freshness date on them. They tasted very very good. I hope Amazon someday has the 12 each of the 16 ounce bags of this type of noodles with free shipping. That would be really nice. These are great noodles. No regrets here.

Mrs. Weiss Kluski Enriched Egg Dumpling Noodles, 8-Ounce Packages (Pack of 12)

This is a wonderful product that residents in California have not had much opportunity to purchase.
It is readily available in the East.
Thanks to AMAZON, they secured a case for me and delivered it to my Brentwood, CA home.

The item is a perfect accompaniment to Chicken Noodle soup or just by themselves with a little butter.
Their texture is unmatched unless you make, roll and cut your own.
The availability of this product, in our home, preserves an old family tradition for us.
These noodles are the best if you are making chicken noodle soup.  They have a flavor that other noodles don't have.  My family loves them!

When the grocery stores here (NM) stopped carrying these I asked friends to ship them to me. I was delighted to be able to find them on line. These are like my grandmother's noodles- they are a little bit chewy, they can withstand being re-heated, an they actually taste like something. I have found that most noodles have no flavor, but these have a smooth egg flavor that adds to the recipe instead of just being a filler. I will be ordering more soon- our 12 bags are already gone!!

This is one of my favorite salts made by Woody's. I received it as a sample when I ordered some of their other flavors. It's got a unique flavor that is good on pasta, pizza, eggs, and other dishes. Very addictive.
Great product!!! The merchandise came in on time. I always love the way Almond Roca is made :D Thank you!!!

The vending machine at work carries this variety in 1.25oz bags. Great product. Simple, natural ingredients (Dry roasted almonds, cashews, pistachios, evaporated cane sugar, tapioca syrup, blueberry, pomegranate, sea salt, natural flavors). And if it matters (in the 1.25oz bag): 180 calories, 8g net carbs (11 - 3g fiber). Delicious. There's enough in the pack to make for good snack. I was somewhat surprised that the price on Amazon was not cheaper (figured I could do better than the vending machine @ 1.25 per pack. strange.). Guess I've got a good thing going:)
Bottom line: If you want a trail mix that's simple and tasty, this is definitely worth a try.
I got this as a gift from my grandparents when I was doing a cross country trip. Can we say yummy! I'm totally hooked and I love that it doesn't have peanuts.

I found this product on a US Airways flight and have been HOOKED ever since.  It's actually very good for you, not too high a sugar content.  The flavor is UNBELIEVABLE!  W/out doubt the most scrumptious trail-mix I have EVER tasted, and I'm not a big trail-mix fan.  It's lightly sweet and salty at the same time.  A very satisfying snack you can feel good about.  TRY IT, u will love it!

This is such a delicious snack! Costco carries a big bag of it which is a little more cost effective but these smaller bags that Amazon carries are more convenient. My family thoroughly enjoyed this and will definitely buy more again.

My nephew told me about these when he purchased in an airport for a snack.  The description alone intrigued me.  He and I then went on Amazon to see if they had them, and three days later, they arrived.  I love these for a snack during the work day. They are delicious, and give me the crunch I crave, and the pop of blueberry/pomegranate sweetness that I love with it.  The second best thing is that they are healthy, especially compared to the other snacks I tend to grab.  GREAT find my nephew, and thanks Amazon for the reasonable pricing.
Awesome snack...bought them on a flight and ended up ordering some online.  My husband likes them also and he is not much for this kind of snack.

I got this as part of a gift basket here on Amazon and I'm back here to add it to my wishlist.  It's delicious stuff.  It's the perfect mixture of salty and sweet, fruity and nutty.  It is also just sticky enough to stay together in crunchy chunks, but not so sticky that your hands are covered in goo while you're eating.  Recommended.
Excellent product.  A healthy good tasting choice for snack time.  I would love to find this in a larger size.

Delicious. I used to be able to buy a large bag at a membership warehouse. After my family was hooked, they no longer stocked this item. I was so happy to find it on Amazon, though in little snack bags.
Solid snack, tastes great, seems to be made of high-quality ingredients, priced well, ships fast, filling and tasty. What more should I say?

This is the best trail mix I have ever eaten.  I wish that it was available at a store near me, but I can order it from Amazon if that's the way it goes.  It is delicious, really takes care of my sweet tooth, and is crunchy to boot!  I love it!

I first tried Mareblu Naturals on a US Air flight in first class. It was super healthy, delicious, and just exactly what I needed. I looked for this product every where in the grocery stores where I live (Major city) but it was not available. I think the price offered on Amazon was very reasonable. I will keep buying this as long as it's not offered in the stores, where I can just go and pick it up whenever I feel my sweet tooth is kicking in...

Found these on a US Air flight. I was unable to find in stores locally. Checked amazon and found them. Price is good, we did the auto shipment program, this works well for us. Just as we are about to finish last bag a new shipment comes.

Tastes great, low fat, and gluten free. These have a nice flavor, salty sweet and crunch all in one. Kids love them as well as the adults in the household. I have recommended these to many friends and family.

Mareblu Trail Mix is great in every flavor, but this is my very favorite.  It's a snack, but I eat it as a dessert.  It's good with yogurt, and it's good with oatmeal.  I keep some in the car and it never loses it's crunch.

Yes - these are fabulous -- hard to stop eating at the serving size! I've tried a bunch of the different varieties and think the blueberry pomegranate is the best.
Unfortunately Costco isn't carrying it anymore - but we're at least happy it can be purchased online.

I had been buying this tea directly from Gevalia for about $6 a box + s/h for ages. I was pleasantly surprised when I saw this product being offered through Amazon at a reduced price. I decided to buy a pkg of 3 and see how fresh they were. The product arrived on time as promised and was as fresh as when I normally bought them from Gevalia - all at a significantly lower price. Winner!! I have found a new source for my Green Mountain Tea.

Now, if Amazon can just start stocking some of the Gevaila ground coffees that I normally drink I would be able to take care of all of my hot beverage needs at one place.

Dont waste your money, Gevalia is repackaging its brand, but if this tea is a sample, forget it. I'm not a green tea afficianodo (sp?) but this is no more tasteful than hot tap water. So if indeed green tea has medicinal qualities, I'm using it for that.

Its a good Green Tea. Very easy to drink if that makes sense. For the price its really a great deal. When you open the box you see that Gevalia really tries hard to make a great product. I would recommend to my friends.

I use this product in a commercial kitchen and bakery. It has an incredibly fresh and clean orange scent, with no bitterness or alcohol scent. It is quite concentrated, and I've found that you can use about half of what a recipe calls for.

I also add about 1/4 teaspoon per cup of orange juice required in a recipe to give the finished product extra orange flavor. This product contributes nicely to the overall smell and taste of a finished product.

Shipped to us fast; smells & tastes fresh as an orange. I make mocha valencia's espresso's & this is 1st class.
4 parts dark cocoa/3 parts orange to a standard shot espresso. Top off w/ milk & your day's starting cloudless.

my rescue dog has always thrown up a lot. a few times a week at times.
