I rarely review products after purchasing things online - I guess I'm not a great contributor to the online community except in the case of being extremely impressed or extremely upset.  I was having dinner with my folks recently, and my dad was complaining that he could never find Spanish Peanuts at the local grocery store anymore.  He said he would find them at Wal-Mart on occasion (about one out of three times he went) - he also tried out a local supplier but was unhappy with the inconsistency of the quality of the nuts.  While he was explaining all this to me, I jumped on Amazon on my iPhone and searched for Spanish Peanuts, found a pack of 12 cans and bought them.  A few days later they showed up at our office and he was blown away!  He couldn't believe something that had been frustrating him for so long could be made so easy by the power of the internet (since then, I've got him connected on an iPad and am hoping I can get him to start surfing Amazon and other online retailers on his own!).  He was so grateful that he gave me two of the cans and I promptly went home and opened one up, made a bowl of vanilla ice cream with hot fudge and spanish peanuts on top - talk about a trip down memory lane!  Reminded me of having dinner over at my grandmother's house when I was a kid and both my father and I have been smiling about this purchase ever since it was made.  Thanks Amazon!!
I have not been able to find these peanuts in stores for about 2 years.I finally Googled them and Amazon came thru! I love these nuts!

Spanish peanuts were my Father's favorite; therefore they became mine. I was able to get them in my old age for awhile, but they disappeared from the shelves of Northern Virginia groceries. I went with the flow for awhile, but eventually got smart and looked to Amazon.com. I was rewarded for my intelligence for I now have my Spanish Peanuts whenever I desire. I am also super happy that Planters uses Sea Salt. Thank you, Suzi

My wife and I eat these things like peanuts! You can't eat just one, you know! Planters is the best and buying them from Amazon makes it simple. They're cheaper and delivered to my door on a specified schedule. We never run out like we used to and finding these in the stores is not always as easy as one would think! Yeah - GREAT!

Very delicious and lightly salted. Packaged well for shipping and arrived in good shape. My shipment has a freshness date of about 20 months or more on the bottom of the container. Fresh.. delicious.. Very happy with this product.

Spanish peanuts are caviar to peanut lovers. They are a little smaller than other peanut types and have a richer flavor due to a higher oil content. That adds a few calories, but to the peanut connoisseur, it's worth it.

The red husk or "skin" adds additional flavor. If you've ever tried cooking your own, you know how easy it is to burn the skin. Getting them to come out "just right" is a real art.

Planters has mastered that art. Their Redskin Spanish peanuts are consistently plump, fresh tasting, and perfectly roasted. The sea salt variety is terrific too.

Buying in bulk like this seems like overdoing it, but if you have a peanut lover in your family, you may be surprised how quickly they'll disappear.

And as other reviewers have pointed out, Spanish peanuts seem to be getting harder to find these days, so grab 'em while you can.

My husband loves Spanish Peanuts more than any other kind, and especially Planters. We always had several cans of Planters on hand but over the past few years all of our local stores stopped carrying them.  I had family and friends on alert to let me know if they found them somewhere.  We had just about given up when I decided to check Planters themselves and sure enough, they were available thru Amazon. I bought a case and we're almost thru the 10th can, must order more after I finish the review. The peanuts were very fresh and just as good as we remembered.
The shipping is very fast and the product (Planters Spanish Peanuts) are always very good and this time was no exception. Thank you for the fast service.  Fred Kaiser.
WalMart and the local groceries have stopped carrying Spanish Peanuts.... not sure why. Nice to find a source that wasn't much higher in price.
This was a gift.  I was told it arrived on time and was a quality product.

I needed pastel chocolate mints to go along with small pastel flowers for bridal shower favors.  I looked everywhere and found these online, and they were perfect!  They went very well with my paper flowers and everyone loved them.

I wanted a sugar splurge but I chose these Shortbreads by mistake... Partially Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Glucono Delta-lactone, Artificial Vanillin and Artificial Butter Flavors... Yuck! If Amazon won't take them back, I'll have to throw them out.

This is easy to grow, it lasts quite a while and my cats love munching on it instead of my house plant.  If you have it on a tile floor, you need to put something under it so it won't slide in the original plastic container that it was purchased in.  These are just insert refills.

I often use Char Crust Sun-Dried Tomato and Garlic on chicken, but have tried it on turkey and beef also. It works well on all. The easy to follow directions are on the package. I have tried a few other Char Crust varieties, but this flavor is my family's favorite. I will buy this product again.
Reminds me of Lucky Charm marshmallows, but much more creamy.  A little pricey, but delicious.  I'm not much for regular ice cream, but I like this.

I got this for my kids easter basket just to have something different and they loved it.  It tastes great and even travels well.  This is a great treat to take in the car or stick in a purse for that time when you are craving ice cream but can't have it.

Im not a big fan of extra strong dark chocolate, but the health benefits are many so I figured I would try a few of them out. This is by far the best one. Actually has more of a sweet taste and any bitterness is hard to even notice. Packed with antioxidants. A few squares a day is a great addition to any healthy diet.

This is a very nice chocolate. It has been cured to a nice crisp hardness. The flavor has dimension to it with a sweet overtone and minimal back end bitterness. I've very impressed. This will definitely be on my "addiction" list for reordering.

I order a package of 12 Chocolove Premium Chocolate Bars, which by the way is an excellent chocolate, but when it arrived the bars were bent and melting due to he heat of the delivery truck. I contacted the seller and without questions or argument I was sent another order. I received the order well packed and cold in 2 days. Because I was stunned to see such customer service I contacted the seller once again to offer payment for the UPS cost, but the seller refused stating that their goal is total satisfaction and that I should not pay for the shipping. Just amazing service! I will recommend this seller to anyone and ask to support them. If there were more stars to give I would had given them the max.
I hope this review helps.
DF

this is my favourite chocolate ever.  creamy melt in your mouth texture..plus the little squares are domed and fit perfectly against the roof of your mouth (each one has a little heart on it too).  nice dark flavour without the bitterness that can happen in the REALLY dark ones.  i like the darker ones too, but this is my favourite percentage.  the flavoured ones are really yummy as well.  my boyfriend is also addicted to this brand.  maybe you don't think you need to buy twelve at a time, but i think it's a great idea!

I love chocolate. Good chocolate. I've tried fancy bars, local bars, hand-poured bars, organic bars, and almost everything else, and THIS is my favorite. The chocolate is perfectly dark without being bitter, the orange has an incredibly satisfying crunch and a slight (very slight) chewiness that makes the texture of the bar divine, and the flavor of orange and chocolate together are heavenly.

If only they sold it in more places!

I am not usually a lover of dark chocolate, but when a friend gave me this chocolove premium dark (55%) orange peel as a gift, I fell in love with it. So for Valentine's I decided to buy a box and give my special friends a bar for a happy. Now they are all addicted. The orange peel gives it a special little tang and crunch at the end and I would recommend it to any chocolate lover. It was funny that each person said they could not hold out to make it last a whole day like I had challenged them to. It is just too good.

Not only have i had just about everry brand of belgian chocolate this side of the atlantic, i have had this one several times.  But this seller sent bad chocolate. It has a powdery appearance and is very brittle to touch and taste.  Can't eat it at all.  And i guess i can't return it either.

I treat myself to Chocolove at my local health food store once a month.  I am very conservative on how much sugar I have, so I make one bar last me a whole month.  Yes, it has real sugar, but it is so delightful for the amount of sugar that it has.  A taste of heaven.  I buy the 70% cacao and I am hooked! Seductive bliss!  One more thing, if you are in to dark chocolate, the taste is quite smooth, not bitter as some darks go.

This is the best chocolate bar I've ever tried.  The salty taste is in perfect balance with the chocolate.  I'm not the only one that thinks so, since our local grocery store sells out of this particular bar almost as soon as they arrive.  The other Chocolove bars are fine, but this one is tops.

My husband and I occasionally enjoy a few pieces of dark chocolate in the evening and this chocolate is a real treat. It is hard to find such good chocolate at less than $3 per bar. We order a couple cases each fall and keep them in the freezer till we need a new bar. This is not bitter chocolate and just 1/6 (3 small squares) of a bar is only 80 calories and satisfies our desires for dark chocolate.

I first tried this at a small coffee shop and the memory of the taste haunted me until I found it on Amazon.  It is a wonderfully decadent treat in which to indulge, whether to forget your bad day or to reward yourself for a job well done. You can taste the real orange peel shavings in this chocolate and it is that perfect blend of dark chocolate and orange, which is the most divine combination.

So, I do A/B tests. You know, like buy bar A and then bar B and then eat 'em both.

YEARS of doing this shamelessly has led me to become a regular purchaser of Chocolove's Pure Dark. The 55% one.

I don't care much for their other bars -- they're just so-so -- but DANG! the Pure Dark is crazy-good.

Do yourself a favor. Don't just buy this bar. Buy this bar and then buy ten other chocolate bars. It's in the name of science, it's okay. Take all your bars, break them up, then try them all.

Yeah, that chocolate that keeps evolving and coating your mouth with subtlety and wizardry? That's this one.

Bought some of these in New Mexico at a co-op store and couldn't find them locally in Florida. Bought on line thru Amazon at a lower price and free shipping. The candy is wonderful and it's truly a sweet deal.

I am a fanatic about fabulous chocolate and even more so when it's combined with orange. AND, boy oh boy, Chocolove has hit the nail on the head with this delicious chocolate bar! Well worth  the price. I would definitely recommend this chocolate...so fantastic!

My husband a self-proclaimed chocoholic says this is the best chocolate he's ever eaten.  And because it's so high in cocoa content, it's good for him too!  That's all he needed - another reason to eat chocolate ha! ha!  We bought it in 12-bar packs and gave it out over xmas and everyone agreed...great chocolate!
Someone gave me a bar as a gift.  I had no idea it would be this good.  Better than other orange/choc combos, it has a nice crunch to the peel bits. Yum.

Bought one of these at Whole Foods about a month ago.

The secret: they freeze-dry the orange peel and this leads
to a really strong orange taste with each bite. You get a little
bit of peel this way.

I've loved orange chocolate since i was a kid and my Dad

I absolutely love dark chocolate (77% seems to be the magic number) and have tried many different varieties.  This is one of my favorites due to the complex flavor and great dense and smooth texture. Also, this pack of 12 is a economical way to purchase.

Chocolove's Orange Peel in Dark Chocolate is one of the best dark chocolates I've ever eaten. If you're a dark chocolate fan, you owe it to yourself to try this. this chocolate is a true treat to eat, perfect texture, almond toffee mix goes together perfectly. the packaging is really cute too. very highly recommended!

My nephew's little girls loved these pretty cakes. They arrived just after Christmas, which was an extra treat for the family.
It's so dank. It's made from the Neem pollen which is also pretty dank. This shit is straight outta India so you know it's dank. I love it cause of its dankness.

I can just look at a carb and I gain weight.  This product allows me to eat pasta and not get all the high impact carbs on my blood sugar.  18 grams of fiber is outstanding! Unlike the other reviewer I think it tastes really good.  The texture is a little more chewy and thick but again this is something I like.  I dont miss white pasta at all when I eat this.

My husband and I share 5 wonderful elderly aunts and one uncle. This was our choice of a Christmas present. We had them shipped direct and they all could not get over them. The only complaint I had was 2 did not have cards but since all the rest did and the 2 aunts that could not find one are in their late 80's they might have just missed them.  All 5 said they were absolutely beautiful.
I bought this basket for my mom as a birthday and christmas present. She loved it! Naturally because its alot of chocolate.

These Puffs are really yummy and gluten free! The Sweet Potato gives them a nice sweet flavor. We munch on these often. We are not gluten free in our house, but it doesn't mater! These also are low in sugar and I like that it is a vegetable flavoring. My 5 year old likes this flavor just as much as the other Puffs flavors.

I was recently shopping for my favorite orange marmalade Dundee Orange Marmalade 16 oz - 2 Jars and my local supermarket was out of it. I noticed this Robertsons brand on the shelf and decided to give it a try.

The Robertsons was a couple of dollars less than the Dundee brand, but it was only 12 oz as opposed to 16 oz for Dundee.

I found it to be an excellent bitter sweet marmalade, although slightly sweeter than I prefer. A more bitter than sweet flavor would be more to my liking, but that's a matter of personal preference. I like rind in my marmalade and it had a decent amount of rind in it but it seemed less than the Dundee brand.

Scotland is the home of bitter sweet marmalade, this is where Dundee was made for many years until they shifted there plant to England recently. All of the rest of Europe and the U.S. produce a sweeter version of orange marmalade.

I would defiantly buy this brand again, that is of course if I could not find the Dundee brand.

NOTE;; I am assuming the SCOTCH on the label refers to Scotland, there is unfortunately no Scotch whisky in this marmalade.
This often ridiculed product is actually a cheap source of protein with a nice spiced flavor. It makes a great sandwich spread!

I find this an excellent product to use as a seasoning in soups, beans, or scrambled eggs. It also makes a good spread on unsalted crackers. I find it too salty to use as a spread on things already salted, but subject to that caveat I find it a tasty and nutritious source of protein.

I like this product very much. It is a healthy alternative to greasy pork sausages and bacon in the morning, especially good with grits and eggs, with a bit of butter and a drop of hot sauce. Try it, I believe you will like it.

I ordered the complete set of Totonac sugar free syrups and tested them out with my morning Kellogg's Eggo waffles.

Some of the syrups are pretty good; others are really not my thing and I threw them out. My verdict/opinion is: Almond, Maple Syrup and Vanilla are pretty good; the Raspberry is okay (if you crave some fruit taste); but I couldn't handle the taste of the Blueberry, Butter Pecan, Caramel, Hazelnut and Vanilla Cinnamon.

The syrup is not thick like most syrups on the market; it's more runny and I find myself pouring some syrup out on to a plate and then dipping pieces of torn waffles.

Compared to local stores where only 2-4 oz packaging is sold, this is a great bargain.  It's an advantage to have a large amount available--this inspires experimental use that livens up meals and contributes to good health. (Cayenne has significant, clinically proven health/medical benefits.)

1ST THE SLICED VARIETY. SHE LOVES IT. THEN THE GRILLED SEAFOOD VARIETY. KITTY BLISS. NOW HER 1ST DELIGHTS FLAVOR, TURKEY + CHEESE. LICKED THE PLATE CLEAN AS WITH THE OTHERS. MY BABY CANT GET ENOUGH OF THIS FANCY FEAST SO I'M OFF 2 CHOOSE ANOTHER FLAVOR 4 HER. I AM HER MORE THAN WILLING SLAVE 4 LIFE AFTERALL. 4 PAWS UP! ..P.S. ORDERED THESE WEDNESDAY NIGHT, RECEIVED FRIDAY MORNING. FASTEST DELIVERY TO BE HAD!

The wife and I like Mustard as opposed to ketchup. We experiment with many brands of mustard. We do like this among others we have selected at Amazon. Buying from Amazon is simply easier and generally ships free... I am so happy with the Amazon selections. Bottom-line, if you want something different buy this. Hope this helps.

This is an awesome, convenient product.  My kids actually like this better than "real" (i.e. meat) taco filling.  It's much quicker to make than hamburger, lower fat, and obviously stores for much longer.  We aren't vegetarian but I try to limit our meat intake so I always use this in our tacos.  I'm glad Amazon carries this because it's not available at our local grocery stores.  Yummy!

Excellent product, very tasty. Highly recommended by people who are
on the Nutrisystem program. Makes up very fast and you can freeze
servings for future use. Five star rating. M
This is a great product if you don't eat meat.It is easily made with water and tastes great ! The taco flavoring is yummy.

I am always willing to try New Products; however, I didn't want to buy Twelve Boxes from Amazon, What if we didn't like it? So I got one Box of FANTASTIC Taco Filling from somewhere else, and decided to give it a try, Followed the Cooking Directions and made the Entire Package in a Sauce Pan with 1 3/4 cup of boiling water and two teaspoons of oil

Since I found the Sodium a little high for our taste 520 MG, 22% (we don't use a lot of salt) I decided to compensate all that salt by adding about one Tablespoon of Onions and another of Green Bell Peppers to the mix, very finely chopped that I had sauteed in a non-stick skillet with two drops of oil (no salt) even though in the List of Ingredients there is Dehydrated Onions and Onion Powder but I also wanted something fresh, so I mix it all up reduce heat and simmer 5-6 minutes or until liquid is absorbed, stirred every now and then...and like Magic it turned into what it looked like Ground Beef,...Wow, Wee! It was Good, we were very Surprised

I make my own Taco Shells, I like the White Corn Tortillas, Crispier, fry them in vegetable oil folded into a taco shape, I use tongs and a spoon for help, drained on paper towels, filled them with about two or three Tablespoons of the Fantastic Taco Filling, add Salsa, Chopped Romaine Lettuce and top them with Shredded Cheddar Cheese,...So Good, The Best Tacos We Had in a Long Time

You can get about 10 Tacos out of one Box and Yes, we liked it Better than Meat, and we felt good knowing we were NOT Eating a Cow-Steer, Now we are ready to order the Twelve Boxes from Amazon.com,... in fact we just Did! ... Check Pictures Posted Step by Step of Making Tacos, located under the Item's Image, Thank You

I've been a fan of this product for about 12 years now.....it is easy, fast, healthy and delicious....but I have to gripe about the price.....less than ten years ago it was about $23 a case (shipped) now it's over $33

Soon I'm going to stop buying it (like I have with so many other products) because they are (unjustifiably) raising the prices exponentially on a simple dried soy protein product. Realistically, it should be about $1 per box.

America will pull out of this recession when we finally figure out that sticking it to ANOTHER American is not going to help pull us out of your financial problems, and when we decide NOT to stick it to the next guy to recover our losses

Having said that, I still eat this product, but the price hike turned me off bigtime
If I see it go up one more time, I will add it to my list of gouger companies, and never buy it again.
At that point it will be cheaper to make my own.

I usually add half a pack of taco seasoning for more flavor. It makes great chili too (that I also have used for enchiladas). Tastes awesome in an omelet and great on nachos.

I have had many countless people try it and no one could tell it was meatless (and I'm from Texas). It's the best tasting meatless tacos I found yet, and each box is equivalent to a pound of ground beef and barely over $2.

My wife and I recently became vegetarians, some days its a little harried to get home, kick off your shoes relax a minute before you start dinner..FANTASTIC FOODS to the rescue...some days when you need help to get a meal out in a few minutes..FF does the job well..we have tried several different flavors like the Taco filling, Tofu Scramble, Hummus, Sloopy Joe's, Vegetarian Chili, Falafel...none of which have dissapointed us and as you can see I am semi-retired chef. The best part is the  ease of preparation...amazing flavors with no meat!! and nothing really strange in the ingredients label. We have learned to buy it by the case as it can be somewhat expensive at most grocery stores as they price it like a specialty product...I'll put it to you this way..it taste go enough to fool most meat eating palates and if you want to turn the kids over quick..use the Sloppy Joe's as much as the Taco Filling.  The taste is a winner!! Bon Apettit!

I have been buying this for years. We are a vegetarian family. I have tried many taco products, but this is by far the best! It is shelf stable, so no refrigeration is needed. You can stock up on a whole case, however we love it so much that it doesn't last long. I use it in many recipes such as Taco soup, Taco casserole, nachos, taco salad and of course, tacos! This is quick to prepare and popular...even with meat-eaters!

Fantastic World Foods mixes are terrific! We're new to vegetarian eating and experimenting with the many products available now.  We've tried the falafel, chicken patty, hamburger, hummus, sloppy joe, and taco filling mixes.  Every one of them is delicious.  For me, it's about the texture and flavor.  This taco filling nails it - you will not be able to tell the difference between this vegetarian mix and hamburger.  As a matter of fact, I like the taste better than ground beef. Amazon makes it easy and inexpensive to stock up with the 12-box packs. You can also find Fantastic Foods brands at most whole/health food stores. I like to add diced onions to the mix. Toss in some jalapenos for a little kick. Yummy!

I was skeptical at first because it didn't look like it would make very much. But it makes PLENTY! We had a lot of leftovers and we invited people over to have it. It tastes really good and has the perfect texture. It is easy and fast to make. Even the omnivores couldn't get enough of it.

tried this for the first time today it was so good. kids loved it .the texture is just like taco filling and no grease. and one box make a lot of filling
http://www.amazon.com/Fantastic-Foods-Filling-4-4-Ounce-Boxes/dp/B000GZY9HY/ref=sr_1_1?s=grocery&ie=UTF8&qid=1302206977&sr=1-1
I love making my own mock taco bell tacos, ever since I swore off that place. This 'meat', even my die hard meat eating family members like it. Yummay.

I decided to try this based on the review here. It's absolutely wonderful! So quick to make and YUMMY. No icky grease to deal with like hamburger meat, too. My 16 month old granddaughter loved it. I didn't add any spices to it at all, and it was great just like that. All you have to do is boil some water and let it simmer for about 5 minutes. Easy!

Great vegan tacos in a few minutes. Add water and a little olive or any oil. Heat quickly to eat over greens  for a high protein, low calorie, fast lunch, or add extra onions while sauteing and build tacos with all the fixings.  Very tasty, made right here in Petaluma,Ca, with high quality ingredients.  Healthy for kids!

This product is great.  It cooks up in minutes and tastes just like seasoned beef.  We use it for not only tacos, but casseroles, mexican lasagna, etc.  I'm sure we'll be buying another case shortly, even though there are only two in our household.  Thanks Fantastic Foods!
I love this stuff because it tastes great, does not require refridgeration and takes only minutes to make.

This stuff is great -- tastes kind of like taco bell meat. Seriously!
Good for vegetarians, and the just plain lazy. =)

The product is great and a healthier alternative to ground beef, inexpensive, easy to prepare in tacos, taco salad, burritos, and nachos, easy to store for long periods and a crowd pleaser. No worry about cholesterol or BSE either.

My only problem was with the distribution center that has on four occasions sent only one box instead of the 12 boxes (case lot) that I ordered.

I originally found this taco filling at the local health food store.  They no longer sell it, and I was estatic on finding it on Amazon!  I absolutely love it!  It tastes great!  I even have made it for my meat eating family, and they all liked it!!  The expiration dates on the boxes are early summer of next year, so I will have plenty of time to eat them before they expire!  Looks like I will be having tacos tonight!  YUM!!

Anyone who has gone vegan or vegetarian knows how much you miss tacos. I tried this and I just can't believe how good it is! I made hard shell tacos with this today and soy cheese and I just can't believe how fabulous it tastes. The falafel this company makes is pretty good too!

Please don't ever stop making this stuff! None of my carnivore family can even tell this is soy....If you are on the fence about this, don't hesitate-try it! The people who are saying it's too salty are entitled to their opinion, but this has no more salt in it than any other taco I've had in my life.

As I was cooking this for the first time, I took a taste to check for seasoning and thought it was a little on the salty side.  Once I added the usual toppings to my taco it was excellent.  Very close to ground beef tacos in taste and texture.

I find it kind of funny how some people found this too salty.  I had to add more salt because to be it wasn't salty enough!  I made some nachos with this and they turned out great.  Most likely someone who didn't know this wasn't real meat wouldn't be able to tell the difference.  I made some enhancements for my tastes, by adding some extra salt, garlic powder, onion bits, and substituting some of the oil it calls for with sharp cheddar, which melts right into at and gives it a little tang and richness.  I bought 3 of these on special at the local grocery store, hoping I wasn't making a mistake, and I'm happy I made the purchase.

These are easy to make and are always in rotation in my pantry.
They taste better than real meat with that taco flavoring added.
Unfortunately they seem to be getting harder to get at my local store.
I would also highly recommend the sloppy joe mix from them too.

Jaime Pico
These tacos are great. Highly recommend for all vegetarians. Better tnan the meat tacos you make or get out.

I've been a vegetarian for almost 15 years, and I LOVE this taco filling. I've used it to make straight up traditional tacos, enchiladas as well as "taco pie. I love that the texture somewhat resembles meat, so you can easily substitute it in recipes that call for ground beef.  However, my omnivorous family members are quite skeptical about this product and prefer that I leave it out of dishes. Ultimately, I look at this as a vegetarian's meat substitute, and not a universal meal substitute.
I received a case of this hoping to add it to our vegan menu. Made the first batch and could not eat it is was so salty. Gave the other 11 boxes to the owner of our local organic market.

To everyone crying about the salt content:

If you look at the nutrition facts and do the math you'll find the salt content of pappy's seasoning is only about 24% (290 mg of salt per 1.2 g serving size). one of the most common dry rub methods called the 8-3-1-1 formula uses 3 parts salt. that is equivalent to about 23% salt in the rub mix. Based on those numbers it is apparent that pappy's is right in line with traditional dry seasoning recipes.

This is one of my favorite seasonings for chicken and beef and I suggest that the lower scoring reviews be disregarded when considering purchasing this product.

This rub is not only my secret seasoning on my bbq in my wood burning pit but is awesome on rottissiere
(sp?) chicken. I give it out to my friends w/o the lable on it to keep the secret in TN. SHHH! Pass it on.
M

A friend from California introduced us to this seasoning and since then, it is a must have for my kitchen.  It adds a nice zing to a variety of dishes; to season steak & B-que, in spagetti sauce, chili, etc.  Pretty much anything I cook that is beef or pork has some Pappy's seasoning in the dish. You won't be disappointed.

I bought this rub on a whim, which is unusual for me. I'm glad that I did. It's an exceptionally good, well balanced  and versitile dry seasoning mix. I have used it on beef, chicken, salad and soup and it worked on all. Last night, the SO wanted a rub for some shrimp dish and I let her pick from several, all but one of which were my own formulas. She was delighted with the Pappy's Choice. I suspect that I'll be glad to have the full two pounds because it's going to get a lot of use. About the only thing that I cannot see using it for is on desserts.
Rub or seasoning for meat or fish. If you like to grill you should have this seasoning.
I love this stuff! It is an easy seasoning to use and makes meat delicious.
Great rub, great service, arrived in record time. Have ordered this several times it is a favorite of ours!

This used to be sold at Costco and was discontinued for some reason, so we searched high and low and finally found it on amazon.  We LOVE this seasoning - it's an all-in-one bottle of delicious.  It makes the flavor pop from shrimp to rib-eye.  You just have to try it, but if you need a recommendation... I give it a thumbs up!

I was introduced to this product by a butcher shop in California. THey would perferate a steak and then place some Pappys on it and put it in a ziplock bag to marinate. It really brings out a good flavor when BBQ'ing the meat after it has soaked up the spices. The part I really like is that it does not contain MSG!

Pappy's is a perfect addition to anything. Especially any meat cooked on the grille. Just enough pop to spice things up, but not too hot or spicy. We shake it on meat before we grill like a light meat rub. Pappy's stays on the meat and gives it a nice flavor.
By far the best seasoning for steak or pork. Ordered extras for family members because they always ask what I used on the steaks. No need for steak sauce with this seasoning.
Love this stuff for steaks and even fish on the grill.  So nice to see it online.  Thought I was going to have to have brother send me up some from Ca. I'm hooked on this seasoning.

I discovered this at Costco also but am now buying it from Amazon. Got some on the way now.

I use this everywhere. Steak, Tri-Tip, Hamburger, Pork Chops, Fish and in Soup's and Stew's. I've overdosed a few times and made things a little too salty. So go easy till you figure out the right amount for your application. But they also make a 50% less salt and a salt free version.

Thanks Pappy!

I just replenished my supply of Pappy's, having used it for years. I discovered it one day at Costco, but since they no longer carry it I'm glad Amazon does. I'm buying some for my son, who's always asking how to prepare different foods.

I tell him when you're grilling, start with Pappy's!
Being a fan of Central California Santa Maria style BBQ I can't live without this stuff. It goes on everything. Especially good as a dry rub for Tri Tip
We use Pappy's seasoning on every kind of meat, fish and fowl. It even peps up the taste of grilled  veggies. We've been using it for years and will continue.

I am absolutely in love with Pappy's spice blends! They are great on a variety of meats and my family gobbles up anything I BBQ with it. You can't go wrong using this product, trust me!

Thank you Pappy's for creating the perfect spice blend!

Sincerely,

Audra Van Fossen

My neighbor got us turned on to this. We are using it a lot now. We make soup base out of half chicken broth and half pappy's seasoning, then add chicken or beef and cut veggies.  Everyone raves about it, even neighborhood kids. It's different every time depending on what veggies we use.  Famly size soup can be made from scratch for just a few dollars.  Even kids like it. I also use it to flavor steaks and roasts.  This seasoning is a well kept secret.

My nephew in Fresno CA turned me on to this.  Packed some to take home, used it up and glad I can order on line.  We love this on everything.  Other reviews about salt, they do make a low salt version to try.  Great on burgers, steaks...chicken.

Number one on the list is salt

Oh Yeah! Lottsa salt. So much so that it overpowers everything else.

WAY too much salt. Eating it straight from the shaker comes to mind.

I tried to cut it with about two cups of other spices. No dice.
Can't kill the salt.

Save your money and make your own.

This product becomes available every Easter and I always purchase them for the kids. The description says it all:
"solid milk chocolate bunny made with Cadbury dairy milk"

The two keys words being 'solid' and 'Cadbury'

Cadbury chocolate is amazing, more milky than most other chocolate.

The normal Oregon Chai is good, but if you're more fond of the chai that you get at a certain chain of coffee shops that originate in Seattle, you want this chai.  It has the same tingling, almost burning, sensation that theirs does, and it's much cheaper and more convenient.  Just make sure you pick up a pump as well.

My favorite has been the Tazo Organic, which is a little spicier I believe than the Tazo Original Chai. My understanding is that Starbuck's uses the Tazo Organic.

I tried the Extra Spicy Oregon Chai because the price of Tazo Organic concentrate went very high, from $24 to $40 for a 6 pack, well above retail. I cannot get it locally.

This stuff is super concentrated. I use 2 ounces to make 14 ounces. The package recommends 3 ounces for 16, and that is fine, though perhaps a little spicy. I am pleased that I get a great cup of Chai for a relatively low price. It is costing $0.76 for the concentrate per cup plus the cost of the milk. I took the every 6 month automatic shipping option to save 15% ($15).

To me, at this concentration, it is very similar to the Tazo Organic Chai. In fact, I recently had a Starbuck's Chai, and I actually preferred my home made stuff to theirs.

This exact product is used at all of the high end coffee houses around here. The taste is very authentic and filled with flavor. The extra spicy has more of a ginger and cardamon taste than the regular chai in this brand. Personally, I grew up on home brewed chai so, for me, this is as close to that as I have tasted and I have tried all of the concentrates available to the public. A 64 ounce jug of concentrate will make 32, ten ounce chais. Of course you can add more or less concentrate to taste. But the recommended ratio is 5:1. As you can see, you can save lots of $$$$. At the prices that you pay around here for chais, I have paid for the jug after 5 chais!

When I traveled to Boston late last summer, the ex and I planned to serve margaritas as a prelude to several dinners for family and friends. We bought the tequila and the triple sec, and I brought along a large bag of coarse sea salt. For the limes, I suggested that she buy two 16-ounce bottles of Realime, rather than us doing all that washing, cutting, and juicing of dozens of the real things.

That was a major mistake. On the first night, the cocktails were bitter and insipid. We raced out the next day to buy some real limes for the other dinners.

This product is probably fine if a recipe calls for a quarter teaspoon of lime juice, or if you want a splash of lime on your broiled or pan-fried fish. But don't use it when lime juice is a principal ingredient. Bite the bullet and juice the real thing.

This seasoning is without a doubt the best I've ever come across - and the most versatile. It can be used on veges, potatoes, salads, beef, pork, chicken, fish and probably lots of things I've forgotten to mention. The flavor is robust yet does not overwhelm the food it's used on. What more can be said? Love it!Weber Grill Seasoning, Roasted Garlic Herb, 2.75-Ounce (Pack of 6)

This is one of the most delicious fruit strips I've ever had. Fruit strips are one of my favorite healthy sweet-tooth snacks & I buy a variety of brands. These have much more flavor than the Stretch Island, but are incredibly more expensive, so more of a occasional treat. They do also have quite a lot more Vitamin C than the Stretch Island at the same calorie count, so they are more healthy - but there are only ten per box.

If you love this candy, then go ahead and buy this package. If you have no idea what this tastes like, don't bother. I bought a case because the price of the case versus each pack of candy worked out to much less than what I would pay at the store. The product was fresh and tasted even better than the ones that sit in vending machines for weeks.

My only complaint/concern is that I ordered for this product in the middle of a heat wave, and consequently the little jelly candies had melted or burst a little in the bag, so they stuck together. Other than that, it just gave me a reason to eat them sooner.

This is a good idea to buy if you want some Halloween candy or something to pack with your lunch as a little dessert.
This is a very sweet candy.  It doesn't taste much like Starburst except for the flavor choices, strawberry, cherry, lemon and orange.

I ordered several boxes of Starburst candies from this business because their website site said "free shipping" for orders over $80. Soon thereafter, I received an email from them saying my order has been cancelled(no explanation why). I go back to their website afterwards and noticed that the price for these candies had risen by $4 per box. Guess they thought they weren't making enough money off of me. I won't be ordering from them again because I don't trust them. Who knows if you will get your order or not. Sorry fellows, but you won't stay in business doing stuff like this.

Keep up the good work. This is the best pepper sauce ever,not to hot but has a definate kick with great flavor. The best ever. We've used this for years(a gift from a child who traveled). So glad to find a place to purchase it.

I too have been a devoted fan of The Pepper Plant Hot Pepper Sauce for years. True, it has a spicy hot flavor - but the hotness never overpowers the wonderful flavor this sauce emparts. Terrifically versatile, I've used it on beef and chicken - even in soups! So if you're looking for a hearty, rich-flavored sauce with a hotness that won't melt your molars, give this one a taste. You won't be sorry.

Truly exceptional.

My husband and I love this stuff!  We tried it for the first time about 10 years ago at a small steakhouse in central California.  We have kept it in our fridge ever since.  We used to be able to buy it in the grocery stores in California, but since moving to Arizona we now purchase it online.  We love it with grilled New York steaks.

I first tried this sauce at Nepenthe in Big Sur and absolutely loved it.  I bought a small bottle there, and that was quickly gone once I got home.  I was thrilled to find that I could order it online!  I bought 6 large bottles and went through them in a few months.  Luckily, I was back in CA again a few weeks ago and brought home more large bottles.  But, I know I'll be done with those soon and will order online again!  Also, I'm not the only one that thinks so highly of this sauce.  Everyone that tries it in my house loves it!  Note that I like the other sauces, but don't love them as I do this original one.

I have been using this stuff for over 14 years. Yes that's right over 14 years. I try others but nothing and I mean nothing even comes close to Pepper Plant. I moved from Ca to FL and was really bummed when I could not find this here. I had my mom send me 6 bottles every 3 months till I found it online. Now I buy it by the case. It's got some kick but wont burn your tongue out of your head and has tons of taste( will make your tongue lick your lips looking for more). I have yet to find anything that this does not taste good on. If you want a pepper sauce then look at nothing else cause this is what you have been looking for. Every person I have let try this has swapped over and this is the sauce they all use now. I don't even want to think about them ever stopping making this stuff. Life would just not taste the same.

The best hot sauce you will ever find. I live in Ft Worth Texas, and I always have my father ship me this hot sauce whenever I need it(he lives in San Jose) Now that I can buy it online, I never run out!!! Its a bit expensive here on amazon, but if you look around, you can buy it directly from the manufacturer. You will have to buy it by the case though (12- 10oz bottles) but its well worth it if you use it as much as I do.

I discovered this hot sauce in a small cafe in Big Sur on my way back from Mendocino on my motorcycle.  I usually use the green Tabasco but gave this a try.  I now use 1 bottle minimum per week.  I love mexican food so it goes great with burritos and such.  I now buy 1 dozen at a time.

You really need to try this Pepper Plant Sauce. You can have it with any type of meat or you can add it to almost anything and mix. I really don't like hash browns but I add a little Peper Plant and I eat then all. It's really great stuff, wish more restaurants would have Papper Plant on hand over any other steak sauce

I first had this wonderful concoction on a breakfast table in Carmel California.  It is a wonderful addition to any egg dish and particularly on omelete's.  Mildly spicy hot with underlying taste of roasted peppers.  I've been buying it in Gilroy California for years until the store closed. This is the perfect online source, and the price is exactly the same.  You won't be dissapointed.  Their Chipotle is milder but also a beautiful sauce for steaks with a slight garlic flavor along with mild peppers.

There is a reason this pepper sauce has garnered nothing but 5-star ratings. It can't be beat. We first encountered this product at the Wagon Wheel in Carmel Valley. It is terrific on eggs and fried potatoes. Fortunately, they were also selling it, so we purchased a bottle to try at home and we have never stopped buying it.

Living in Southern Cal, we have not found a source in this area, but it is plentiful in the Central Coast and Northern Cal areas. We buy it by the case directly from the producer at a great price.

We recommend sticking with the Original California Style. Have tried the other variations, but the Original is the best. It has plenty of zip, but does not overwhelm your taste buds with heat. The focus is on flavor.

i first tried this hot sauce at a wonderful restaurant on a trip to San Luis Obispo and was immediately hooked!  I desperately asked the waitress where i can find it, contemplated stealing the bottle but thought better of it, and she told me they sell it at Vons!!!  So i picked up a couple bottles of different flavors, and they were spent in just over a months time!  It has that nice peppery flavor that often gets masked with too much spice, when compared to other hot sauces.  The flavor comes out, not just the heat, making this my favorite hot sauce!!!  I like to have it on hard boiled eggs mixed with mustard, i use with any marinade as well to add some heat.

I love this stuff. I first encountered this sauce at "The Lucky Cafe" in Sacramento, CA and couldn't find any where I now live in Oregon. This stuff is available through an amazon affiliate Taylors Market (great people). Go get some and you will swoon.

I order this for my husband and he absolutely loves it.  Anyone who eats with us and tries this sauce loves it as well.  I have ordered before from Taylor's Market and will do so again.  They always arrive quickly and the bottles are well packed.

The Pepper Plant Original California Style Hot Pepper Sauce

It's spicy but doesn't burn. My family is hooked, and we put it on everything. Try it on grilled fish for something a little different.

I first discovered Pepper Plant when I was living in Northern California and since then I have relocated to Southern California and now Marietta, Gerogia and each place I have had cases of Pepper Plant shipped to me. This the best hot sauce because of it's flavor and consistancy. It has a thick consistancy, so it doesn't run all over everything, stays were you put it on your food. Eggs, Stews, Bloody Mary's and on meats is all good.

We discovered this sauce, the Original California Hot Sauce, while staying at a hotel on Monterey Bay in Sand City, CA in September 2008. We loved it as soon as we tried it. Brought a bottle home and now it's history. Glad to see we can buy more and enjoy our little taste of California again and again.

This sauce isn't like other hot sauces where you get an intense burn, it has a nice heat tingle and great taste. We have never tasted a sauce similar to this so we have nothing to compare it too. Try this sauce and we are sure that it will be one of your favorites too.

We have been using this stuff for years even though we have to buy it online. We buy it by the 12 pack and like the other reviewers, it is a staple here - almost it's own food group. For the best nachos - lay out a bunch of Mission Tortilla strips in a toaster (about an inch high), with a "healthy" amount of shreaded cheese on top - toast one cycle, then sprinkle the sauce over the top. The best.

This hot sauce has a complex flavor that goes with just about everything. I particularly like it with broccoli in cheese sauce! I've also had it on pork chops and buffalo chicken. It's zesty without being a wallop of peppery heat. Highly recommended!

This hot pepper sauce maybe among the best in the market !!
Excellent with meats , seafood.

I tasted this at the Olive Pit in Corning, CA on an olive burger this summer and I couldn't get over it.  I eat a lot of hot sauce and I believe this is the best I've ever tasted.  It is now a staple in my fridge.
Oh man!  There is not much to be said about this sauce apart from Wow!  The Pepper Plant Hot Sauce - 'Practically Perfect Hot Pepper Sauce' - does anyone have a straw?

I've been using Pepper Plant ever since I attended Cal Poly on the Central CA coast in the late 90's. I usually order it now in bulk and pass it along to friends. Every single one of them has become a convert and we are all addicted! I'm not sure I could live without this sauce. It is amazing on nachos, breakfast burritos, in chilis, you name it!

For those of you that may be a little timid to try a "hot sauce"; this is definitely the sauce to try! It is spicy, but the flavor is so full and bold that you'll forget about the "hot."

I would recommend this product to anyone wanting to try a hot sauce. It really is the best sauce on the market.

This is the most flavorful sauce with great consistency.  Not watery or vinegary.  Could almost be used as a thin salsa, but it is great on eggs, burgers, and anything else you might put hot sauce on.  I buy it by the case now.

I tried this sauce at a restaurant and was immediately hooked. The sauce is no ordinary hot sauce. It does pack a little bit of spice, but what really does it for me is the hints of garlic. A good purchase to add to anyone's hot sauce collection.

This hot sauce is most unlike any other sauce I have ever had. It is chunky and thick and really a cross between a hot sauce and a salsa. The flavor is phenomenal. It is to "too hot" but has enough kick and flavor to make just about anything taste better. There is just enough garlic in the sauce that you can taste it, without garlic dominating the taste. I use it more like most people would use ketchup. It's great on eggs, omlets, pizza, or even pasta.  I just wish they had a slightly larger bottle. I go through about a bottle every 1-2 weeks!

I was recently gifted my first bottle of the Pepper Plant Original CA style hot sauce. Good garlicy/chili nose when opening the bottle. The chili flavor is very present (2-star heat), followed by the garlic. Balanced "heat" & flavors. Not too vinegary or salty. It reminds me of a "Southwest Sriracha". Makes a good everyday table sauce.

This has to be my favorite type of hot pepper sauce. The problem with it is that I go through it too fast! Some people might find it to be too salty compared to other hot pepper sauces, but I enjoy it and wouldn't change a thing about it. It has the perfect blend of spice and heat, and goes great on everything. Do yourself a favor and give it a whirl!
Hands down my favorite sauce, especially for Mexican food, eggs and stews. It has become a staple in our kitchen.

Taylor's Market is the best.  This product is versatile and a medium heat.  Goes so well with odd things, like baked potatoes, fresh trout w/lemon and pepper, nachoes, chicken wings galore, barbecued hamburgers.

I love hot, and I love this great tasting Pepper Sauce.  I can't buy it in the store in Reno, so I buy it online!  I went through my first bottle in 2 weeks because it's great on everything!  I am buying and giving to my friends and family as well.  We are hooked, and wish I could buy it in the grocery store because I can only buy it when I'm buying something else from Amazon, because I refuse to pay more for shipping than I do the product!  It would be 5 stars if the shipping were free!
I use this prod on chicken,burritos,eggs it has a great taste cant get enough of it you should try it for your self.

The product is awesome, I moved out of California and could not purchase it where I currently live.  My husband loves it so I was so thrilled to find I could order it on Amazon.  I gave him a case for his birthday.
Since my daughter moved to the east coast - she can't find her favorite hot sauce!  So - Amazon supplied the means of getting it to her - and she says it is great as always!

I love me my hot sauces, but I am often disappointed by sauces that go for pure spicy kick at the expense of flavor. This sauce, however, has the most amazing balance of spice and flavor of any sauce I have ever tried. A little tart, but not too vinegary. A little smoky, but doesn't taste like it had artificial smoke flavor added. Good amount of spice warms the tongue but doesn't kill the taste of the rest of the sauce, or the food. Although I've lived in California my whole life, I only discovered this stuff recently, but I am committed to keeping it around my kitchen from here on out.

Being from the central coast Pepper Plant sauce is EVERYwhere. On most restaurant tables, stores, etc. I love it. I make a wicked carnitas style pork using just pepper plant sauce and my crock pot. It's also really good on chicken. If you think the original sauce is good, try the Garlic version. It's supreme! and makes yummy buffalo style chicken wings!

I'm not generally a fan of hot sauces.  However, when I initially came across this in a diner I gave it a sniff, and it smelled promising.  It was quite good with my steak that morning.  Now that I have it at home, I will admit it's a touch salty, but the flavor is quite savory in comparison to your run-of-the-mill hot sauces.

We first tried this sauce in July when we stopped for lunch at Big Sur, as we drove down the coast road. I was amazed at the unique taste. It is rich, a little bit spicy, and unlike any other pepper sauce I've tried (I love salsas). We bought a couple bottles for home, but they didn't last long. This stuff goes great with eggs, chicken, vegetables, etc. I've never seen it in a local store in southern California, and wasn't planning another central Cal drive, so I was very happy to find it available online. I ordered it with a couple other items from Taylor's market. On my first order, they made a mistake on one of the items, but told me to just keep the mistake and then quickly sent the correct item.

The California Style Hot Pepper Sauce is perfect for my palate. It is not industrial strength hot but a perfect blend of taste and spice easy to enjoy. Unless you insist on "napalm in a bottle" you will like the middle of the road flavor.

This is not for the faint at heart. Use sparingly till you find how much you can tolerate. Trust me its extremely hot. One note.... the after taste is a bit different. I wouldnt call it bitter. Maybe call it a dull taste. I have found that the dull taste disappears if used with other strong flavors ( not nessesarily hot ones) Those additional flavors mask that kind of dull taste of the Ghost Chile flakes. Curry or Cumon are great spices to use with the flakes. Good luck.... check your will before your try this!!!!
Just licking the dust off of the freshness seal set my mouth on fire! These aren't the sissy hot pepper flakes you find at a pizza shop.
This is a great Hot pepper  the Ghost pepper has a unique flavor other than just being hot  and the heat creeps up on you after a little while

I have an extremely picky yorkshire terrier, and he goes nuts over these treats. I have his full attention during training if I use these.

One comment: the treats are too big for my dog (he is four pounds). I broke them up with a hammer to make them small enough. On the positive side, that means that one bag lasts forever.
I have two Bichons and they absolutely loved these.  I gave four stars because I wish the price was lower.  With two dogs one package doesn't last long at one a day.
We found that cutting up the sticks and add them to our dog's wet dog food for dinner she will eat them.

We have purchased this product before from the same seller (AWORLDOFPUPS) and received a wonderful dog treat that was soft enough to break into multiple treat size pieces. My puppies absolutely loved them. We ordered another batch when we quickly ran out and this time we received very hard, dry sticks that would snap in half with a great deal of pressure but did not appear to be safe enough for my 20lb puppies to eat. We did give them one half of a treat each and were amazed at how LONG it took them to chew threw this small piece of treat. These are dogs that usually can chew through anything quite quickly. I held off writing a negative review until I heard back from the company. However their policy is that I must pay for the shipping on the return and I can not return anything opened. After numerous emails back and forth they appear to be unconcerned (at least they have not commented on) the fact that this particular bag appears to be defective and unsafe for consumption. The lamination on the bag itself arrived peeling. Upon closer inspection the product is made in China so the lack of quality control is not surprising, however the lack of concern and willingness to take responsibility by the seller is. We will be looking for new treats elsewhere. We are very disappointed; the first batch we received was great. I'm giving two stars instead of one because the first bag was fantastic as were the other treats in the same collection.

This took an extremly long time to get after I ordered it, but my puppy absolutely loves them, and they are very healthy for her bone and joint development! Less likly to choke on the sticks they are softer than the jerky, but she loves all the Loving Pet products, even the jerky, but reccomend keeping a close eye on them with the jerky. Great all natural product line!

Package claims these treats are soft, marketing towards very young and senior dogs.
I used the treat as a back up hammer!!!!! Three different packages, all with the same results.
I expected "Gourmet Treats" were just that, based on the cost.....Buyer beware!!!!

This is a deep, rich coffee that holds up with the largest cup sizing. Not bitter. And I like to brew this on the smallest size to make espresso as its strong enough to be be an easy, passable espresso.

When I first opened the bottle it smelled medicinal. I added it to some iced tea and it tasted just like it smelled, very medicinal and only a trace of fruit flaver. I ordered 2 other flavors and they're the same. I gave it an extra star because service is good, but I can't recommend the extract.

If I could give this no stars - that is how I would rate it.  Called extract, but is, in fact, artificial.  Misleading information - no indication in the detail that this is an artificial flavoring - be warned.  Only realised when I actually received the item.  Learn by my mistake.

I ordered primarily peach(16oz) bottle to make ice tea. It had very little peach flavor, and smelled like propylene glycol(the agent they use to carry the flavor.) I added an ounce of flavoring to 1 gal and still didnt get a peach flavor to the tea.The other 3 flavors were also very poor quality. They definitely are not"extracts", so I returned them all.
This product arrived quickly and in good condition.  The flavor is definitely peach and I use it to flavor my tea.
This product worked out so good for me!  I was making Peach Butter and need a little more peach flavor ... fantastic!

These are great candy bars. We can't usually get them on the West Coast, here in CA, so that is why I ordered some online. They are my husband's favorite. I got him the box for Christmas. The price was good and the candy is fresh and delicious. I definitely will buy from this seller again and recommend them.

I would like to thank you for having my favorite childhood candy, Zagnut.  It has been more years than I care to say that I have had Zagnut.  I got my 26 year old nephew and 15 year old niece to like the Zagnut.  I had seen the candies from the time of my parents and unfortunately neither are here to have me order the candy for them.  I plan on ordering more Zagnut and other products from Amazon.
This is the best coconut juice I have ever had, great taste, natural.  No sugar added.  I drink this coconut juice after yoga practice and during my long driving time.

I like the clean sweet flavor of this coconut juice. No off flavor aftertaste. I've probably tried 90% of all coconut waters commercially available in the United States. I usually rate them by garbage, bad, okay, and superior. This coconut water would fall under the superior category.

I purchased these for our overweight dog based on vet's recommendation.  Cut back on food and give her green bean's as a filler.  (Who knew dogs love green beans)?  I paid about $.60 a can!  Don't think you can beat that price and UPS puts them right at your front door!
Every can in the case looked as if it had been drop kicked and thrown. Had I known this would be the condition I never would have purchased it.
Upon reading the reviews for this product, I was excited to try them. I was sadly disappointed. The honey sesame roast tasted burned. I was not impressed with any of the varieties.
I think sassafras is very underrated.  This candy is very good.  If you like sassafras and / or rootbeer I highly recommend that you try this.

These are great, the perfect size and gluten free. I keep one with me always for those times when you feel like you're going to kill someone if you don't get some food soon. Preventing murders everywhere. Deliciously.

My daughter is 1 year old and LOVES these! She can't get enough. Perfect size for her and great as a snack to take on the road. My only complaint is that they are very sticky and when I break off pieces for her, if she drops any of it, it STICKS. So I have little bits of theses bars stuck all over the place, but she loves them so we keep buying them!

Junior size Bumble bars are just right to stave off an energy drop. Fewer calories and great flavors.
I carry these with me all the time.
My three year old daughter loves these.  I eat the larger ones and I got these smaller ones for her.  They are a perfect size for her tummy.  She thinks they are cookies!
I have been a fan of Bumble Bars for several years.  The smaller junior size is very convenient and quite nice as an afternoon snack.
Wow, these got stuck between every tooth in my mouth but were very tasty and amazingly filling for how small they are.  Brush well and they are good.
My little yorkie loves this food. He has allergies, and when he eats this food they seem to improve. I do have to crush them into smaller pieces for him though.
This was a gift to my brother-in-law.  A true New Yorker where pepperoni wins hands down.  Have not heard from him yet but I am sure the product is good.  Arrived in a fast manner and well packed.
Really good , has a different taste then most, could see how many people wouldn't like it. Yes i really like it.

It started in middle school, everytime we went on a class trip I got a bag of circus peanuts for the ride. Twenty years later, it is a C-stop necessity! They are just as I remember, chewy and chock full of sugar. Sathers is the only!

Not as good as Bigelow Fruit & Almond. It tasted more like apple than anything else. Also this is a loose tea but in one part of the description it mentioned bags. I have the stainless loose tea thing so I had no issue w/ it being loose. Just not as Almond tasting as Bigelow which you have to buy in bulk from Bigelow directly now.

We ordered this arrangement and it was beautiful. Great colors, fresh flowers and delivered early in the day so the recipient could enjoy all day long. Excellent service.  Will definitely keep using this seller in the future.

I was so happy with the flowers that arrived today for my aunt. The flowers were so beautiful! I received updates consistently so I didn't even have to follow up. The flowers got there at exactly the right time. I couldn't be happier with my order. Flowers - Fields of Europe Arrangement - Large

1-800-flowers.com RUINED A 90TH BIRTHDAY gift!! I ordered flowers on Tuesday for a Friday delivery for Mom's 90th birthday party.  Due to health issues my husband and I were unable to travel so we ordered a flower arrangement that was made to look like a birthday cake with candles.  The ad listed the flowers as available for next day delivery so I assumed that meant something like this was kept on hand.  I ordered the arrangement 3 days in advance just to make sure (or so I thought) they would be there!  I looked at several flower sites and we liked the colors and flowers of this arrangement the best.  My brothers and sisters were giving Mom a party at the apartment complex where she lives so since we couldn't be there I thought this would at least let them know we were there in spirit.  I got a call Friday afternoon from customer service telling me the flowers could not be delivered.  They said they could delivery some flowers Saturday, but not the flowers I had originally ordered.  I ordered 3 days ahead of time!!  You would think if they weren't available they would call prior to the day they were supposed to be delivered?  That way I could have made other arrangements.  I would have even considered picking out something different if that meant getting them there ontime.  The site says "100% satisfaction guaranteed".  I am not at all satisfied because what good is it to have flowered delivered the day after you need them???  They are supposedly crediting my credit card but they didn't know how long that would take.  I will definitely be writing more if that doesn't happen.  I have bought many many flowers online and never had a problem until now.  I am very dissatisfied with 1-800-flowers.com and will make sure everyone I come in contact with will know they are not reliable to get flowers there ontime!

"My experience with the seller was outstanding. The arrangment arrived the day I had chosen, and my mother was both surprised and thrilled to receive such a beautifully creative arrangement. The flowers were very fresh and plentiful for the price. I will definitely order from this seller again!"

I've ordered this arrangement many times for a number of people including; mother, step-mother, Grandma, aunts, father, people recovering from operations.  They all say the same thing: it's beautiful.

3 orders not one of them good! First roses sent to me (day after my 2 orders), mailed to me even though there are florist who work with them in town. 110 degree heat the boxed flowers have no moisture inside - no water caps or even moist towelettes just cut flowers open on the ends with a plastic open wrap around the top. Well they were wilted, brown and gross! Smelled of MOLD! Called they fed ex'd another batch, mold free but tired looking never really looked any better after water. Local grocery store better flowers at 1/3 cost! 2nd order I made for relative. Days later got a call that they can't fill the order as requested, made changes to order supposed to get gift certificate for the problem. Just found out the order never arrived - from the intended recipient! Called them, all of the sudden emails arrive (while i'm on the phone) saying they have a problem and I need to contact them (after the delivery date) the emails have a date stamp when they were sent but the typed in date was days before - really?! How moronic, I can tell when you sent the email - it has a date stamp! Anyway they claim they tried to call and left messages - I have caller ID and voice mail - THEY DID NOT CALL! So no flowers for my relative oh but they will mail something (of their choosing) out today for them - gee thanks late and lame Hope it's not a funeral wreath. They missed the b-day so now it just doesn't matter anymore. Plus that gift coupon for $20 they were 'emailing' oh well now when I ask where that is - oh well I guess we mailed it and you will get it in about 6 weeks. Seriously??? How are you sending it? Pony express?? Is someone walking it to me?? They failed, lied and tried to make it look like they did what they said. Unbelievable! Oh but we are not done... Order number 3 (made at same time as order 2) I though i better ask if that one delivered ok...they say 'What order?' They claim they have no order. It's on the same receipt as the previous one - paid the same time. They totally missed that one but they won't even refund my money until I send them a copy of my receipt. MY RECEIPT? Are you serious, they don't have a record of it ? I paid with paypal, they have that and with the order number they should have the original full order that includes all this mess we have been dealing with for the other one. Never in my life has a national company so screwed up - repeatedly. The only orders these morons can get right are the ones that actually make it to a good local florist then anything that goes right is the florist not 1-800-flowers.
Do yourself a HUGE favor - find the nearest florist or floral department in a store (many will deliver), call them and place your order - any online map service or phone service will help you. Do not ever use 1-800-flowers!!!

I ordered the large version of Fields of Europe, the orange rose version. While the flowers are "close" I really didn't want pink roses. If I wanted pink roses I would have ordered that bouquet instead. I was hoping for something that really popped of summer, not a springy love bouquet. For the price, they should send you what you order and not just make it up and hope for the best. I've ordered lots of flowers through 1800flowers and I think from now on I will find someone else! Just disappointed that something that cost $75 would come looking closer to what I was wanting.

FALSE advertisement alert!  Amazon deal for $15 voucher for $30 credit at 1800Flowers, does not list the $20 service fee!!!!!! This company does not offer full disclosure of billing.  Use with caution!!!

I ordered the 50 blossom rose bouquet for my husband's birthday.  The flowers arrived on time, but in poor condition.  They were tiny, dried out, and several of the buds had fallen off the stems.  I'd have done better at the local supermarket.

I have been feeding this to my sled dogs for about 6 years now. They all have done great on this. Packed full of nutrition so they don't need to eat a lot and they maintain a good body weight. I would recommend this product for any sporting dog.

We purchase the small cans to give our fussy dog just the right size serving for breakfast. I worry that this company might change their formula one day. Tip for fussy dogs? Start with this product or a treat and then see if REX will switch to a top dry food. Our dog eats this and then wants something else because he is still hungry (OK, yes, I did switch to dinner). Keep mixing the variety for REX, the spoiled. and even offer a few different dry selections to MR. FUSSY. Do not try to just feed Mr. Fussy duck. Mix it up.

I love this brand of chews for my Shih Tzu. They do not come apart easily so she really just chews on one for hours. Other brands that I have purchased in the past break apart and she chokes on them. Some other brands she actually tries to swallow whole, but not with these. She just chews on them and bites off little pieces at a time. I will not give her any other raw hide chews. These are the best.

I live with about 1000mg a day of sodium in my diet.  It is crucial that I stay within my limits or else I suffer the consequences the next day and it's not pretty.  Mrs. Dash seasoning, especially the Fiesta Lime, I've found is one of the best seasonings I've come across so far.  Light, spicy and flavorful.  Try it you'll like it.

I got hooked on these babies when I was stationed in Japan 40 years ago.  They are addictive....  Try them once and you will be hooked.  The delivery was quick and the product was as advertised.  I would buy from this vendor again.
baked, tastes like shrimp, and so much better then a regular potatoe chip, they're extremely addicting so be warned. But they taste amazing and go really well as a side with some ramen.

These are great when you are looking for something other than your average potato chip. They aren't too greasy and they are full of flavor. Add a  Ramune drink (Japanese soft drink...I like the lychee fruit flavor) and you've got a delicious snack!

Two good things are apparent about these snacks right away, they arent round like the typical chip, but are more shaped like 'fries' making them easier to eat; and you can clearly taste the shrimp flavor but it's more delicate than some snacks, so the taste is not over whelming or too salty- even though there is some MSG included on the ingredient list.  The consistancy is also quite nice, there is a crunch to them, but the chips arent so hard as if you're chewing glass or some foreign matter; eating these won't make sensitive teeth hurt. They also come in a four ounce bag; enough to satisfy but not make you feel bloated and easy to count calories if you care about such things.  If you like your snacks with a seafood taste there really isn't a downside to this brand.  Enjoy.  Hope this helps.
It's hard for me to limit myself to one bag per day. Extremely good tasting and a bag feels as if you are eating more than four oz. Hard to describe the taste but much better than potato chips.

I was debating on whether to share my first bar with a friend because I wasn't so hungry at the time.  We were in a walmart waiting in line to purchase the delicious Kinder Bueno.  Upon hearing our dilemma, the lady waiting in line in front of us told us that it was imperative that we get our own bars because there wasn't enough in one bar to share.  Based on her persistence, we both got our own bars and have never looked back since.  Thank you Kinder Bueno!

We got a 6oz sample in the mail. We use them as treats for our 10 pound, 13 year old miniature fox terrier. She still eats them like they are kibble crack. The best thing was there were NO digestive issues adding them to her diet, no getting sick in any way. And I really like the idea that they are lower in calorie as well as nutritious. We give her 1/2 a cup a day and also 1/2 a cup of wet dog food.
