When I poured out my pasta what had been an entire pack had turned into about 1/2 cup. So much for a family meal that I could participate in without having to eat special food. I will never buy Heartland products again.

Quite random but I found this pasta by a woman who told me in the gluten free section about how this pasta tastes and doesn't have any sort of gluten-free like texture.  We've bought Tinkyada brand for quite some time and still like the spinach and that bit of gritty texture but Heartland's pasta has been our regular go-to pasta these days.  It's very smooth, can't really tell it's gluten free and cooks fairly quickly.  I'm assuming it's becoming popular as often times we only see few in left at the store so we've decided to just buy them in bulk!  Highly recommended pasts if you miss that traditional starchy gluten pasta :)

This is the best gluten free pasta that i have found in the two and a half years that i have been gluten free. i really enjoy that i can bring it and cook it without it being known that it is gluten free. This tastes almost identical to regular pasta. this is also the cheapest pasta that i have found. i originally found it at a super walmart and the other day i saw it at hannfords which is closer. i love this along with the penne and the fusilli as well. I would recommend this product to anyone who is starting or already been on a gluten free diet.

I had someone visiting that requires a gluten  free diet . I make a mean marinara sauce so I ordered this pasta So that she could try it .  I personally enjoyed it immensely and could not believe it wasn't the real thing . Not only that, but I did not feel full or bloated after two bowls of it. I think I'm going to replace my pasta with this product because it taste so good and feels so good when I'm done eating.  It took exactly the same cooking time as regular pasta and my friend was surprised that the usual gluten free pasta characteristics did not exist with this product Like gooey and stickiness. I would highly recommend this product even if you don't Require the gluten free diet. Another point is as a leftover it was just as good which I understand is not true with Gluten free pasta.

This pasta is great for Gluten free! There is no film when cooking it and it tastes no different than wheat pasta. My only regret is the cost when buying it on Amazon. The only other carrier is Super Walmart and there is not one close to me so unless I want to travel for it this is the best alternative.

This is by far the best gluten free spaghetti!  The taste and texture is EXACTLY like regular spaghetti!  You also cook it exactly like regular spaghetti.  Even thought only my 9 year old has Celiacs and cannot eat gluten, we all love Heartland Gluten Free spaghetti and eat it too!  Thank goodnes this product is easily available at Walmart or on Amazon.com!

I'm trying to eat healthier and I eat a lot of pasta but this is almost inedible. The pasta dissolves in the boiling water and makes a big mushy mess. I tried adding my sauce to it, but the combination is terrible. I won't be purchasing this brand again. I had high hopes.
Great taste, texture, flavor, and works well with any sauce! Wonderful pricing, too! Gluten free products are so expensive normally! Definitely recommend this!

So greatful for Heartland pastas. They are the best ones I've found! My husband, who does not need to eat gluten free, will enjoy these with me! They are not great for reheating but few things are. Thank you sooooo much!

Since I have had to go gluten free a year ago, I have missed the taste of "real" spaghetti!
I have tried nearly all the GF kinds of spaghetti, and though they were alright, they were still not the same. But I recently bought this, and I thought I was not eating gluten free! I had to double check the package to make sure I made the right thing! It was same in texture and taste! Only I had NO reaction to them like I would a gluten pasta! It was FABULOUS!
I will forever buy only this kind of spaghetti!

I fixed this pasta a few days ago with a meat sauce, honestly, there was no difference in taste & texture and it warmed up beautifully. My son ate the last of it two days after I made it and he said it was delicious. We don't own a microwave either so he had to warm it in a pan. It held together as well as regular pasta. Found mine at Walmart and the price was reasonable.

My husband and I loved this pasta. It was our first experience with gluten free and we really could not tell the difference. In fact it might even have better than regular pasta. Also we didn't have the heartburn that usually accompanies pasta. I am thrilled that I don't have to give up pasta because I can't eat wheat. I highly recommend this product!

We were introduced to this brand at a high-end restaurant.
The secret is apparently that the primary ingredient in corn rather than rice.
No more mushy GF pasta. Incredible!
The Heartland Gluten Free dried pastas are great....much better than the brand the stores in this area sell.  I've requested them to stock it, but hope to find it available here on Amazon too.

Purchased these noodles when our family was put on a gluten free diet.  Thankful to find a alternative to wheat noodles I can not express my great disapointment.  The noodles became mushy and break down very badly.  While cooking a package for dinner I carefully watched and stirred the noodles as they shrunk in my pan.  In fear that there would not be enough noodles from this one package to feed my famiy of 4 (both of my children a small and do not eat large portions)  I put on a second pot and started cooking an additional bag of pasta.  By the time they were cooked and serve My husband and two chilren received a 1/4 cup of noodles and I received none.  They were gone it was like they shrank.  Not only were there not enough noodles, they were mushy.  I actually took every bag I had left in the pantry and returned them to the store, I have found the Tinkayana brand to be a much better pasta for the gluten free families.
I've tried this a couple of time and both times the noodle just fell apart.  The taste was rather sweet, not like regular pasta.  Now searching for some better pasta substitute.

this is the best cocoa i've had. way better than anything you can find at the supermarket, and even better than the other highly rated cocoas i tried from amazon.. also dissolves in water really easily and makes amazing hot chocolate (you can find recipes online - once you start making it from scratch you'll never buy the pre-mixed stuff again).
This is one of the few organic & pure cocoa powders out there. The price is competitive comparably. Whenever I am running low, I re-order this terrific product.
I've used it in two cakes that were raved over. The wide mouth top allows easy access for a 1/2 cup measuring cup, less mess.  Neat cocoa is a plus.
Good product and good price.  It seems a bit "fluffier" than some other brands and so I wonder if you get less weight by volume.  That said, I'd order this again.

I mix the whey protein isolate with grined un-hulled organic sesame seed, organic flax seed, Now Foods organic cocoa, organic soy milk...  The mix is great without any stories... I used to eat dark chocolate before and now I get all the antioxidants with the sugar and calories in my mix before surfing, weight lifting, mountain biking... Thanks Now Foods.

This cocoa powder is a very good price and it is super tasty! Very rich and chocolaty and I usually put 2 teaspoons in a mug with hot water and I add cinnamon and agave for a touch of sweetness, but it is good alone too. Delicious in smoothies too, I would definitely recommend this product.

It's difficult to find certified organic cocoa products on the market that are not overly-pricey.  Taste & being organic is important to me, but cost is too! This wins all three! I will purchase this brand again, and I plan to purchase it again from Amazon if the price remains this good!

This Cacao powder is really the best deal you will find. It is not phenomenal in taste but its still really good. I've had better tasting, but as far as the quality goes, im not really sure if the nutrient or antioxidant level between this and others is any better. Like to believe it is the same, especially at the price. Good stuff nonetheless.
wow this is amazing cocoa loved it ,it bakes up like a dream , tastes wonderful there is alot of it . i got it supersaver ,so no shipping,its worth the money
This is wonderful cocoa powder for all your chocolate needs.  It's even more special because it is organic and free of all pesticides and any other harmful chemicals.

This is a very versatile spice and it does add a smoky flavor.  The spice is quality and isnt clumpy or anything like that.  I ordered it because I wanted to make one specific recipe (swiss steak - alton brown), but have experimented on my own where I might want to impart a slight smoky flavor.  Must have in my spice rack from now on.

Kaj's Li Hing King Plum, 22-Ounce Jars (Pack of 2)

These Plums are hard as a rock. Zero Stars.

Extremely pleased with product quality and quantity!!! Great deal!!! Wonderful customer service from seller; promptly replaced lost item when contacted. 5 Star Seller! Will be back for more dried mushrooms in the near future. Thanks for a smooth transaction.

I had bought 2 bags of wood ear mushrooms and I am not sorry, its a lot probably I will be using them for the next 2 years but i like it a lot and I tend to use more than needed because the taste its so awesome. The shipping was fast and I just love the product.

I ordered the cloud ear mushroom and the wood ear mushroom at the same time and am happy I did. These are wonderful for using in just about any receipe that I've tried.
When these are about used up I will be ordering more.

My local supermarket sells one ounce bags of dried woodear mushrooms for four dollars. For a little bit more than twice the price, you get a whole pound. These are not available fresh. I boil some water in the microwave and soak the mushrooms for about 20 minutes. At that point, I use the liquid to fortify my homemade hot and sour soup. Woodear mushrooms expand a lot when rehydrated so you only need a few. I find that its easier to crumble them before rehydrating them.

Angelina's packs these in a plastic bag inside a cardboard box. Four boxes fill a carton and save on shipping charges. I mixed it up and got some OYSTER MUSHROOMS,(DRIED) 1 lb., BOLETES, CHILEAN, FIRST QUALITY,(DRIED) 1 lb. and BLEND, NORTHWOODS,MUSHROOM(DRIED) 1 lb.. I would like to get LOBSTER,MUSHROOM,(DRIED) 1 lb. or Dried Morel Mushrooms 1 Lb. Bag but I can't justify the high price.

I am pleased with all of the products I received from Angelina's and will order again.

Tziganakaya! It was a treasure of flavour. We are pretty good of figuring out ingredients by taste, but this was just Tziganskaya. Delicious but while moderate in price the shipping makes it prohibitive for us. The supermarkets force us all into a center lane of food, which is not bad nor good. This is good, so hard to get.

Each of the different Wat-aah! varieties have themes. I picked up the Power theme at the Natural Foods Expo, and I asked the guy what made it different. He looked a bit stunned, but he pointed out the magnesium in it and then looked at me blankly. That's one of two things wrong with the company's marketing. Everything else is spot on--well, except that they're selling water, and they're selling it to parents who should be making their kids drink water whether they want to or not. But that would require parenting. I digress.

The other thing wrong with this product is the label copy. I don't know what the other bottles say, but I'm guessing kids aren't buying this water, so the label copy SHOULD sell the parents rather than the kids, but I would think the parents would reject the water, based on the copy. The copy explains to kids that they should fight to drink this cool Wat-aah! Power instead of spinach, because of the magnesium, which is apparently the only value in spinach. I digress again. The label even says that spinach "is green and sticks in your teeth" in comparison to the water that "comes in a cool bottle." Right under all of this is a Fight Childhood Obesity logo. Right. So, I'm going to bring something into the house that argues against them eating spinach, AND that helps me fight childhood obesity how? Now, I'm not saying that spinach is the answer, but do I need a company marketing themselves as a substitute for something else that is good for kids? Moreover, how could they think that's a good idea, a selling point to adults with critical thinking skills?

Well, apparently they do. This water is marketed based on its cool bottle. But it's just water and some of the usual "special" stuff that is often in water we buy. It's also marketed to give kids "buying power" with the cartoon front and the spinach argument. Frankly, I'd rather any kid of mine didn't rely on marketing to make a product choice, and oh, guess what: they are kids. They don't get to make the product choices.

The company has somehow made the right connections, gotten the right endorsements, achieved school distribution, and is conducting a social media campaign that is textbook perfect. Too bad they're also selling water and the idea that marketing to kids (and marketing to them in a way that doesn't support eating leafy green vegetables) is a good thing. If it wasn't for the mixed message on the copy, maybe I could accept that it's marketing like sugary cereals do: to the kids. But this product just teaches kids that bottled water is good. It's not a horrible lesson, but parents should be teaching their kids through the parents' buying power--not the kids. When they get a job, they can buy spinach-replacing water. And eat their damn spinach.

Purchased these for my wedding last month.  We put them in the champagne to give the drinks a pretty decoration and a touch of pink blush.  Worked great!  The flowers themselves are tasty (sort of a raspberry rhubarb flavor) and look really pretty.

These flowers are great with prosecco or champagne poured over them in a glass flute.  I had purchased these in a smaller quantity locally but the "bulk" size is a much better value.  They arrived quickly and were as described.

Very lovely flowers, great idea for a wedding shower..... champagne with a hibiscus flower.
Could be used for any special occasion. Would definitely buy this product again.
Wonderful product to make high class drinks wow the crowd amaze you guests . It will be the conversation of every table.
These flowers are great for special occasions, or just for a pick me up when you are enjoying your favorite glass of white wine.  They are beautiful and yummy!

I've tried this out, and honestly it's far more cost effective to pick up some organic (or heck, even regular) peanut butter from the grocery.

I find filling the toys up with the peanut butter & freezing them for 10-15 minutes is an ideal way to keep the fur babies busy.

We bought this just to try it out, and ended up throwing it away after attempting to use it once. This stuff is impossible to squeeze out, and the only reason we were finally able to get anything out of it was because we cut part of the bottom off and squeezed out out of there instead. Pointless. Go with the original stuff in a can, or just get natural peanut butter and use a knife to put it in the kong (thats what we use).
My dogs love it and it is so easy to put in their kongs and or whatever. Easy to use and no mess and my babies love love love it:):)
It smells like our peanut butter jam just that it's more watery. I used a little inside the kong toy and Dasher loves it. It keeps him occupied for a good 30 minutes

I occasionally use this in her Kong - but unless I do it before hand and freeze it, it gets messy. What I frequently use it for is training - instead of giving little training treats that you have to hold, I squeeze a little paste into her mouth. She goes nuts for it so it works great and not messy at all and I don't have to juggle a bag or treats.

So I've used the stuff in the can and I thought of trying this as I determined it was more economical when I bought it on Amazon.  It's a good product, great for squeezing peanut butter in Kongs, though if you are trying to squirt it all the way to the other end of the Kong, this probably won't do the trick.  It's not as easy to use as the squirt can version.  And yes, I know that just using peanut butter out of a jar would be cheaper, but this is so much faster and easier, and has a more viscous consistency the squeezes well so I can get it into the cracks between the dog treats stuffed in the Kong.
The product came in good condition. My dog loves this stuff. It lasts longer when we put a small amount in a Kong and freeze it overnight.

My yorkie is crazy about this peanut butter. We fill his Kong toy up every time we need to leave him in the kitchen and he scarfs it down... The packaging is sturdy, it stays clean and is easy to squeeze out. Great product
My dog loved this "peanut butter" treat, but I put too much inside her Kong toy and it made her vomit.  Just use a tiny amount until you see how your dog's tummy tolerates it.

These nuts were not fresh at all.  I'd give them 0 stars if I could.  I should have known given they sit in a warehouse till they get bought.  Definitely stay away from them.  I would have returned them but we opened them already.

Got them today.  All seem to be great mature natural almonds.  They are not salted or flavored so should be a healthy snack.  I didn't realize how many there would be.  I poured them into sealable containers because they are going to be around for a while.

I love to order this 5 lb bag.  I keep it in the fridge.  Not one bad nut in the bunch.  They are great right out of the bag, but I like to brown them in a cast iron pan with a little butter, cinnamon & Splenda.  I add some of Azar's unsalted macadamias too.  In moderation, these make a nice low carb snack.  My last order was on 2/21/11, it is now 4/04/11 and I am out of almonds.  Waiting for them to come back in stock to re-order.
Was pleasantly surprised to find out not only were theses almonds fresher and better tasting than all the supermarkets and health stores I usually buy them but fast shipping and prompt follow up.
great when roasted for 10-15 minutes at 350 degrees!... don't overdo the roasting...roasting provides a great taste, reduces the moisture content and sweetens the flavor
I bought these for almond milk.  Best price I've found.  They were fresh when I got them.  I store them in the freezer or fridge. They keep for months.  Do wish they were organic, though.

These nuts arrived quickly and were well packaged however are very stale with no crunch. Our family of nut lovers will not touch them and they are just sitting while all the other nuts in the house are gone in a flash. A terrible waste!

I work as a swim instructor at an elementary school and classes are back to back with no time for breaks. I needed a quick healthy snack while I work so I thought about buying these almonds and eat a handful with an orange when I felt hungry. The almonds came in today in a clear bag and tasted great. I know some reviewers said they weren't fresh but they taste really fresh to me. I had an empty 5lb container of protein laying around my room and washed it out and poured all the almonds in there. Almonds are the perfect snack, has protein, carbs, and some healthy fats. Will be buying again.
These almonds arrived in a clear plastic bag and every almond was perfect.  I transfered most to a vacuum container to preserve freshness. I will reorder from this company.

I first ordered these almonds a couple months ago and was very pleased with the product.  When it came time to order more, I unfortunately went with another supplier that was running a sale. The other company's product was stale and taste was off, and I couldn't wait to get through the other almonds so I could order from Azar again.  Now just ordered my 3rd bag and couldn't be happier with the quality.  Bag is easily vacuum resealed with a Food Saver if you have one.
The almonds arrived quickly, nice big bag of good fresh almonds.  Lots go into brownies, and a few days back I put some in fruitcakes, one of which we are already eating and is very tasty!
First time ordering almonds from internet.  I would say about 80% of the almonds are very stale, they do not taste fresh at all
These almonds are just wonderful!  Very fresh and crisp.  They are the perfect addition to the trail mix I am making.  They are a great snack too.

This Product arrived on time.
The quality was better than what I would get at the local grocery store(s), and price better that them of course.
Would buy again

There are a lot of nuts in this bag.  They are good.  Bought from Amazon and I didn't have any bad ones.  I ate on them for days until I finally got so sick of almonds that I threw the rest in the trash.  I probably had 80% of the bag left.  It has been about 6 months and I never want to see another almond again.  5 Stars, but I won't buy again.

My son truly enjoys this product.  He is 17 and has a cup of french vanilla every day prior to school.  He likes the sublt vanilla flavor.  I am not a flwvored coffee drinker but this one has lured me away a few times.  Good stuff. Could have a stronger coffee flavor  for my liking

I am normally a dark coffee fan but on occasion I have a hankering for a flavored cup of coffee.  I keep trying new ones that sound really good, but I am almost always disappointed, and realize that I'm not really a fan of flavored coffee.  There are two flavored coffees I keep coming back to however and this is one (the other Sugar Bush Maple).  Great vanilla flavor and aroma and still tastes like coffee.  This is always on my reorder list.

This is very pleasant, smooth coffee flavor with a hint of vanilla.  Not bitter.  I do happen to like Van Houtte French Vanilla slightly better.  Be aware that all pods have a 6 month shelf life, so don't buy too much all at one time, like I did.
I was very pleased with this French Vanilla product. Typically with the flavored coffee, I tend to like Hazelnut but this French Vanilla is awesome!

We have bought many french vanilla coffees and any other coffee that have vanilla in it. I have to say, this is one of our favorites. Of course, I am not a "purest" coffee drinker. Sorry, I add creamer and sugar. The International Delight French Vanilla Creamer increases the natural vanilla taste of this coffee. We tried other vanilla coffees with "vanilla supreme" in their names but they were supremely lacking compared to Timothy's product. No chemical or tangy after taste with this one.

This is a good cup of coffee.  It has a light NATURAL vanilla flavor.  It is smooth with no bitter aftertaste.  Far Superior to Gloria Jean's French Vanilla.  I would have given it 5 stars if the vanilla flavor was a tad stronger.  It truly only has a "Hint" of vanilla.
I like flavored coffees, but don't want the flavoring to overwhelm the coffee.  This has a nice balance.

Has a good taste but its so weak even when brewed on the small cup setting. Generally, i find Starbucks coffees to be too strong and Duncan Donuts to be too weak. My preference is somewhere in between. Unfortunately, these Timothy's k-cups just taste like water.

THIS IS A GOOD COFFEE FOR THOSE OF US THAT DON'T LIKE THAT HARSH, DARK, HAIR RAISING, CREOSOTE TASTING BLEND. NOT LIKE GLORIA JEANS, OR STARBUCKS... THIS IS MILDER, NOT SO ACIDIC.  I BREW IT IN THE MEDIUM CUP SETTING IN MY KEURIG, AND IT COMES OUT RIGHT. THE LARGE CUP SETTING MAKES IT TOO WEAK. ENJOY!
One of my fav. k-cups, tastes more like regular coffee though (but a little better than regular.)
This is one of my favorite flavors.  This French vanilla tastes better than Gloria Jean and van heutte
I tried a few of these then threw the rest away. Timothy's regular coffee is good but the flavored coffee is terrible
I think this has a nice vanilla flavor. not too strong, but good. Even my husband, who doesn't like flavored coffee, likes this. Also great with vanilla syrup added~
I like the coffee and purchasing on Amazon.  I wish we could purchase single boxes of flavors we would like to try instead of two packs.

I have a Keurig coffee maker in my classroom. Dropping in a French Vanilla K-Cup and knowing that in a few seconds that warm French Vanilla Coffee aroma will be filling my classroom is great. Not a heavy coffee taste just a pleasant cup that I can enjoy.

very diappointing flavor.  I thought Timothys made fine coffees, but skip this one.  You might as well get unflavored coffee, since you can't taste any vanilla in this one.  I am trying another brand next time- Gloria Beans, perhaps?

I love Timothy's coffee pods, so when I bought a Keurig, naturally I bought Timothy's.  I bought two flavored coffees but they are way too bold and strong for a morning coffee drinker.  I am now trying Gloria Jean, Emeril and Caribou, looking for a pleasant morning cup.  I may consider opening up the K-cups to see if I can dump the contents into a toddy maker, I hate to toss these, but find them unpleasantly harsh.
These little k-cups have me drinking more coffee than ever...two in the morning...one at lunch and one in the evening...almost every day. It is definitely my favorite of the k-cups I've tried.

After using French Vanilla creamer in other coffees, I made the jump to French Vanilla coffee.  What a mistake.  Definitely not the same.  Not even close.  This coffee is weak and the french vanilla flavor is barely noticeable to me.  Ended up pitching the rest and going with that amazing Italian Blend, also by Timothy's.

I am addicted....this coffee is great.
We are on subscribe and save and go through about 4-6 boxes a month.
Everyone in my home enjoys this flavor and thus there is no need for another.

Its a medium bodied coffee and the flavor is perfect.
I dont know what else I could say about it...but the price at Amazon is perfect and subscribe and save gets you some additional savings.

Try it out...you wont be disappointed!

Title says it all.
Quality control seems to be a bit better than the Green Mountain stuff. At least I have not run into any cups that leak their grounds with Timothy's as I have with GM.

Timothy's World Coffee, French Vanilla, K-Cups for Keurig Brewers, 25-Count Boxes (Pack of 2)
This is my absolute favorite K-cup!
Although my favorite k-cup so far is the Butter Toffee, this is the 2nd place Runner-up.  It's got a great flavor and is sweet enough that you won't need to add sweetner.

My husband is the tea drinker in our household. I love my coffee. Timothy's tea is his favorite. Having our Keurig has really made a big difference for us in being able to have the drink we want and not having the aftertaste of the other when we brew a cup.
I highly recommend The Keurig and Timothy's K-cups in the tea as well as the coffee flavors.
My mother is getting a Keurig from my sister and me for her 73rd birthday this month.
If you purchase, sign up for the automatic shipments. It is much cheaper and the boxes are 24 count. The boxes at a local store are only 18 count boxes.

Nespresso makes GREAT coffee and GREAT machines. I switched over to a Nespresso machine 7 years ago and have never looked back. I save a small fortune every year by making my lattes at home.

That being said, the Nespresso capsule offers posted here are from a third party who is putting a large additional margin on their price.

You can order the same products online from Nespresso for approx $0.55 each (half the price here).
This coffee is the best i have had in a long time.  It is so good that it keeps me out of local coffee shops.  I am hooked.
We have been using the Char Crust rubs for years. They are the best dry rubs on the market!!!

"Bounty" bars consist of a soft, almost molten center of sweet coconut coated in an outer layer of milk chocolate. You can easily buy them "over the counter" here in Australia. But if that's not the case where you are, and you don't mind a diet rich in junk food, then yes, this is a candy bar worth going to the trouble of ordering over the internet.

Note that here on Amazon you can purchase bounty bars in boxes with varying numbers of bars inside, so it is worth your while to crunch the numbers and think about what package offers the best value for you. At the same time, it may not be entirely in the best interests of your health to have _too_ many of these things lying around at home all at once!

Theo.

Amazon sent the wrong product. Received regular Mars chocolate bars. Also had an expiration date which had expired.  I was really surprised that Amazon would ship expired food.  Amazon is in the process of sending me the Mars Bounty Coconut bars that I originally ordered. Hope I get the right order this time. I will let you know when it arrives if it is the right item. It seems their packaging recently has been really poor, with no protective packaging on the product, or the wrong product altogether. I order a lot from Amazon and am a Prime customer. Don't know where their priorities are right now. Amazon used to be so reliable ...
We are so glad that we can order Bounty Bars through Amazon-used have to get them in Canada. Thanks-we love them and service was fast.

I love bounty and the one star is not for Bounty but for Amazon.
The first shipment they sent me had expired 2 months before.
The replacement shipment I got though it didn't expire till 11-11-2011; It might as well have been. They were dried and flaky. I didn't bother even returning them. I usually order though 3rd party sellers but I got greedy with the free shipping and sacrificed quality.
I've never had issues with Amazon products but this one really dissapointed me.
No need to contact me Amazon. I'll still shop with you I just won't be buying Bounty directly from Amazon for now.

This dried beef makes great creamed chipped beef. One can buy it in supermarkets in Philadelphia, or in Maryland and Delaware, but not apparently here in Connecticut. (I guess the managers here suppose not enough people would know what to do with it.) However, on the Amazon.com site a shipment costs nearly $120 plus almost $25 shipping. That must be one hell of a lot of product! Too bad it can't be bought in, say, lots of 10 of the small packages (about 5 oz. each) as they are sold in supermarkets. What retail customer not doing a fund-raiser is going to want that much?

First and foremost, I cannot stress how important it is to feed your cat an all canned food diet - cats do not have a drive for thirst, so only a canned food diet will keep them correctly hydrated [diabetes, urine crystal free].

Important to learn: if you feed your cat all wet diet, they only need to drink 1oz of water a day to keep fully hydrated. If you feed your cat an all dry diet, they need to drink 7oz of water to keep hydrated. That's a full cup of water!

Second, cat food must be high in protein, high to low in fat [depending if you want your cat to be lean], and have no more than 10% carbs. Dry foods are 30% plus percent carbs. Diabetes is rampant in older cats, and it's recommended to keep their carb intake at 5-10%.

You should feed grain-free diet and feed meat from feathered birds, not beef, never fish. Grain free almost always means high fat, so be careful if you want to keep your cats lean and healthy.

I feed this Fancy Feast formula, plus Merrick's cowboy cookout or grammy pot pie [grain free, low fat], plus wellness turkey and chicken formulas [grain free, low protein, high fat]. I use Fancy Feast to entice the cat then they eat whatever else is in their dish [wellness, etc]. Grain free food, while great for them, doesn't really taste great.

This formula is:
56% protein
33% fat
10% carbs
74 calories per can

My kitty loves all of these flavors.  This one especially looks-- and even almost smells-- like people food.  I mix in a tablespoon or two of water to be sure she's hydrated, and down it all goes!  Amazon's price with Subscribe and Save is the best I've found.
I don't gag when I open Elegant Medleys like I do when  I open other brands. This cat food actually looks appealing too. My cats won't eat anything else.

In the past, I have never had any problems getting the correct order.  However, I ordered 2 cases of Fancy Feast Elegant Medleys Tender Turkey Primavera.  Instead, I received 8 boxes of the Primavera Medleys. This contains three different kinds of cat food one of which is fish.  I have a cat that is prone to bladder infections anytime she eats fish.  Normally, I would return an order that wasn't correct.  However, my cat is hungry and would like to eat!!  So I have 12 cans of wasted cat food.  When I reviewed my order, I discovered that this company was under review for problems with orders.  Thanks, Amazon.  I would have liked to have known that before I ordered this product from you again!!!!!!!!  :(

Tender Turkey Primavera is by far the most favorite of our 4 indoor & 1 outdoor cats. We have tried almost EVERY cat food out there & end up donating those cat foods to  our local Humane Society. BUT, this is one of the foods that they adore & will never turn their noses up to!
I tried everything to make these sprout. Inside. Outside. Soil. Plastic cup method. Even one of those jiffy plant starters. Nothing seems to work

This might be my new favorite flavor of Cape Cod Chips.  The combination of rosemary, feta, and garlic tastes terrific.  None of the flavors overpower each other.  The only bad thing is that the bag is only 7 oz, whereas standard Cape Cod Chip bags are 8 oz.

I absolutely love Chicago-style cheese and caramel popcorn like Garrett's. So, feeling a craving for the stuff, I decided to try this gourmet cheddar cheese popcorn. It was delicious, but very salty. The cheese is also not the same quality of stuff that they use in the better Chicago popcorn shops. Frankly, it didn't taste as cheesy and a bit fake. The popcorn itself was quite fresh though.

All in all, I guess if you're desperate for some gourmet-esque popcorn, this stuff is good. However, in my book, it doesn't compare to the real, fresh gourmet popcorn shops' stuff.
I received a bag of this kettle corn over the holidays and found it to be quite delicious, crisp, and flavorful.  It is the plain variety (Zebra?) and I highly recommend it.

I tried the variety pack of the popconopolis from Amazon. Really liked all of it except for the cheese. For my taste the cheese was way too salty. If you thought Cheese Doodles gave you orange fingers, you should have seen my fingers after eating some of this. The coating seemed to be a fine powder that really caked onto my fingers. Also, with this one cone the popcorn had no crunch...seemed stale. Maybe this was just a bad or outdated cone. I love my junkfood, but actually threw away a small portion of the cone. One of those things I asked myself, why did I eat that much? I wasn't enjoying it.

We fell in love with Popcornopolis when we first tried it at a Blockbuster store... however the price
was pretty steep for the small cone that you got... so I looked it up on Amazon and lo and behold here
it be! This popcorn is unreal... if you like pecans and caramel popcorn you will LOVE this. I still
have a hard time figuring out how they make it so good but whatever they are doing they are doing it
right! It is fresh and crunchy - PERFECT for a late night snack and a cuppa decaf coffee, feels like
you are eating something super sinful yet it isn't too bad for ya.
Can't beat the price either! I sent this to my mother in law as her mothers day gift and she was super
thrilled - she actually hinted to us that she wanted this because we had sent them a 5 pack sampler and
this one was her favorite.
She said she hid them where noone else can find them.
Hope this review helps.... I am also in hopes that the chocoloate zebra will be available on Amazon too...
That one is amazing as well :0)
PS: The cheese one is softer and kind of stale even though the flavor IS something to write home about -
don't get it unless you don't mind it stale-ish. Also the husks can get annoying in the cheese kind.

Popcornopolis Cheddar Popcorn through Amazon is just as good as if you bought it directly in the store.  The vacuum sealed bags keep the popcorn fresh.  Great price and fast shipping.  I highly recommend for cheese popcorn lovers.  It is the best I've tasted.

It's the first time buying a popcorn on-line @ Amazon.
I only like the caramel flavor, but the one that sells in Costco always comes with 3 different flavors, so I was thinking on going to the stores, and buy it there, till' I saw it at Amazon.
The arriving date was way too far, but after they confirmed the order, I got it in 2 days! I was happy, coz' I wanted to have this before mothers day, and I think is a very good price.

I surely recommended!! ^.^
If you love cheese popcorn this is absolutely the best you'll ever taste! I've tried many and none come close in rich cheesy flavor
This is our favorite popcornopolis flavor, but its a shame they don't seem as fresh as they should.  In fact they were kind of stale, but they were still good!
High quality, attractively packaged caramel popcorn. We give this to many friends and it is always a much appreciated gift. You can't go wrong on this purchase.  Fast shipping as always.

I received a bag of the Popcornopolis Cinnamon Toast Popcorn as a Christmas gift.  By the next day, I had finished the bag and was on Amazon to order more of the popcorn.  The packaging is adorable, but the flavor is OH SO GOOD!  It's perfectly crunchy and cinnamony and not too sweet.  Next year, Santa is getting Popcornopolis and milk on Christmas Eve.

I sent this to my son for a snack during finals week.  It didn't arrive as scheduled, so he didn't have it for finals week.  He was finally able to pick it up today as the mail room on campus was closed for winter break.  It was a nice surprise and he had plenty to share with his friends, thank goodness it didn't spoil.  I would order this item again, but I would request a different means of delivery.
This would probably seem like too much popcorn to buy, but it's a great gift. My friends and family loved it. It taste amazing! This is a great deal on this popcorn too. I will be buying this again.

They have some of the best cheese and caramel popcorn I've had, and buying here at Amazon with free shipping means that on a per bag basis, its not anymore expensive than what I would pay at the local grocery store for a type that is not as tasty.

These are really good especially if you get a fresher batch.  You can tell as you're eating  them that it can't be good for your body but that won't stop you from popping one after another down the hatch.

I totally love this popcorn.  I first had it at Universal City Walk in LA and thought it was terrific.  I've tried a few flavors and decided their Caramel and Cheddar Cheese (both white and regular) are for me, the best flavors.  The caramel is much better than any of the others I've tried at my local grocery.
This tastes the way I remember caramel popcorn tasting.  Highly recommend this for old-fashioned caramel corn fans.  It's actually a lot of popcorn.

It is by FAR the Cheesiest popcorn ever!
I signed up for auto shipments every 3 months and my husband and I can
eat a bag (4.5oz) in one sitting when at the movies or at home watching a movie!
This the very rich and cheesy popcorn.  I love cheese popcorn and have tried many different kinds but this is the best popcorn by far.  Try a bag for yourself.

A co-worker brought this popcorn to share.  We couldn't believe how good is was!  He finds it at Costco.  I don't have time to shop stores so I immediately went to Popcornopolis.com and placed an order for a variety of flavors.  Everything was awesome!  I'm a frequent Amazon shopper but just today thought to search for it here.  Amazon offers it much cheaper but the selection is limited.  Don't hesitate to try this popcorn!

This is great tasting popcorn... First tried it at our local blockbuster DVD store but then went direct to the Popcornopolis website and ordered direct - the big cones.  At Blockbuster and direct from Popcornopolis it was fresh and crunchy but for some odd reason this tasted a bit stale from the very first.  The flavor is amazing and just a large handful will satisfy that salty craving but it may be a bit stale if u get it from amazon... I do highly recommend Popcornopolis though... It IS the BEST popcorn you can get and we've tried a lot! The pecan and zebra is unreal too.  I recommend giving it a try at your local blockbuster first then their direct website. They have a nice array of yummy addicting flavors - we've gotten many many friends and family addicted to it and it makes a great gift if shipped direct from Popcornopolis- they have neat packages.  (by the way... The candied ones tend to be fresher from the beginning and last a long time!)

I consider myself a foodie and am always trying to find the best of everything.  I tried Dale and Thomas popcorn when it was one of Oprah's favorite things and yes, it was good.  My local Costco store had the Popcornopolis people in-store for a few days and I was IMPRESSED.  The zebra (white and dark chocolate drizzled) was really great but the cheddar was like none other I have ever tasted.  WOW.  It has to be good if it says "Why is this popcorn so good?" on the back of the bag with an explanation.  Oh and two thumbs up for the perfectly sized, individually sealed cones.  I can eat one cone in one sitting (and they aren't tiny!) and can stop there.  It is a good limit-setter.  :)
Sweet and tasty popcorn delivered to your door.  It's a slam dunk every time.  This popcorn is off the hook.  It is expensive unless you find a deal like on amazon!!  Go for it..
This is great popcorn and amazon has it on sale for a great price, they even delivery it.  Ain't America GREAT!
I love this popcorn.  Super fast shipping and fresh popcorn.  But I wouldn't spend the extra money for almonds next time.  The regular caramel popcorn is better and is less expensive.

I purchase this popcorn at Costco every chance I get. I was glad to see it at amazon for such a great price. This popcorn is always very good and fresh.
The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because my favorite cheese popcorn is a little more cheesy and stickier.
This is by far the best cheese popcorn I have ever eaten. My husband is addicted to this stuff! Always fresh, really flavorful, WOW!

I ordered this popcorn and in the past have loved it, but this time ordering it for the first time from amazon I was highly disatisfied!! We got it and it was so stale that even my 2 year old would not eat it and he will eat anything. A customer guarentee came with the popcorn so we called and were told that because we ordered through amazon we were not able to get a refund or a fresh product. Never again will I order anything of this nature through amazon.

When we searched for Garretts popcorn, it came up but what Amazon attempted to send me is not Garrett's Popcorn, but some Popcornolopis brand that I have no idea of.  I could spend 70 bucks at a local popcorn shop if I wanted popcorn other than Garrett's.  I don't understand the advertising it as Garretts,,,,wonder if Garrett's knows this?  Ummmmm

I just bought the Zebra flavor after sampling at a holiday booth. The sample had chocolate drizzled on each piece.  False representation. The actual bag contains few pieces with chocolate. (less than 10& of pieces have chocolate) It looks and tastes like Crunch 'n Munch or Cracker Jacks.  If you're looking for gourmet popcorn, this is not it.
We use this on fish also. It is a great seasoning and is a low cal solution to a great meal.
I enjoy several of the Shake and Bake crusts and the Ranch and Herb Crusted one is by far the worst.  My wife and I put it on chicken and it was terrible.  Do not buy this item.

I have made yogurt on and off for years and this is by far the easiest way. I highly recommend this. No advance planning, muss or fuss required. I start it before I go to work in the morning. It only takes 3 minutes to make the yogurt from my end, the longest part is waiting for the water to boil for the container. Very quick and very easy! When I come home it is done and all I have to do is refrigerate it for the next morning. The yogurt is delicious and I've even made my own yogurt (from scratch) and it worked well. There are web sites that tell you how, if you are interested in doing this. The packets usually come in groups of 3 and are available on line or in stores. It is new to the USA so unfortunately, not many stores are carrying it as yet. I think that will change as people discover how great this system it and how delicious and fresh the yogurt is. Hopefully (Hint to Easiyo) they will sell the packets individually too.  Really, I love this product.

My son sent me this yogurt maker for my birthday form Australia.  It is great!  Takes minutes to follow the directions to make a quart of yogurt.  the Easiyo probiotic yogurt base is great, too.  Best greek style yogurt you want to eat.

I first came into contact with the EasiYo yogurt maker staying with friends for a month in NZ. I could not believe how easy it was to make yogurt and it was better than any yogurt that I had tasted before!! I bought the maker while in NZ and only four packets of the low fat greek to bring home. I thought that of course I could find it in the USA and my local health food store knew what I was talking about. The owner has one too and has tried to get a francise to carry it in her store to no avail. Bad NZ! It would make it so much easier to enjoy. Anyway as I said it's so easy to make, so delicious and smooth to eat, that anyone that likes yogurt, I guarantee you'll love this product. Hopefully NZ will let go and allow it to be carried in the USA!!

I actually found this yogurt maker in a thrift store in Auckland last year.  I wasn't sure at the time if I was making a good decision, because it took up a LOT of room in my suitcase to get it back to the States.  But, oh my gosh -- I love this thing.  First, making the yogurt is so easy, and the Easiyo packets are the best.  The yogurt is *very* creamy, and just so fresh when it's homemade.  It's those NZ cows!  Second, I love not having all the additional sugars in my yogurt.  Third -- it is cheaper than buying yogurt in the store!  I actually use some of the yogurt from the batch I make to use as starter for the next batch.  So, one packet of yogurt actually makes two batches for me.  Just delicious--- you will love it!!  In NZ, my friend made meringues, added dollops of yogurt and fresh fruit -- just the best dessert ever!

If only the jar inside were not plastic, which makes me nervous, especially with boiling water potentially leaching toxic compounds. But a quart glass jar will break from the shock of the difference between the cold contents and boiling water. If you try to use warm water to prevent the glass from breaking, warm, 95 F water added to the starter causes it to gel into lumps. This will help prevent the jar from breaking, and the yogurt turns out okay, but after that, when you transfer a quarter cup for the next batch and add milk, you'd better not heat the milk up too hot, keep an eye on it.

One of the reasons I bought this yogurt maker was that it was less of a hassle and used less energy, but the workaround to avoid the plastic container is a bit annoying. Wish they made a metal jar, if that's possible...

I bought this Item back in the middle of February, and I love it. This Yogurt taste like a dream, the only bad thing I been unable to find where to purchase replacement. And who buys something for it to collect dust right, perhaps if I would have known that it wasn't going to be that easy to buy replacements I properly would have not bought it!!!
great product but a little over priced  30 $ maybe but 40 was a little over the top  whoops  not to mention ocean spray concentrate from the Philippians
This price is a rip-off.  Check your local Sam's club and get the same can for $31.00.  That's over $170 more a year.  Why pay it?

I am used to the excellent ketchup popcorn seasoning from Canada. I tried this instead for a change. Big mistake. One use and it was in the trash. Tastes like burnt seasoning, no ketchup flavor at all.
I recently discovered Frank's sauces, and I love them, even if I can't find them in Italy. Lovely, hot but not only hot and full bodied.
Perfect for last minute food ideas because you just picked your veggies from your garden. Wonderful product.

In getting ready for Christmas, I find that this is a great way to start and get my dates in larger quantities, with a great price and free shipping. Dates are fresh and chopped just the way I wanted.
these hansen's strawberry banana smoothis drinks are so delicious. I grab one for breakfast, and I'm good to go, its almost like liquid fruit

Mixes well with bananas and strawberries added for extra flavor and texture. Added some frozen vanilla yogurt and made an out of this world drink. I recommend putting in the refrigerator overnight to chill well before mixing for a cold flavorful smoothie.

I have ordered from Omaha Steaks for several years now and I have nothing but PRAISE for this company.
We only had a problem 1 time and they let us keep the extra order! I've never heard of that.
They are a Great company and we will continue to order from them regularly.

A PLUS A PLUS A PLUS A PLUS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Mike & Linda

I gave these to my husband for Christmas, and we had them over the holidays.  They were sooo tender and juicy!  They arrive so quickly. I am always thrilled with Omaha steaks.  Thanks for such a wonderful product!

Thought we had good steaks where I live, but these are superior. Would definitely buy them again, well-packaged, great tasting product, exactly what I thought I would get, I did get...this company is famous for a reason.

Even though this product arrived with a broken spray bottle, it works great. I spilled a little outside trying to get the sprayer to work and ultimately ended up transferring it to another bottle I had layout around the house. It smells awful, but works great. Even the area where I spilled it has been squirrel free, so the birds have been free to enjoy the feeders without squirrels stealing the food. This stuff works great, and is all-natural and rated for organic gardening, which I was thrilled about too, since I make a point not to spray chemicals on my lawn.

I don't know how well it works to repel deer and rabbits, as I've used it for 5+ years to keep the squirrels from eating my flowers and plants.  I use it every spring as my perenniels and bulbs appear.  Be sure to shake it well before applying.

I purchased 2 bottles of this stuff to keep squirrels out of my corn garden.  Sprayed it around the garden as well as directly onto the ears of cord.  The squirrels destroyed my garden in a matter of days AFTER I applied this product.

It Works !!!  A pesky squirrel was draining my hummingbird feeders every day. I bought Deer Off and sprayed the feeders and the tree branches they hang on.  No more squirrels. They'll come in my yard but stay clear of the tree. Its been 2 weeks and we've had some heavy rain storms and its still working. The great thing too is that the hummingbirds are not bothered by the spray.  I am extremely impressed with this product. It's nice to buy something that works great.

I just saw a rabbit next to the plants that were sprayed 3 weeks ago.
In the label, it is claimed that it works for 90 days... well it did not even worked for 21...
I read the instructions.  Followed every letter.  Kept the new growth sprayed.  Either rabbits or squirrels still ate my rose bushes.

I used this products to repel the squirrel that eat all my fruits.  They take a bite of each fruit, and then go on to the next one. I used the product around the plant, on the trunk, limbs, on the cables on the way to the tree. They keep going with their normal life, unaffected by the liquid.  They keep on climbing up and down and eating the fruits.  THIS PRODUCTS DOESN'T WORK.
Used it to try and deter squirrels from around my bird feeder.  Didnt work at all, even after 3 sprayings.

I sprayed "Deer Off" on and around our bird feeder and within a few hours the squirrels did not hesitate to have a feast with the bird seed I had just put in. Maybe this product works with deer (with which we've never had a problem) but it didn't work with the "tree rodents". Save your money !
Wish I could say this was a good investment, but it lasted two days before the creatures came back and I saw them digging in my garden. The Deer off may be Dear Off but not Squrriel Off.
I used this product to try to deter squirrels from a bird feeder.  It did NOTHING!!!  Total waste of money!

The Inglehofer Cranberry Mustard is a delightful balance between sweet and spicy. It is perfect for turkey and mixed with diet mayonnaise in chicken salad. The tiny size jar is perfect for stocking stuffers or hostess gifting. I would like a larger size for everyday use.

I have two Jack Russell Terriers and they simply love Bully Sticks!  We have "bone day" on Saturday mornings and this is the bone they have come to love and to expect each Saturday morning.  The only thing that buyers should be aware of is the "regular" bully stick is really, really skinny.  My two medium breed dogs finish them in about 5 minutes.  In my past purchases of Bully Sticks from other retailers, I have come to expect that "regular" size is more like about a 1/2" to 3/4" in diameter.  These regular ValueBull Bully Sticks are more like 1/4" to 1/2" in diameter and I probably would not have considered them to be such a "value" had this size been established.  They are however, 6" in length.  The dogs still love them, but this was not the deal I thought I was getting.
I ordered these for my dog and they just seem to get smaller and smaller. Better off with "Best Bully Sticks"

If you are talking ounces you would be better off getting a 12 pack for 19.99 at petsmart. These are tiny. They are only as big as a pencil in diameter one way. They are flat and about half pencil size the other. I do not even know if they are truely pizzle sticks as the ingredients only say beef chews. I personally never saw a cow with a pizzle this small! Must be calf ones.
I have small dogs so I am sure they will love them. They did come on time and were boxed appropriately. But for $50.00 it is not worth the price! As a shopper for dog treats for over 30 years these are worth about $25-$30.00 if you compare to whats out in the regular pet stores. Won't purchase again.

Not pleased with size of bullysticks. Very small & skinny. Will go back to previous vendor. Bullysticks are usually bigger and thicker. At least the ones I've gotten in the past. This time we tried a new vendor...

Very few of the sticks are the actual size shown. Many of them were as wide as a straw! It took my dog less than 1 minute to chew it up (the Regular size ones take him 15 minutes). Also, they were of all different widths - nowhere near as consistent as shown in the picture. A complete waste of $$.
It is nice to be able to give my maltese these pizzle sticks. She was unable to chew some of the larger ones. It is nice to be able to pick the right width for the different size dogs.
My three little dogs love these. The price is great and shipping is fast. Having 3dogs and a cat saving on quality products is important. And by the way my cat likes to lick on them too!

Some of the bully sticks were a little bigger than drinking straws.There was no value here.Some of them had a smell.I will never buy from this store again.My Corgi would eat the small bully sticks in about five minutes.All bully stick vendors should have the weight on the package,that would help in determining value.Most of them have the count.

This is my absolute favorite coffee and Brown & Jenkins does it right! Rich, full-bodied, smooth...a pleasure to brew every morning. And I'm happy to support a great small business who gives so much back to their local Vermont community.

I've always been a fan of crystals in the litterbox, and the fact that these are scented really is great! My basement does not smell like cat, while at the same time, the smell is not so strong that my cat refuses to go in the litterbox. My cat must use the litterbox more than others, because I've never had the experience of one bag lasting a month. It lasts two weeks (non-scented used to be 10 days).

They are also pretty good at not tracking all over the place.

I use the subscribe & save option to make this even cheaper, but I found that it was already 20% less than 7 lbs of "high quality" crystals Ultra Pet Cat Litter Pearls (Original) Crystal Clear, 7-Pound Package and not too much more expensive than the bulk stuff Clear Choice Silica Crystals Cat Litter Pail, 12-Pound.

Target no longer sells my most economical and favorable cat crystals, however, though these are about a 3rd more expensive, my cats love it and so do I. Odors are kept to a minimum and clean up is fairly simple. It will never be a pleasurable task, but, my cats rarely go a day without having their litter box cleaned.

This set was (and is) very handy for specialty cakes, and the colors are just what I was looking for.  Nice and bright, works great with "electronic" gadget cakes (xbox, cell phone, etc.) makes them look like they're all powered up.  Great with airbrush--little bit goes a long way, but also works well for painting on tiny details.  This set would be great for anyone looking to take their cakes to the next level.

My puppy has a delicate digestive tract.  We were constantly cleaning up diarrhea until we got her on the Wellness Lamb and Sweet Potato.  Since then she hasn't been sick and at 1 year old she is full of pep and energy, healthy looking coat and no more sickness.  This  has truly been a 5 star food for our dog.

I tried this on a whim at the local health food store. I am completely enamored with the product.  I serve it with Bosc pears and it has been a hit.  The crisp sweet of the pear with the tangy and creamy taste of the chocolate goat cheese is a marvelous opposing match. I give the cheese high marks as a dessert cheese. Others must like it where I live because I have to reserve the log or logs before they are sold out.
This is pretty neat. The first taste is cocoa (not chocolate) with fresh curd but than the goat cheese flavor kicks in and gives a very different aftertaste. Quite enjoyable.

After having been diagnosed with a thyroid nodule, which later turned out to be cancer, I thought I had better try to get more iodine in my and my family's diet.  After researching some, I found that Dulse is a great natural source of iodine.  I tried a package of this, and found that it is pretty good.  The package came with a suggestion to stir-fry it a few minutes in a hot skillet, to make it like "chips", which I tried.  I and my family enjoyed it much better that way.  The quality of this dulse is great, and the price seemed comparable with others I could find.  I ordered more of this, and am using it as a regular supplement to our diet.

I started eating this about a year ago after reading how healthy sea vegetables are for you.  I add it to many different dishes.. the ones listed above, eggs, casseroles.  For myself, I like the taste so use large pieces, but for those who don't care for the taste, I grind it into a powder using a coffee grinder, and then add it to the dish.  That way the nutrition is there without the taste.  I also like this company's kombu.
I bought this because it was touted to be a salt substitute. Unfortunately, it just tastes like seaweed, which it is.
I love this product. Make homemade sport gels from it and I am not attempt to eat it during the day, because raw taste is very salty. I will buy it again.

On a recent trip to Asia, I fell in love with this coffee. More like a coffee-flavored sweet beverage, these combine lots of sugar, lots of cream, and some instant coffee into one delivery vehicle. It's a sweet, warm comfort drink with the need for nothing more than hot water and a container. Quick, easy, and tasty. Also, cheap.

Note that these are not for American sized 24oz cups. These are for actual 1-cup cups. If you use too large of a vessel, it will taste watered down.
I was introduced to this during my stay in Dubai a few months ago. This is awesome coffee. I brought some home with me now I'm searching for it online. I crave this coffee. Its the best.

i love this convenient instant coffee premixed with cream sugar - and it actually tastes much better than brewed coffee! Believe it or not, i saw this Nescafe 3-in-1 first sold in the Philippines before it became available on Amazon or anywhere else in the USA. I highly recommend this rich tasting Nescafe 3-in-1 instant coffee over regular brewed coffee! Great to have when you travel!

I enjoyed this coffee because all the elements that I enjoy are included.  It has just the right amount of creamer and sugar.  I am working overseas where it is difficult to get things so this was perfect.  The first time I ordered it came perfectly packaged.  The second time it came in an open box and it appear that extra sticks were placed in the box to make up for the missing ones in the open package.  On top of that the box was open and held together by a string.  A STRING.  It apparently was shipped directly from Thailand.  I will make sure I know where my purchases are coming from in the future.  Over all this is a great product but the shipping is questionable.

After staying in SE Asia for a while, I found these in the supermarket and boy, was I impressed. Even my husband, who typically likes his coffee strong, started swiping my Nescafe coffee packets. They're easy, they dissolve perfectly and are delicious. Just the right sweetness and coffee taste, in my opinion. It makes me wonder what Nestle is thinking not offering these little gems in the States. The price overseas for this 30 pk bag is about $3. I am in sticker shock at the nearly $17 price tag and refuse to pay that much. They're good but I'll stick with the Vinacafe which we've found locally, until the price drops for Nescafe.

I like the product Nescafe 3 in 1 but causes some acidity, other vise it's ok i like it. i advice the people who need
Quick cheap and healthy coffee should buy this product. Thanks

Last year while in Liverpool, England I had the experience to try Nescafe 3 in 1 instant coffee sticks.  I have searched for nearly a year to find them in the US and finally decided to purchase online.  They are delicious for those who like a little extra in their coffee and easy to take with you whenever you need a little coffee break.  I appreciate being able to purchase online....I can close my eyes and return to Liverpool!  Thanks, Heidi O

I i was born and raised in west Africa half of my life. and i grew up drinking coffee and tea we grew ourselves. so Nescafe brand has been part of my unforgetable childhood, after i came to America i find it extremely hard to drink the coffee here, because its too strong for me and i can get easily addicted to the caffeine, which is bad news for me cause i don't like being dependent on anything that i can control or stop. so i gave up on coffee and stick to my tea and hot chocolate. recently my THai roommate in college gave me a pack of these coffee after coming back home from winter break, i told her that i dont' drink coffee anymore, but then i started to work night shift at the hospital and need to stay awake since im not use to working at night. so one day i drank this coffee praying that i wont get addicted to it, and i swear i almost cried, because it gave me that nostalgic feeling i have been craving and searching for the past 10 yrs. the coffee is not at all too strong, nor too light its just perfect, it has creamer which i love n sugar but i add more sugar because i have a sweet tooth. overall you will NOT be disappointed if you buy this product.
I drink only black coffee, but this was a stocking stuffer for the ladies in my family. All enjoyed, good brew. Thanks, Nescafe.
This is the best coffee - well worth the money.  So easy to take to work or on a trip - rich delicious coffee in a minute.  Loved the fast service too!
Haven't been able to find this in the USA so Amazon is the answer... This is the BEST instant coffee. Worth a little extra to purchase online.
The seller got us our coffee within less than 24 hours.  Very impressive customer service and the coffee was great!

I too first tasted this in Thailand, where we had it in the morning during our multi-day hiking trip. It was the only thing getting us out of the warm sleeping bag in the morning.

Very creamy and sugary - just the way I like it.

i cannot believe that more places dont stock this item, its one great cup of coffee.  i dont even drink coffee, but this stuff got me hooked when i worked in qatar and visited dubai.  now i have to have it for the winter months at least.  fast shipping.

I, like many of the reviewers,fist tasted this in Thailand were coincidently i have meet my wife hahah, she now sends it to me in Afghanistan were I'm currently working,and luxuries are at a premium or non existent. some of my coworkers have tasted it and are asking me to get my wife to send them some
I am SO hooked on this coffee. Best instant on the planet. Perfect for the office where crummy coffee is served and place is loaded with turkeys who leave an empty pot on the burner.
Enjoyed the coffee,i first drank this brand of coffee when i was in Thailand and enjoyed it very much....Thank You
i found this Nescafe 3 in 1 Regular Instant Coffee 30 Sticks (600g) in my local farmes market selling it for $7.99

I ordered this coffee and mmmmmmmmmm i fell in love this Coffee, I drink this coffee in Russia before!!! I did't find in USA this kinda coffee!!!!!!!!!
Seller do you wanna be rich????????? What is going on with you??? Where is coffee? When it'll be available again????????????

Love fig newtons!  These are really fresh individually sealed, unlike their 1lb counterpart packages that have a tendency to get stale rather quickly.  These are worth the extra cost for that reason alone.  But, they're grab and go snacks too that are somewhat healthy for you than a regular cookie.  They also make great treats for after ballgames and other sports.  We love these in our house, highly recommend!

Most people have had these at sometime in their life so no need to tell you how good they are. Only problem is - when getting this quantity it is hard not to eat them continuously!  Too bad the calories can't be quartered :)

I love these individual size snacks. These packets are portable and (at least in my case) keep me from eating too many fig newtons.

The only thing I would appreciate is if Amazon would give you an idea of when these items will expire. I really hate wasting food but I can't possibly eat a couple of boxes of fig newtons in a month.

I like Fig Newtons and have been missing them since I cut out white flour and enriched flour from my diet. These are made with whole grain and taste very good. The reason I can't give them five stars is because even though the advertisement does not list "high fructose corn syrup" as an ingredient, the actual nutrition label does. This is an ingredient that I try not to have in my food, but it is getting very difficult to find products that don't contain it.
I demand you to eat more of this product ... Soon, this item will be mandated by your government to be consumed by all ...  cause it's sooooo damn good!!!
Arrived fresh.  Handy packaging.  I take them with me on longer bike rides.  Give me as much fuel as a Powerbar or whatever, cost a lot less.

I should've listened to other reviewers when they said these things are dry. They are very dry and taste nothing like the fig newtons I'm used to. Too bad they couldn't successfully merge the fig newton with whole grains. It just doesn't work

I love Fig Newtons and so does my 7 year old, so I thought I'd try the minis in a convenient size. Unfortunately they don't taste very good. There is hardly any fig inside and they're a bit dry. I'll opt for the regular size Newtons the next time I buy them.
If you are like me you love fig newtons but they are so sweet you get tired of them fast. This way the opened bigger boxes aren't left to get stale.

While not readily available in many markets, the fat free fig newtons are an excellent dessert alternative for those trying to lower chlosterol without drugs. Very tasty and satisfying. The price and free shipping save us about 30% at Amazon compared to the Safeway market. Almost time for another case!

Whole Grain Wheat Flour, Figs Preserved With Sulfur Dioxide, Sugar, **Corn Syrup, **High Fructose Corn Syrup, Soybean Oil, **Partially Hydrogenated Cottonseed Oil, Salt, Cultured Dextrose And Potassium Sorbate Added To Preserve Freshness, Baking Soda, Soy Lecithin (Emulsifier), Natural And Artificial Flavor. Vitamins And Minerals: Tricalcium Phosphate (Source Of Calcium And Phosphorus), Ferric Phosphate (Source Of Iron And Phosphorus), Niacinamide, Vitamin A Palmitate, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride (Vitamin B6), Riboflavin (Vitamin B2), Thiamine Mononitrate (Vitamin B1).

**The HFCS and trans-fat in these outweigh any positives from the whole wheat and figs. Too bad! These could have been a great, tasty choice, but instead they turned out to be little nuggets of poison. Consider yourself warned.

WHILE WATCHING TV, I LOVE A GOOD SNACK TO HELP PASS THE TIME. A GOOD LOW FAT FIG NEWTON WILL HIT THE SPOT. I'VE ALWAYS LOVED FIG NEWTONS IN THE PAST AND STILL DO NOW. WITH A LW FAT VANILLA MILK, AM IN BUSINESS WITH A REMOTE CONTROL IN MY HANDS.
the jam inside feels cheap and don't like the taste. thought the rate on amazon was pretty good but feel disappointed.
Fig Newtons are so good that I always keep them on hand. Just right for a quick and delicious snack or for a small dessert after a nice meal.
It's a ton of fig newtons so how can you go wrong. If you've never had a Fig Newton then you owe it to yourself to try them. It is its own unique flavor and texture.

I have to stay for long hours at school, and I've been looking for snacks I can bring that aren't too unhealthy. When I found out about these fig newton minis, I was pretty excited since I absolutely love the full size fig newtons. Since they're smaller, there is of course much less of the fruit filling.. but still, a delicious snack. The size of each individual bag is quite small (a little over 1oz) so it's not too great at staving off those hunger pangs, but it helps.
This was our regular purchase item from grocery store. Subscribe and Save saved me time and $ . Loved it
just enough when you want a little something. i think we've all ate this as kids and it's easy to carry around
These are very good bars and being individually wrapped stay fresh a long time. My husband carries them in his car for a quick and easy snack.

These are Fig Newtons, what can you say?  Everyone likes them (or not).  They are a nice-sized snack in a nearly indestructible foil wrapper.  You get two double-length cookies, approximately equivalent to 4 regular Fig Newtons.  Good for tossing in lunches, purses, the car, etc.  Arrived very fresh and in good shape.  Handy as a somewhat more nutritious snack.  We like them enough to order more, when on sale!
love me some Newtons and I can eat these in bunches and never stop. they are so good. i have dug them from way back in the day and they are a must for me everytime.

When you have a family that loves fig newtons as much as mine, it is best to buy them by the case than depend
on grocery store sales which don't happen often on these cookies. They are still the best quality with the most
filling and crunch of any fig cookies on the market so they are worth the extra expense over cheap no-name
brands.

This was a great deal online. My son loves fig newtons. I bought two boxes a while ago and they're perfect for breakfast, on the run, and for running errands. I throw the pack in my purse, keep some in the car, and in my sons bag.

If this is the first time you've considered tasting a Fig Newton then, Welcome to; America, planet Earth, or back from the dead. Nabisco has been baking these little gems for over 100 years and they are a part of American culture. If you actually haven't tried a "Newton" they are small cookies that consist of a soft cake outer sleeve with sweet fig jam in the middle. These packages are half the size of a regular package of newtons and come in a rigid plastic tray, inside a plastic bag, inside a small cardboard box. These were fresh and well within the "best by" date.

This is a great food for large breeds. It has glucosamine in it that helps with the common problem of hip displasia found in large breed dogs. I would recommend this to anyone with a large breed. When I switched to this food my Mastiff started walking better and now doesn't limp. I will never feed anything but Hill's and the other poster is severly misinformed.

Everything people  researched about what is in science diet is hear say. Then those people look up information about the contents they think they found about the food  and see that certain items are bad. Instead of using Google to "research" go to a vet store and physically see what they put in science diet dog food. My vet recommended I put my dog on science diet l/d because of liver issues and yes for the price this food  I had done a little online research and said man this can't be good for a dog. I went to the vet and read for myself what this  food contained and first thing it said was chicken ..so I kept reading and saw all the vitamins and nutirents are added in this food. I'm not going to sit here with a bag of the dog food and start writing down everything listed in this food because I don't have the patients to do so.  I encourage those to get up off the computer and go to a vet store and physically see for yourself what is in this food and quit listening to other people because they sound educated. By the way this food is dog wonders for my dog health.

Science Diet dog food is pretty pricey, but the overall effects of this product is great. I had been feeding my dog Iams Lamb and Rice for years (also a decent dog food) and after my local grocery store stopped carrying it, I decided to try Science Diet to see why my vet recommened it so highly. My dogs love the stuff. A big bowl of Iams would last a couple of days or sometimes three with my animals returning to the bowl to chow down here and there throughout the day, the same sized serving of Science Diet is scarfed down in one sitting with my dogs liking the bowl clean.

It has produced better 'dog biscuits' from them as well. Not that they had terrible stool from the Iams, but it is noticeably firmer and they don't use the bathroom nearly as much which lets me know they are digesting more of the material and excreting less waste. After a few weeks of them being on Science Diet I have also noticed their coats getting a healthier shine to them as well.

It is pricey stuff, but if my results are typical, I recommend the purchase.

This is a really lousy quality food made primarily of corn and byproducts. Corn is a cheap filler which offers little nutritional value and byproducts, well self explanatory (leftovers when all the nutritious bits have been taken out for human consumption). Dont let your vet talk you into feeding this to your dogs. Vets do not receive any nutritional training besides what is offered to them by sales reps from Hills! Whats ironic is that this "food" is no better then any low end grocery store brand, yet you're expected to shell out as much as better quality brands. Check out dog food advisor website for complete product rating and pick a food that is safe and nutritious to feed.

THIS BY FAR THE BEST SALT I HAVE EVER TRIED. I HAVE TRIED MANY SEA SALTS OVER THE YEARS, BUT THIS ONE BEATS ALL THE OTHERS HANDS DOWN. VERY EXPENSIVE, BUT WORTH EVERY PENNY.VELVET IS THE RIGHT WORD FOR THIS SALT BECAUSE IT FEELS LIKE VELVET ON YOUR TONGUE IT DISSOLVES WITH SUCH SMOOTHNESS AND NO HARSHNESS AT ALL. THE FLAVOR IS LIKE A MAGICAL OCEAN IN YOUR MOUTH. YOU HAVE TO TRY THIS ONE, YOU WILL NOT BE DISSAPOINTED.

We have a picky eater who has allergies.  A friend of our clued us in to the fact that dogs with allergies could have problems with grain in dog food.  Researched a little on the internet and turns out there's a lot of merit to that.  We selected Rachel Ray's because it had more meat than most (we just walked Wal-Mart and compared labels till we narrowed it down to two).  Our dog goes hungry before eating food she doesn't like and she gobbles this stuff up.  After 9 months we have noticed her allergies are completely cleared up as well.  Eye buggars and profuse feet licking (the vet said she's allergic to grass - really!)  So after 6 years, apparently we don't need the eye drops and the foot spray.  Just needed to change up her dog food.  Vet didn't mention that either... amazingly the guy who sells us the medicines - go figure!

I love the idea that proceeds from the sale of this product goes to rescue animals in need. That reason alone was what made me want to buy this product for my dog.

My dog still eats his Eukanuba puppy food, but I wanted to buy this too, to give as another form of treat. Since I'm still training him and since I love rewarding him, I like to try anything new I see that seems healthy for him.

Maybe when he is an adult I'll ask the vet if I can switch him to this dog food.

He does love the taste and if Rachel Ray feeds this to her Isaboo, it must be good.

Our dachshund dog does not like a lot of dry dog foods.
She loves NUTRISH. This is a good food that has been fed
our dog over 2 years.I'd recommend it to any dog owner.
I'm glad Rachel Ray put her name on this fine product.
I see other reviews and wonder if they work for another
dog food company. Our dog and Rachel can not be wrong ! !
Allen Graves Talent Oregon.

I have 6 dogs ranging from a small Pom to Beagle to APBT and they all really like this food. The first time I tried it I put it in their bowels along with some of their old food like your supposed to and they picked out and ate all of this and left the old food there!

I am not saying this is the best but its far far from the worst or even close.

Take some of the "non verified purchased" reviews with a grain of salt as some seem to have no life and go from brand to brand saying the same thing and wanting to push their views on others.

I was hoping that mega-bucks Racael Ray would put out a better dog food then this. Out of the first 10 ingredients, five are terrible and should not be fed to a dog that you love. Chicken Meal,Corn Meal,Soybean Meal,Corn Gluten Meal,Dried Beet Pulp-research these products for yourself, they are the top 5 items that cause allergies and food intolerance in animals among other things-that is 50% of the first ten items.
I expected better from Racael Ray! On the plus side however, her "Just 6" treats is one of BEST products out there, so I know she has the knowledge to make heathy foods for pets, just not willing to part with her money in her dog food line.
