I have a blk lab and a mastiff that went crazy over them. For my big dogs these are an execellent treat for good behaviour. The chicken bars are a quality item for a good price and I plan to purchase them again.

One of the pleasures of a Keurig is that you can serve a friend or a guest a cup of coffee that will please them and their tastes, not just what you brew for yourself everyday. I happen to enjoy strong, deeply roasted blends (the kind that you usually find at the specialty coffee shops which seem to be all over the place now). However, not everyone shares my enjoyment of a strong, full-bodied cup of coffee.

I have many friends who often say something like "I love coffee but Starbucks is just too strong for me". Enter Donut Blend. I have purchased many boxes of Coffee People's Donut Shop Coffee and it is a favorite for many of my friends and family. When Timothy's announced that they were coming out with the "Original Donut Blend" I got in line to try it. Here is my take on it:

It is certainly a little lighter than Coffee People's version but the taste is more complex with clean, bright notes of spice and low acidity. Surprisingly, it reminds me a little of the Peaberry Kona coffee that I brought back from Hawaii. It is a perfect blend for those who like their coffee black or with just a little cream and still want it to taste like coffee. If someone drinks several cups a day I think that Timothy's Donut Blend will not overwhelm their taste buds and will still taste fresh cup after cup. Mind you, I drink Newman's Own Bold Blend on a regular basis and will continue to do so, but if I am having more than two cups (for those "special" mornings when nothing seems to go right) or if I am having a cup later in the day I will drink this one.

Just rating it on what I want in a coffee I give it four stars, but judging it for what it is (and not just what I like), it fully delivers and deserves five stars.

Coffee People Medium Extra Bold, Donut Shop K-Cups for Keurig Brewers (Pack of 50) [Amazon Frustration-Free Packaging]

When my wife and I had to make a selection from more than 100 varieties of
K-Cups available for our new Keurig brewer, we made a rating sheet copied
from the Keurig listing of all the brands and types. We marked a rating
of one to five points for each cup we drank for several months. A rating
of one point meant "Perfect, couldn't be better", and five points
indicated "Don't like this one". We rated one to nine cups of each of 30
coffees evaluated. Timothy's Extra Bold Parisian Nights came out on top
with the most number one ratings.

We found that our preference was for the Extra Bold Roasts. We do not
prefer the weaker strengths. The Parisian Nights has great flavor and
aroma with no bitterness. This is a great cup of coffee.

We're now on our sixth Subscribe and Save shipment of 4 boxes every two
months which proves our satisfaction with this coffee.

I'm a chocoholic and have tried every mocha, swiss almond chocolate, etc. coffee I've ever seen, k-cup and not k-cup.  This is the best.  It may actually be better than German chocolate cake--it's like a no-cal, fat-free dessert.  My favorite way to drink it right now is to throw in a packet of Splenda and a little bit of Organic Valley chocolate soy milk, though it's good without sweetener or creamer.  It's chocolaty, with a hint of coconut.  I highly recommend for anyone who likes coffee (it's not a weak coffee, like most of the flavored kcups I've tried).  Also, Amazon's price for Timothy's is the best I can find, subscribe and save price comes out to around $0.37 a cup.  Enjoy!!

Timothy's Colombian Decaffeinated is a good tasting coffee for a good price. The savings are even better if you sign up for the auto renew program. Also, we have found that you can use each cup twice. Therefore it's like getting twice the quantity for the money. I checked with the Keurig company and they said by processing the cups for two cups of coffee or tea will not hurt the machine.

Best, Al

I bought a Keurig coffee maker for Christmas this year. We all enjoy different coffees in our household and making a pot of any type coffee is a waste. My husband is an espresso drinker, so I purchased Timothy's World Extra Bold Rainforest Espresso coffee to be made with the small setting on the coffee maker which uses 5.25 oz water. This makes it stronger, and he really has enjoyed this coffee. I really recommend this to anyone who enjoys a bold espresso coffee. He was born and raised in Italy and has purchased his coffee grounds from Italy for years to make an authentic cup of espresso. He is fussy about his espresso, so if he likes this one, it must be good.

Thanks to our purchase of a Keurig, I am a converted coffee drinker. Timothy's German Chocolate Cake is my absolute favorite. A delectable blend of warm caramel and coconut gives this coffee a deliciously sweet note while retaining a medium-bodied blend. It isn't too sugary - it's just right! In fact, my hubby and his coworkers all claim this as their number one flavored coffee too. It is scrumptious.

I currently use Coffee People's version of Donut Shop and when I saw Timothy's version I wanted to give it a try. This is not as full body as Coffee People's version but I really like the smooth low acidity taste. If you don't want a bold rich flavor I think you will love this smooth great tasting coffee as much as I do.

I purchased this item after reading through the reviews on Amazon.  I have to say that I haven't been disappointed. The cups contain a blend of arabica and kona coffee.  They brew with a nice aroma and color.  I would describe them as a medium roast with a medium strength.  Depending on your mood you can adjust the strength by adjusting the cup size and changing your creamer.  I've had success using whole milk, half and half, and light cream, with light cream being the best in my opinion.  The taste is mellow and very smooth.  I have read other reviews here that have described them as weak or tasteless.  This is simply not the case.  I would compare it to the coffee from Dunkin Donuts.  If you prefer your coffee extra bold, dark roasted, or strong (Starbucks) then you are just not going to be happy with these.  Also, if you prefer to "double brew" your cups to get the most for your money, you will be very disappointed.  These will brew a delicious cup of coffee, but only if you use them as directed.  Finally I have to say that Amazon is the best place to buy these.  They have the best prices and fast shipping.  Add this to your subscribe and save to get 15% extra off.

For those who like a bit more flavor than the soft breakfast blends -- this is the best of the bunch.  I have worked through most brand "bolds" and come back to this one every time.  Black Tiger is similar but does not have some of the added flavor notes found here.

this is the second time that i have ordered this product and as before the package was received quickly and without any complications, even with me being in Iraq.  I usually mark on the calender when i order and when I expect to have the product and the Product arrive sooner then the usual expected time.  thank you so much for Tea it always helps me relax after a long day while deployed in Iraq
This tasted bitter and smelled even worse. I'm sorry to say it was so bad I had to spit it out.  I don't recommend this flavor. I'm going back to the Banannamon ones which are delicious!

I'm not sure why everyone is hating on these; I think they are delicious. Perhaps they had some other taste in their mouth and it mixed with the snack. I found it very tasty. The pieces are crunch, but not overly hard like the freeze dried bananas that you get in trail mix. I would say they are just a little harder than a potato chip. I found that as you where chewing them little pieces would get stuck in your teeth, but it was a minor annoyance. Give them a try, if you don't like them then at least you know you tried them.
These are horrible.  Very bitter!  My son loves Funky Monkey products but even let these touch his lips and either would I.  Do not waste your money!
These taste so bad - almost rancid! I had purchased a similar bag at a grocery store (same brand- plain banana chips) so I was surprised at how bad these were. Perhaps it's the Acai berry in them??

Maybe its just me and the need to crunch late at night, salt rather than sugar. But these were bought to avoid pretzels or chips and they're totally delish, lightly salted w slight buttery flavor, good for dipping or just crunching with your favorite tea/juice/soda.
excellent stuff for ants. I have also used the straight powder which I like better because it does not smell. (You can smell this stuff through the unopened container.)

My husband uses this product, and for the most part he really likes it.  We started using ladybugs for the aphids, and they seem to do a better job on them, and they are more fun to watch!  He uses this for white flies on the grapes and citrus.
Arrived quickly, an d works great  Thank you for selling a product that works.

I applied this product to several plants including a small tree, some hostas and a rose bush. Within two days all of the plants I applied this product to were dead. The grass around the plants and some plants that just got overspray were also dead. It could be used for a weed killer but I wouldn't spray it on any plants you like.

My VET recommended this product for yard use to kill fleas which my Scottish Terrier is allergic. Since it is out of season, I had to order it on line. The service was prompt and has been applied to an acre yard. I purchased two bottles of concentrate for usage.

Now waiting to see if this helps the infestation normally in the South.
Linda
This is the best mulberry jam I have purchased online.  It is equal to the best home made mulberry jams that I have tasted.  I highly recommend this product.
Did not realize that the jam they sent was not what i ordered.  I ordered mulberry and they sent me crab apple that is why i didnt like it.  too late to send back because i opened it
Their products, at least the mulberry jam, do contain preservatives despite the info on their website leads you to believe. If you ask them directly they'll tell you.

When I was a kid, my mom would save money by making Tang with less than the recommended amount of powder. That's what this stuff tastes like. The first two ingredients are water and corn syrup, which I guess explains the flavor, like a thin orange soda that's gone flat. And despite the claim to be "Vitamin C Fortified," that's the only nutritional value this stuff has. It doesn't even have very much of that. So with little flavor, little texture, and little nutrition, I have to ask: what is this stuff? And why did I pay money for it?

Let me preface by saying that like most drinks on the market today this one only contains 10% and is mostly water. That being said, I LOVE IT! It's a great morning beverage for me for a couple of reasons. First, its a nice portion and can carry me all the way up to lunch at work. Second, I have a bit of trouble with orange juice as in the real deal, because my stomach acids and such don't handle it like they did when I was younger and the blend on this has never given me heartburn even on  the most stressful days! In addition, the drink is consistent, can after can the taste is the same, which you can hardly say about other beverages in this category. Lastly, it has some nutritional value as well, albeit not as much as I'd like with 25% of the RDA but still enough to help fight off the office yuckies. I can purchase the product locally for $.99 a can and when I initially purchase it here on Amazon I was able to find a seller for around $.75 a can and with Amazon Prime it was a great savings.

...and that title's saying something. This doesn't deserve to be passed off as "orangeade" - the picture on the front is a massive lie. "Orangeade" is a flavor different from orange juice (apparently), but Arizona fails here. Take any orange drink you've had before, and half the quality. That's about what you're going to get here, folks.

I am not convinced this product is organic and will therefore not buy it again. The packaging on this product leaves me wondering how organic "Healthyway Organic Goji Berry" really is. There is no independent verification authority to confirm that this product is really organic. As far as I can tell, it is not certified organic by any authority other than the supplier and distributor. The 'Nutrition Facts" on the label have some strange entries like "Quantity of Heat" and "Thick Protein" which I do not understand. They sound like direct translations of Chinese to English. It is a "Product of China" as are most goji berries I have seen. My concern at a time when there is so much bad publicity related to food products coming out of China is that this product may be "organic" in name only and not in fact.
I have ordered these several times and each time everything comes on time and, of course, the berries are wonderful.

Bought these twice now. Are really good and good for you. Different than what you might be used to but I eat them by the handful or put in my cereal. Loaded with antioxidants. Recommend you give them a try.

I normally get my goji from Asian markets at a cheaper price but since I don't get over there too often (kind of a drive) I decided to buy them online.  Good packaging, great health benefits, lovely berries.

Kar's sweet & salty mix tastes great to me. Everyone I shared them with enjoyed them. I was expecting the raisins to be on the harder/smaller side. The raisins in the case I received were moist and plump. I will be purchasing this product again.

UPDATE
I'm back for more. Thought I would add this information for anyone who is interested:

Beans arrived and were promptly ground and brewed. Upon tasting I noticed the coffee was a fair bit weaker than I remember when visiting Sant'Eustachio in Rome. 3/4 through the can of beans I flipped over the can and noticed the date. 2007. Wow. Talk about super expired out dated beans.

Given the other reviewers postings -- I'd give up and just buy beans from somewhere else. It won't be the same but won't be as disappointing as these ones.

We have been using the espresso grind of Sant' Eustachio for some time as an alternate to our more robust Italian espresso at the American Espresso Coffee Cafe, in Garner, Iowa. It is the smoothest coffee I have ever had. Besides the wonderful flavor, the gentle scent of wood in the aroma heightens the experience of this great coffee. It may very well be the "best coffee in the world". I know it is the best that I have every experienced. Our customers love it and often purchase a can from us for home use.
So glad to have found this coffee online. My husband remembers it from his many trips to Italy so I got it as a gift and he was thrilled! Tastes great

These beans make a delicious cup of coffee.  I was originally distressed by the sell-by date on the bottom of the can--it seemed that the beans were old, but communication with the seller confirmed that the sell-by date is the European standard not the American and my beans had two years to go.  The seller and I continued communication by e-mail and discussed grind, grinders, pots, and of course, the cafe in Rome where the fragrance of roasted coffee extends throughout the neighborhood.  All in all, my purchase was entirely worthwhile, especially because the coffee is so distinctive and delicious.  Buy it!

Low acidity and medium-level roasting... therefore it's a good one to drink as an espresso shot without milk. But it's also tempting to try and make as good coffee (with milk-foam and sugar) as they make at San't Eustachio in Rome. A bit hard to find in the US... that, as well as the fact that the beans originate in fair-trade farms, justifies the higher price than other Italian espresso.
The best coffee ever available now from Gustiamo in the Bronx.  Great product, speedy delivery, affordable price.  Don't have to return to Roma every time we need more.  Highly recommend.

I came across espresso made from these beans at my friend's place in Amsterdam - who told me about this little cafe in Rome that sells the best coffee and how she lugged several pounds back to Amsterdam. A month later, and once I had returned home to San Francisco, I had invested in an espresso machine and the only thing missing were those beans. What do you - it's available through Amazon - just incredible! This espresso is for the serious drinker with taste buds that only appreciate exclusive Italian coffee. The seller shipped on time, great service too.
Smooth,mellow yet flavorful coffee good for anytime of the day. I am impressed by the company's dedication to customer satisfaction. Will purchase again.

Ever since I learned I can not eat cheese made from cows, I found good substitutes with goat cheese.  However, once I found P'tit Basque, I've not missed cow cheeses at all. It's creamy yet firm, is delicious, has wonderful nuances of flavors. P'tit Basque is my favorite cheese of all time.

I read Ceylon was the cinnamon used before it became more expensive.  The US changed to the intense cinnamon we have now.  This has a very subtle flovor, very pleasant.  I have used in several dishes with excellent results.  The only drawback is the difficulty grating it; it is as hard as cinnamon bark.

I had my doubts, I did.
But I mixed the concentrate with skim milk, put it in the microwave, and I had a mug of bliss!
It's been awhile since I had chai at a Starbucks, but I don't recall it tasting any better than what I made at home with the Oregon concentrate.

I use the Oregon Chaie Sugar-free Latte mix every morning. It has replaced my McDonald's Iced Coffee addiction. I began using Oregon's product to save money, but found that I prefer the taste.

That being said, I never would have tried it at the price offered by this seller. I get it for less than a third of the cost, even before factoring in the shipping.

Yeah, for the product. Boo for the seller's price.

I am in love with this sugar-free Chai. However I will still trek to Walmart or other large retailer to purchase it for about $3/32oz container. This online retailer must be insane if they think people should pay this price. Make the trek folks!
Delicious and 0 calories! I make it with water and a little nondairy creamer to keep the calories negligable.

I picked this up one day in a store due to my recent ban from sugar (I'm a gastric bypass patient), and I shied away from this for the longest time. One day I just got sick of coffee and decided to go ahead and jump-off the cliff and give this stuff a try. I made it per the instructions, but with vanilla soy milk (this milk was sweetned, which made the mix a tad too sweet for my taste), but it was DELICIOUS!

I had really MISSED my soy-chai latte's from s-bucks, but now that I've found this, and can buy my soy unsweetned, I know I'll be really HAPPY going forward!

Now, if I could just find this mix but unsweetned, it would really take the cake!

I googled Sucralose and found plenty of research to indicate toxicity.

I wish Oregon Chai would make a chai which has no sweetener; most people would prefer unsweetened chai these days, wouldn't they?

This company's chais are too highly sweetened. This is unnecessary. I have tried them and find them undrinkable.

NOTE to potential chai product makers. Make a highly spiced liquid chai which is unsweetened in any way, using only organic or at least natural ingredients. You would sell it.

I absolutely love this company...I've now ordered twice and never a problem....they ship very fast and curtious...I love them and actually will be ordering again this week,I use the pink hyamilian salt for the bath salts I sell...the sample salts I've tried are excellent...the Hawiian one is my favorite
Wild Turkey Boubon Sauce is the best.  I first had this in Kentucky and I will not use any other sauce since I have had this.  I recommend everyone using this amazing sauce!!!!

Yes, they are delicious. There is no doubt that the chocolate, peanut butter, and crisp, blend to make the most irresistible flavor ever invented, but to package them in 2 packs! Amazing. This would get a 4 star rating if they were individually packaged, but because of the pairing, this earns a full 5 star review.

I wish that the bars would hold up to heat a little bit better. Even my immense body heat melts the chocolate on my fingers, forcing me to have to lick them off. Possible infection to airborne pathogens can occur, causing vomiting, sickness or dizziness.

I also feel that they could have made the bars a little smaller; maybe bite size. Unfortunately, when you break the bar in half, you get crumbs. This can lead to ants on your floor, carpet or cement basement floor. Also, despite the risk of fireants, can pose a health risk to your dog, which we all know should not ingest chocolate in any way.

In the end, I think the bars are a well rounded treat that are made in everyone's favorite math shape, the rectangle; or, when looked at on an angle, the parallelogram.

I bought this product for my fiance for Easter.  It was gift to get her excited about up coming trip to Quebec.  Much to our dismay the product did not have a shelf life on it and with in a week it molded.  We can normally store cheese for a while in our cheese drawer.  The sad thing was we were both looking forward to trying it.

I'm Italian, and Gentilini were one of my favorite cookies growing up. Now that I live in the US, there aren't many things I miss of Italy other than food. And Gentilini are amonst those I miss the most. Luckily seems like Amazon is now carrying them. I love these cookies! A few cookies were broken, but all in all I'm really happy to have a reliable source og my favorite cookies.

for those of you who don't know a demerara sugar is here's a definition: Demerara is used as the generic name of a type of specialty raw cane sugar often used in home baking and in sweetening coffee. It is normally brown in colour--the natural colour of cane sugar. It takes its name from the Demerara colony in Guyana, which was the original source of this type of sugar.

This is the best sugar for coffee or tea. If you love coffee or tea, this is the best addition to your drink. I have been using this for 4 years and always find it to the be the best demerara sugar available.
I was and had been hunting for brown sugar cubes and this is the best price I found anywhere!!  I am thrilled with the outcome.

Found these wonderful little sugar cubes in a coffee house years ago and my wife and I enjoyed them so much so that we needed to get our own supply.  These are not only great with coffee but with hot tea as well and they sweeten the drink just right.

The product is good--I have had three orders so far. The problem is with the manufacturer's credibility. One box was much lighter when I picked it up even though it was closed when I examined it. It was about 200g  instead of 500g with sugar cubes freely moving on a bottom of the box. I have no idea what happened and it is impossible to report it to Amazon--missing links, circular instruction, no phone numbers, no customer support links. The buttons on most pages, even on Returns page are "Continue Shopping".

I started buying these about 6 years ago, the price was always around $4 a box.  Now they want over $6!!  My most recent order was early in 2011, and it will be my LAST.  There are plenty of other Demerara sugar brands out there selling for far less.  Save your hard earned money and buy one of those brands.  Paying $2 more per box just to have square cubes is insane in this economy.

Ever since we went to England many years ago, and we were served coffee and tea with cubes of Demerara sugar to use to sweeten our drinks, we have been hooked on using these cubes. Not only do they add seetness to our morning coffee, but bring back wonderful memories of our trip. These particular cubes are all we have ever used for many years.
THIS PRODUCT HAS ALWAYS PROVEN SATISFACTORY--IT IS DELICIOUS IN MY MORNING TEA AND I ALSO RECOMMEND IT AS TREATS FOR  HORSES
I've been ordering this quite a bit - always a good product. This last order had a few of the cubes broken but this is not the usual result. Will definately order again.

I just don't understand why none of my grocery stores carry these brown sugar cubes.  And I live in a big city - Denver !!  I did buy some once in another town.  But when you buy like this from Amazon, they are way cheaper by the box.  And it adds such a wonderful different flavor to my coffee.
I typically drink hot tea without sugar, but after trying the satisfying flavor of this natural cane sugar, I found it very refreshing.

Looking for the perfect "animal" cookie?  If you like cookies that tend toward the "shortbread" style, look no further.  If you want to please that special child in your life (or inside you), this is it.  I've also tried the chocolate chip variety from this same company, and it's great as well.  Enjoy.

Heinz 57 is a long-time favorite of mine. I always found it funny that they call it a steak sauce. Steak is about the only food I *don't* use this sauce on. It's great for french fries, tater tots, chicken, fish sticks, burgers, and pork chops. Below are a few of my favorite ways to use Heinz 57:

* Mix 1/2 Heinz 57 and 1/2 ranch dressing for a great dipping sauce for veggies, kind of like thousand island, but tangier
* Mix melted margarine (never butter!) with Heinz 57 for one of the best wing sauces ever. Add your favorite hot sauce for more heat, but the pure mix is just about perfect and reminiscent of the infamous Buffalo Joe's in the Chicago area. You can add garlic powder and onion powder to taste, too.
* Put a touch of Heinz 57 in your scrambled eggs or omelet before you cook the eggs. Adds a nice flavor, almost as if they've been scrambled with veggies.

The plastic squeeze bottles are the best way to go, too. It makes it easy to get the sauce out, for whatever purpose. I don't buy it in glass anymore.

I know, I know: "real" restaurants frown upon this. You can't even get it at Outback, at least not around where I live. They consider it more like cheap condiment than real steak sauce. But I like it; it's got a tad of zing, and it goes with so much more than just meat. You can add some more heat if you want - just stir in what you want. I say sauce the way you want to. This quantity and size of bottles is the only way to go, and it compares very favorably to supermarket prices, given no tax or shipping.

Well, it's a steak sauce, so what's to say?  I've always like Heinz 57 for its tart and complex taste, but some people might not, so it's subjective (surprise!).  I'll say that this deal (4 x 20 ounce bottles) for around $22 is a great price.  My local grocery stores charge about $5-6 for ONE 10 ounce bottle.  If it takes you a long time to go through 4 large bottles, give one away to a friend who shares your taste.  You'll still come out ahead!

Great flavor either as is or add to Heinz Ketchup or your favorite BBQ sauce/marinade for an added zing. Excellent as a dipping sauce for tenders, fries, OR's, fish & chips, etc. Great on burgers, dogs, chicken or beef cheese steaks, grilled sausage, brats, even breakfast sausage patties...

I'm not going to get too excited about soup in a can but if you are 1200 miles away from the soup pot, this is an acceptable alternative. I sprinkle a few fresh bacon crumbles in mine since the caned version has the flavor but lacks the texture.

This coffee is right up there with Kopi Luwak Coffee and if you've ever tasted it you'll know what I mean. I love this coffee and the best thing about it is that it doesn't cost as much as Kopi Kuwak coffee. I'll be buying a lot more of this coffee I promise. It has no bitter taste to it at all like the coffee we buy from the stores. It has a rich, full flavor that will sooth your taste buds. If you haven't tried this coffee you are missing out on a very pleasurable experience.

I love coffee, I drink it two times per day/every day. I expected this coffee not to be so good because of a few bad reviews that I read but I like it. I would definitely buy it again (different type bec I want to try new things). I wouldn't say that this was the best coffee in the world ever but it was good for me. Definitely million times better than Folgers, Maxwell, Sam's Choice coffee's and the Kroger brand coffee-not as good as Starbucks but cheaper than Starbucks so I think it is a good buy.

I have never been a big coffee drinker. But this is a very good coffee. The most important requisite for good coffee to me other than flavor is smoothness. And this coffe delivers that in abundance.
Great coffee! Great price!

This is an excellent value, a smooth, exceptional taste for a great price.  Unlike so many other American coffees, Costa Rican is both distinctive for a lack of bitter aftertaste and a full flavor.  I have served to guests for breakfast and after dinner with equal comfort that this is a great coffee.

I have found that buying this coffee through Amazon is convenient, reasonably priced (esp if you don't pay shipping), arrives timely, and is of good quality. The Costa Rican beans appealed to my taste alittle better than the Guatemalan.

This coffee is so good!  Rich flavor, not acidic, fabulous aroma!  I've had friends in from all over the country and they are ordering it now.  I find I use more per pot than I would of other coffees, but the flavor is always rich and not bitter or acidic.
Great by itself or use it to blend with other grinds. Medium roast isn't as bitter tasting - no matter how much you grind it.

I bought three different varieties at the same time:
Panama Bouquet Blend, Costa Rican Blend, and Guatemalan Blend

Of the three, I liked the Panama Bouquet Blend the best overall, with the Costa Rican Blend a very close second. The Guatemalan Blend is fantastic too, but it has a slightly heavier chocolate note and a dark acidity that I tend to shy away from (but Starbucks drinkers will like it better).

For anyone that has actually been to Costa Rica, and you are searching for that same cup of coffee that you were served at the resort/hotel, this might be it. I had the occasion (twice) to have to do some work in Costa Rica, and then afterward was frustrated at my attempts to find the similar lovely rich-cocoa taste that I'd had, until now. This is it. This is the real MCoy.

In my world, only the (Copper Moon) Panama Bouquet Blend might be better, but the Costa Rican Blend is a bit more chocolaty, and has a bit of acidity that lets you know it's coffee and not a hershey bar. Even though it has SOME acidity, I don't mean that it has anywhere near the kind of acidity that you will find anywhere else on the planet. This is smooth, and rich, great aroma, chocolate finish. Only the Panama Bouquet Blend has less bite than the Costa Rican Blend has.

I will re-order this myself, because I like it best in the afternoon (I always have morning and afternoon coffee, Panama Bouquet in the AM, and Costa Rican Blend (or Guatemalan when the mood takes me) after lunch).

I had high hopes for this coffee.  I was quite disappointed.  Costa Rican coffee is, generally, my favorite. This is actually a blend of costa rican and something else.  The taste was bitter instead of the smoothness I find from coffees from this country.  I would rather drink fulgers instant coffee than this.  It's cheaper and tastes better.

This is the second time I've made the mistake of ordering a food product from Amazon.com and received close to expired product!

BEWARE.... BEFORE YOU ORDER....
YOU CANNOT RETURN FOOD PRODUCTS. SO, IF THEY SEND YOU SOMETHING THAT IS CLOSE TO IT'S EXPIRATION DATE, YOU'RE STUCK WITH IT!!!!!

Although customer service did refund my money, the fact remains...they shipped me old product just to clear it out of their warehouse. Why would you trust a company that does that, not once, but twice?

LET THE BUYER BEWARE!!!!!!!!!

This cheese sauce is amazingly delicious. It is quick & easy to make, turning any bag or box of macaronis or noodles into mac & cheese. Also great if you add a little marinara sauce to it. I ordered 2 boxes of it, & they arrived promptly & in good condition. def would recommend this product from this seller. great product, great service, great price.

Normally love this product and was excited about the individual packaging, HOWEVER, the cookies had a funny plastic-like taste to them.  Wondering if the plastic in the packaging off-gassed into the product.  Blek.

if you want to buy more then what they offer here try thenutfactory. smallest order you can get is 2 pound and it does have a lot more flavor then these here do. but if you like small packages then these here are just fine. i eat these here all the time
Great snack with lots of crunch crunch and spice.  Product as described and fast shipment.

This mix is superb in taste, easy to mix up, just add water. It rises easily and bakes well. The best product for sweet rolls I have ever used. The taste of the batter reminds me of a cream cheese pastry batter for rugelach. Just ordered some more of this. I used this mix to make sticky buns, but I used a lower temperature setting per a cookbook recipe, and baked them at 350 degrees for about 25 minute. They were yummy!!

Amazon, please keep this in stock. It is a Winner!!

The label is very inviting and the product is very tasty and satisfying.  If you love tomatoes -- and I do -- you will like this product.  I add it to any dish where I want to boost the impact of the tomatoes in the recipe.  And an added health benefit is that processed tomato products are even higher in lycopene than raw tomatoes.  Lycopene for your health, Contadina for your tastebuds.

I like these pumps, but like any pump, they require cleaning every so often. The less frequently you use them, the more you need to clean them, especially with the white choc sauce. I wrap the opening to the white choc pump with plastic wrap to keep it from drying out. Just remember, you are using a sugar liquid with this... it may crystallize and need to be cleaned with hot water =)

I got the bottle of chocolate and pump as a gift. Worked great at first. Then, it quit pumping chocolate. As the bottle was still over 2/3 full of syrup, I realized that the shaft of the pump only reaches 1/3 of the way down the bottle. Really?! Do enough morons really run Ghirardelli that this passes for a decent product?! It's nothing short of remarkable. If it were my company, heads would roll.
If you buy these sauces directly from Ghirardelli, they send you a free pump with every bottle.  Don't pay for one!

Simply put, it doesn't stay primed. I had to repump and prime daily --- and BTW, I didn't like the ghiradelli sauce AT ALL.
Very disappointing.

I discovered this while vacationing on the Big Island of Hawaii.  It has a pleasant, very tart and fresh taste - so unlike most sugary jams and jellies.  The passionfruit flavor is very prominent.  It is a bit runny.  I love it on toast.

Tastes great with Holsum brand Peanut Butter, Jif is good too, but Holsum is my all time FAV, and amazon doesn't carry it.

These are great snack crackers, that go with milk, rice milk or coffee, but this price is really high. I was expecting/hoping 18.00-25.00 for 6 boxes, not 54.00. Discounts go for about 3.50 a box [ food 4 less/ultra ]....retail like at Jewel is over 4.00
I grew up with this graham and this taste.  So far nothing else comes close.  Amaazon's price seems way too high.
Good job on the new packaging.  Still not resealabe so go soggy unless you wrap in saran wrap, and now you need a pair of scissors to open them.  Good job.

I love Nabisco Grahams, but according to this ad, each 14 ounce box is over $8.00.
Are you freaking kidding me?!
the flavor of the product is great in every thing i have used it in and i will but more soon and try other products.

I was given this product as a gift a couple of years ago. Up until that point I thought all "bases" were the same. NOT SO!! Minor's has more flavor and tastes fresher than anything I have ever used. I cook with  all the bases but I'd say the flavor that gets the very most use (on a daily basis) is the chicken. I could not live without them all. Thank you Minor's, for making a product that is so worth purchasing and using! Can't live, or at least cook, without my Minor's!

Very nice, good tasting oil. This is the first time I've had this type. Want to try it to make ice cream like Alton does on "Good Eats". I must say though, that as far as nut oils go, I prefer the Hazelnut Oil from Samur, France. To be fair, though, I haven't tried this in a salad, yet. The flavor is good, true, and rich, though. Definitely worth a try, if you like Pistachios!
This oil is amazing! Really wakes up your salad and is great along side a high quality balsamic to dip bread in.
I needed pistachio oil for a specific beet recipe.  This oils works perfectly.  I even like the small size so the oil is used before it gets rancid

I am not the kind of person who hears about a miracle cure and rushes out and buys it. The tops of my feet and ankles were starting to hurt, I am a UPS driver and it had been a rough peak season and every year I am getting older and every peak seems to be getting harder. At first I thought I was getting gout , although the symptoms didn't quite match up. I looked up remedies online ( I hate taking prescription drugs needlessly, sometimes the cure is worse than the problem) Tart cherry juice was supposed to flush Uric acid from your system. I didn't have gout but the tops of my feet and ankles stopped hurting in about three days of using the juice. I bought tart cherry pills from Whole Foods they work but not as well as the juice. Hey it worked for me , I'll continue using it

this is a sinfully tasty low carb snack..but  beware of sweetner malitol..eat too many and poops will rule your day!!!..russell stovers has entered the low carb..sugar free snack market with a bang..enjoy!!!

Buyer Beware Please! This sweetener is not for everybody.  Maltitol is an alcohol sugar and can be undigestible in the body.  You will know a short time after consuming it if you are one of the unsuspecting many who cannot digest it by the extreme intestinal bloating and cramping and massive amounts of gas a person can experience. Nausea, diarrhea & headaches can also be experienced. I learned my lesson the hard way years ago when I fell in love with the sugar-free chocolates suzanne sommers used to sell.  I thought I'd found sugar-free chocolate nirvana at first taste but the bliss was short lived when the terrible side effects of maltitol kicked in.  The discomfort was unlike anything I had ever felt before.  I blew up like a balloon and had very painful abdominal cramping.  As the symptoms passed, this too was very unpleasant.  Though hard for me to believe a low calorie sweetener could be the culprit, all symptoms were gone when I stopped eating the chocolate. My hunch it had something to do with the maltitol were unfortunately confirmed for me about a year later when I purchased some delicious sugar-free popcorn at my local market.  The taste was amazing and while I was looking at the label wondering what could possibly make this yummy, new sugarfree treat taste so good, my heart sank when I followed the little asterisk next to sugarfree sweetener* down to the very bottom of the label and read "maltitol" in tiny little letters! Thank goodness I'd eaten only a little. I still ended up with all the same side-effects but for a much shorter duration. Some people can use maltitol to their heart's content but others, like me, can have a bad reaction to it. In case you're like me, ... it's not you ...it's the maltitol!

These sugar free snack bars are amazing. Taste like the regular sweetened bars. I agree with the reviewer who warns about eating too many, though. They do have a laxative effect if you overindulge.

However, the price, $9.99 is ridiculous! They are $3.99 on the Russell Stover's website, and at Rite Aid. (Sometimes less at RA if on sale). Please, don't be fooled into paying so much for a box.

A box of 5 for 9.99?
What happened to the case of 5 boxes for 37.95?
This single box price is a rip.
Its still the best of the 3 bars made.

THis product is wonderful. I cannot have sugar and it really takes like the real thing. Love it.
This is a must have for low carb dieters. Give it a try. You wont be sorry

awesome product..no aftertaste at all..low in calories and sugar free..I have one or two each morning and it has helped me lose wieght over the last 18 months.Product arrived in 3 days and all the bars were fresh and in good condition..

The order arrived in a timely fashion & was well packed including an ice pack to keep the bars from melting.However, I ordred "Chocalate Delight" but received "Cinnamon Bun" instead. Upon reading the ingrediant list my mom discovered that the bars contain hydrogenated palm oil, a transfat. After a call to Russel Stover Candies, whence the bars were shipped we discovered we would have to do a return/exchange through Amazon. Well the bars are tastey & the whole return process seemed too convoluted to deal with so we'll keep them or maybe hand them out on Halloween to bad children.

I was skeptical at first, but I wanted to give this product a chance. I've been having hot flashes for 10 years! I went on HRT for awhile but had to come off (you can't stay on it forever). After I stopped the HRT, the hot flashes returned. I tried Restore, not expecting much. I carried it around because you're supposed to spray it as soon as the hot flash starts. I spray it on my neck and chest and immediately feel better!  I really like this product!
Product really works. I bought some for my friends and they happy with the results too. If you are having hotflashes, this temporary relief is for you.

I must admit, I was a bit sceptical about this product. Once I tried it, I was amazed as to how effective it was. A few spritzes and my hot flash dissapeared. I keep a bottle constantly within my reach. It is a phenominal product and a great find.
I tried this a few times - glad I got the smallest size because it didn't work at all for me.  Cool Off towelettes work much better.

Hot flashes, one per hour, 24/7, since complete hysterectomy in 1988.  Breast cancer in 1998, so no more hormones.  I use this product, 3 sprays on neck, and I get maybe 50% to 75% relief!  No kidding.

Thinking it would provide the relief I was so desperately seeking, I ordered this product with great excitement.  Unfortunately, for ME it was a bust.  I would compare it to throwing a cup of water on a house fire!  There are so many products out there that claim to help, but prove to be a disappointment.

I was so utterly impressed with the packing of the plant (didn't make a sound when I rolled the box to check integrity) and the care taken to ensure the plant was safe and warm (heat pack included and STILL HOT!).  Not only was I grateful that it took a full twenty minutes to unwrap my Orchid and the size and color were impressive, but I even liked the fact that the medium was dry, which decreased on shock and potential freezing of the roots if it were lost in the mail.  I just received this orchid yesterday and literally cried AND kissed the leaves! It was B E A U T I F U L !  I was impressed in the size and quantity of pseudo bulbs. In fact, I was so impressed that five minutes ago, I order THREE more Orchids from this grower. A Wilsonara Kolibri, a Degarmoara Hani Star of Unicorn, and an Odontocidium Catatante!  I cannot wait to get them. They will be kissed to death just like my Sharry!  I have wanted one since they started being available online and the prices and sizes baffled me. $80 or more for a plant the size I got from this seller!! Not only that, but the cheapest ones, which were about $30, were barely over four inches tall and only had one pseudo bulb!  I am close to tears right now. I cannot say how impressed I was. The Orchid pot was covered in paper towelsls which were taped atop the bark mix, the entire plant was wrapped in SHREDDED newspaper INSIDE more paper wrapped around that AND taped THEN covered in packing peanuts AND the heat pack was TAPED to the box, so it didn't knock around and damage the Orchid! I have NEVER seen someone take such good care of a plant. I had another order arrive the same day from another company, in which I had ordered two Maranta Prayer plants. The soil was only covered with tape, nothing really to keep it in the pot (soil actually came through the bottom of the box) and they were set in the box unprotected and only surrounded by a few packing peanuts. The box was way oversized, the heat pack was ice cold, the plants could be heard moving just by tipping the box. Needless to say they were in complete shock! That is what I usually expect, and I prepare for it. This I was NOT prepared for. This order I am beyond pleased with. I cannot wait for the three I just ordered today. You have my total thanks and the packing is why I came back. Well, and the price. Haha. Thank you eternally.
Amazing!  Amazing!  Plant was received very nice and healthy, bigger than the picture.  Nicely packed.  Mailed to me on Saturday, received on Monday.  Thank you!

wonderful little seedling. Can't wait for it to get big enough to flower. It was well packed with shredded paper around the leaves and pot, then wrapped with paper and taped well. the outer box was of a heavy cardboard and very well taped closed. There were 'fragil' 'handle with care' and 'do not freeze' labels all over. shows that the people that did the packing really care about their product. Everything was just as I hoped it would be.

I had this shipped to a very dear friend who has taken up orchid growing. I didn't see the orchid myself yet, but my friend was beyond thrilled with it. It arrived in perfect condition (must be some brilliant packers at this grower) and it ws a very healthy specimen that she was excited to watch grow. I would definitely use this grower/shipper again based on my friend's report.

My orchid arrived within about 2 days after I ordered it and was perfectly packaged and healthy. Please do remember, it is a seedling and will take up to two years before it is mature and flowering! I've had mine for a month and a half now and it is doing beautifully!

This was a great deal for a chocolate orchid, which is quite pricey, and came in a well cared for manner as well as looking very much alive. It did not come ready to bloom as stated in the details of the item but it is on its way to blooming and think this is a very good product for a person who knows how to take care of orchids.

These decorations are perfect for whatever you are making for Valentine's Day!  Sprinkle them on cupcakes or cookies.  Dip pretzels in chocolate and sprinkle the chocolate before it cools.  Can be used year round for a fun sparkle of pink/red on your desserts.
These were exactly what I was looking for to add a finishing touch to my Valentine's Day cookies!  Arrived quickly.

The taste of this Balsamic Vingear is very good for the price!!! Vinegar comes in a spray bottle wonderful for salads & cuts down on waste when you added to anything else!!! Vinegar comes in a six pack each bottle 8.5 Ounces.Price $33.25 for six pack but some of the Very Best sells for Over $100 a 4 Ounce bottle. I never tasted that Quality but like I stated earlier DeLallo tastes deliteful & its made in Italy!!!

I am a nurse that has suffered with GERD or acid reflux. After also suffering the side-effects of medications like prilosec, I was introduced to this product. By the time I finished the bottle, I no longer needed the medication. It has beneficial enzymes that aid in the breakdown of your food, it enables you to absorb more nutrients, and helps you achieve regularity if you don't already have it. In addition to that, it helped my whole family reduce allergy symptoms. Even if you have great insurance that will cover the cost of your meds, this alternative is worth every penny. Trust me--I'm a nurse!

I can tell by the packaging that this product was geared for kids, and it makes for a completely trustworthy snack. But I have to say that I loved it too! I'm currently on a kick to eliminate refined sugar from my diet, and it's been a challenge. But products like this one make it doable.

Bear in mind that this isn't just dried fruit, it's freeze-dried...devoid of moisture. That may sound unappealing, but it's really good--the texture is crunchy, and you can soak it in your mouth for really long flavor. There's no added sugar in this, but it's really sweet on its own. I use it for dessert or whenever I need a sweet fix.

I absolutely LOVE this stuff! I love the crunch, and knowing I can eat the whole bag guilt free because it is a healthy low calorie snack. So far this is my favorite flavor, but I still need to try the pineapple lime ~ I can't wait!!!

I've tried nearly all available low calorie freeze-dried pineapple snack treats.  "Funky Monkey" ranks at the TOP of my list!  This wonderful freeze-dried pineapple snack is imported from Brazil.  It's all natural and gluten-free.  One one-ounce package contains 110 calories.  It has the best flavor of all the freeze-dried pineapple snacks I've tried ever.  The pineapple chips have a crunchy texture that's like eating candy.  If you live in California, you can find them at your local Ralph's Super Market.  Unfortunately my local Ralph's runs out quickly.  Thankfully Amazon provides me with a way to satisfy my craving for Funky Monkey.  Be sure to get the 1-ounce packages.  The 1/3 ounce packages are disappointingly small portions.  However, if you are dieting then go with the small packages.  They make a satisfying low calorie snack to get you through the day.  I highly recommend this product!
I like this flavor of the Funky Monkey snacks best.  It's tart and not too sweet.  This makes a gret snack to keep at the office or for the kids!

Being diabetic, I always carry one of these little delicious, no added sugar snacks in my purse, in case I need a pick-me-up to prevent low blood sugar. Another thing in its favor is this snack is gluten-free. Ordering from Amazon is fast, and they always seem to have the food products that I need.
My little guy loves these snacks.  I like that they are healthy, relatively mess-free (as much as anything can be with toddlers), and easy to take along anywhere.

This is delicious and my kids love it.  As far as I can tell, it's actually dried pineapple with guava dusted on it, rather than chunks of guava, as other reviewers have described.  Perfect lunchbox snack when the kids want something sweet and I want them to have something healthy!

Our family loves dried fruit as a healthy snack, but the Pink Pineapple flavor of Funky Monkey is beyond a doubt the best we've had. My 3 and 5 year old children and I eat it regularly. It makes a healthy dessert substitute, a delicious after-school snack, and a simple way to pack a serving or two of fruit in a school lunch box.

The pink pineapple product is made of freeze-dried, organic pineapple. A light powdering of guava paste gives it a subtle pink color and guava taste. This freeze-dried fruit is very crunchy, and I've noted that it stays crunchy with the package open much longer than other freeze-dried fruit products that seem to absorb moisture from the air quickly and turn spongey. Ew!

The .42 ounce size is a perfect size to put in a child's lunch box and delivers a full serving of fruit and 40% of your Vitamin C for the day. The 1 ounce size makes a reasonable snack for an adult, shared between two children, or for one hungry after-schooler. You will be surprised how quickly 12 packs of this versatile snack will be used.

Pink Pineapple Funky Monkey packages contain full servings of fruit, are gluten free, fat free, vegan, raw, all natural, 95% organic, and have no added sugar, color, flavors, or preservatives, . What's not to like?!

I had high expectations - 50% pineapple 50% guava
Turned out it is 100% pineapple 0% guava
I could not find even a single piece of freeze dried guava in 4 packets i finished.

The freeze dried pineapples get 5 stars and the product is overall satisfying, though you will finish a featherweight packet in seconds and then have to resist the urge to open the next packet to fill a void. Since the company deceived me you get 1 star.
I wish they had included directions because it cost me some trouble shooting to figure out the proportion of milk to powder, but after a few tries, I got it down and it was deeelish!

Acana Grasslands is one of the only dry kibbles I didn't have to mix into another food (or transition in) for it to be accepted by my one year old cats. They dove right into it.

It's an all breed, all lifestage grain free kibble made by Champion Foods, who also produces Orijen. They are Canadian based and tout having regional meats delivered each day to add into their formula. They utilize regional ingredients and likely, regional suppliers. I'm cool with that.

I mix Acana 50/50 with other high quality kibble as part of my rotation. Acana kibble shape is round and flat. The colour is very dark and if you're transitioning from a light colour food you'll note kitty's darker 'output'.

I believe it's true Acana is more fish based than Orijen, but it's an excellent quality food which I'll continue to purchase. I like to buy the smallest bags available and plan to try Wild Prairie formula next.

This is the best dry catfood I have tried to date.  A friend recommended it and I can't praise it enough.  So good I was initially using it as cat treats to teach tricks while I was transitioning from their old food.  This is grain-free with stellar ingredients and is sold for decent price by Amazon and most of the better online pet stores (petfooddirect, Mr. Chewy, etc.).  Good stuff and worth every penny - and doesn't cost any more than the cheap stuff in the long run because with this you are feeding quality not quantity.
Obviously the candy was delicious, the packages inside the box were smaller than I find at the local stores.  shipping speed was good.

I was involved with a Teach-In at my daughter's school. Since my subject was the visible spectrum and how rainbows get created, this box of Rainbow Twizzlers provided the perfect handout (along with some diffraction-grating glasses). The kids went wild!

Since there was a pack or two left over, I tried a few of the Twizzlers. They were fruit-flavored and quite tasty when compared with the standard dark red Twizzler variety. My daughter (and son) loved them.

These were perfect party favors for our tea party. The girls loved them all. I would buy these again.
Nice variety.

I just had an adult Mad Hatters Tea Party and put a whole bunch of these lollipops in a vase as part of the centerpiece on each table, They are so detailed and beautiful and just made perfect Favors for the Ladies.

I ordered these to go in the Party Bags for my daughters 4th Birthday Tea Party! They were a hit. I never got to taste one, but it was the first thing the little girls grabbed and I saw happy, messy faces everywhere. They must have been tasty!

Thanks for the smiles.

If you are unfamiliar with miso find out about it.  If you know what it is be assured that this is the best.  Using a small amount is better than a large amount. Add this at the end after mixing it with a bit of water to dissolve. It should not even be simmered, add it and let stand.

Working outside in the summer or exercising can deplete your body of necessary water, electrolytes and energy. This is a good tasting low calorie drink that refreshes you and helps maintain a healthy balance of what your body needs. Each 32 ounce bottle has 4 servings and each serving has 20 calories, 5 Grams of sugar, 110 mg of sodium and 30 mg of potassium. It replaces the salt you have lost from sweating and the potassium helps your muscles not cramp.

This is an ideal drink for those lighter workouts or if you are diabetic and need to get refreshed quickly but don't need a lot of sugar. It contains the same electrolytes and hydration as the original Gatorade with the calories and 1/3 of the carbohydrates.

It is great for those hot summer days. It is best served cold and shaken before drinking.

The unit price here is not bad but the shipping is extremely high. It is a very good product.

Bookbinders White Clam Sauce makes linguini or spaghetti taste just wonderful. Sauce is great, but the clams are tender, and sweet, making everything taste terrific. Buy a lot of this because you'll want to have a lot on hand to serve surprise guests, or to secretly stash away, for yourself.

Preparation is easy. Make your favorite pasta, heat the sauce, and combine.

icq3

PS...Thank you again AMAZON for having this product available.

Picked this up at the Milk Pail Market in Mt. View, Ca. Later read that the company was local (San Francisco) and I was very impressed with the taste and quality! I even got my boyfriend to eat a stack of three and he HATES sweet food :) Needless to say we were VERY impressed.

I received the recommendation as a more natural healthy alternative to the more commercialized brands of avoderm, royal canine , and others.That have either reduced the quality of there food over time or bought out by larger pet food companies and drastically change the formuls. I was very pleased to have changed considering my english bulldog started to get allegies from those other foods. Her allergies eased dramatically once i started her on the Pinnacle. I find the food to be substantially better in quality and ingredient structure and heriarchy of the elements contained within. i find it equally comparable to Halo and Lonovo. The only negative is that if your dog has yeast problems inside and out then this product delivers its fair share of sugars(Carbs) from the potatoes which help fuel the yeast. i used for several months and would recommend to other dogs without yeast problems. good luck but, trying many types and finding the one that works is the best strategy.

My pointer mix has a sensitive stomach, and he also has a sensitivity to chicken.  This has been working really well.  Solid stools and no more noticeable gas!  My small dog, a havanese , is also doing well on it, but he has a strong stomach anyway.  And they both seem to love the taste.  As an added bonus, the pieces are small.  So that is helpful for my little dog.
Our dogs love this food and it good for them; no fillers, no corn, no wheat. It doesn't smell bad even though its made of fish. Highly recommended.
This is a good value for an excellent dog food. She loves it alone, but I usually mix in a little "Stella & Chewy's" so she will eat it all up at once. Has really helped her skin allergies!

I was looking for good quality limited antigen ingredient diet that has not had a recall in last few years. This is no easy task, but Pinnacle is one of those diet. I feed the Salmon and Potato to my chocolate lab who was having chronic ear infections since he was 9 weeks of age. As soon started diet at at 6 months of age the ear problem resolve with in a week. He is now 2 years of age and I have not even had to clean his ears since starting this diet. Reputable company, quality ingredients, good comparative price, and no recent recalls on diets. Thanks Pinnacle for producing a quality product for my pet.

I had ordered both fresh white trufflesFresh White Truffles 1 ounce ( White Alba Truffle) and some caviar close to a holiday weekend (on the Thursday before Christmas on Sunday) and I had done so without anticipation of getting them except in time for New Years. Shipping was noted as $6 for each of the 2 items I'd ordered.

Not only did the seller notice the 2 orders shipping to the same location and consolidated the shipping cost to $8 for both. But they obtained my phone number from Amazon, called me to tell me that normally they overnight these types of items in any event, but while they would happily upgrade for Saturday Delivery at no charge to me so I would have the order for Christmas, they had worries that there was possibly no Saturday delivery in rural area (I live in Bridgehampton NY and they were correct, there is no Saturday deliver here even from Fed-X) and so, to avoid the order sitting around unrefrigerated from Friday till Tuesday, they were calling to ask if they should hold the order and instead ship Tuesday for Wednesday.

Since I did not pick up my calls Thursday eve or Friday AM rather than just leave a voice-mail a call their job done, when I finally answered a call at 5:20 Friday, it was from a seller employee's cell phone, who had my order with him, in order to be able keep it freshest, pending an instruction from me, and so as to make absolutely sure they were following my wishes.

As you can imagine the items received were commensurate with that service, and when they arrived Wednesday morning they were perfect IN EVERY WAY.

And no matter how expensive the items (and they were the cheapest of their kind I found this season), this kind of service, while certainly also rare as the items themselves, is in my estimation, priceless.
We've enjoyed this tea.  The wooden box is also nice - lightweight and certainly not fancy, but a nice holder for the tea.

This product is by far one of the best cookies this universe has ever known. Tiny TRON discs of delicate and balanced crunch and chocolate that ebbs and flows like a dream landscape, reality becomes liquid candles and you are the wick... set yourself ablaze and eat these cookies.

They really are the best cookies, I'd place them side by side with those LU Cookies Le Petit Ecolier, The Little Schoolboy which can also be bought here on Amazon.

Why settle for boring cookies when you can eat the best?
When I got this product it was packaged a little tight but the chips WERE AMAZING. Got the product sooner than I thought I would. All over all great product!
Great product. The taste is on fire! The Takis got here weeks ahead of estimated time.  Only problem is it is a small bag.  I will have to order the bigger bags next time.

This are so good the little ones are the best and there hard to find in San Diego, Ca. They only thing is there expensive at this place wish they would cut you a better deal. But will still buy from time to time.

Wow, love the Spices and lime.

Spices Have a Real kick to them, and each one is well covered with them.

Hard crunch but good crunch. After all it is a tight rolled up tortilla.

Looking forward to buying more.
today i got my takis mini it came quick and fast it only takes 5 days for me to get my.but when i got it it taste great it came in a big bag and it was good
Great price daughter enjoyed. Perfect little snack bags. These would be perfect as party favors too. I will most likely order again.

The products great! we love it and that is why we ordered it all the way from back home. We miss getting them all the Time in San Diego,The shipping started off slow but when they did ship they used 2 day so it is all good.

As noted by others, this item arrived days/weeks ahead of the projected arrival (I've purchased it twice).  The packaging by Party Favors Club is well done; the chips are not crushed during delivery.  My boyfriend and I find the Fuego Takis to be addicting, so having a 200 calorie snack size helps with portion control--and a little really does go a long way!  The corn chips are crunchy, pleasantly spicy-hot, and have a perfect touch of lime.  Yes, I wish they were a little cheaper . . . but having 25 small servings does help them last longer than a single large bag would last in my home.

Sadly, NO. This little boy in a hospital three states away from here wanted ONLY this package of Taki's (25 pack) from his father when he had to be transported 2 1/2 hours from his home in an ambulance....BUT...the product took too long to be delivered through the mail (?) apparently and the young boy was discharged about four or five days after admission so left the hospital before his package ever arrived. I assume it did arrive, never heard from the hospital and it was never forwarded...sorry!

We bought this from a candy shop a couple of years ago. Make no mistake - this is not chocolate and it has no chocolate flavor. The orange in its name refers to the color it changes - not to its flavor.

The directions call for you to mix the powder with hot water. If you do this it will taste terrible. It becomes only mildly acceptable (to some) when mixed with hot milk rather than water.

Its only real use is that the empty cauldron can be used for a decoration around Halloween.

I totally agree with the other reviewer.  I bought this (although I bought it with a Harry & David label on it so it was probably more expensive!) and no one in my family liked it.  It is not hot chocolate - more like what they call "white chocolate".  I thought it would be a chocolately orange flavor, yum.  Neither chocolate nor orange flavor.  Only the color is orange.  A big disappointment, I ended up throwing it out.  The cauldron is cute, but the words around the edge don't come off so it's not really reusable.

Well I wish I had seen the two reviews above before buying this! It did turn orange, but it certainly was not chocolate. It tasted like a overly sweet and yet bland orange cream. Wreaked havok on my innards! Very glad we did not serve it at our Halloween party as planned.
If you are like me and just like the cauldron you can pick it up at Walgreens for just a little above four dollars.They have the coffins as well.
I'm always looking for things to put these toasted seeds on. Great in salads, meat loaf and on sandwiches. Love them!

I never say it but I say it today...OMG! These are the best sesame seeds I have ever tasted!!!!!!! I was shocked at how crispy and tasty these sesame seeds are right out of the bottle.  It was difficult to stop eating them.  I use these in cookie recipes, on salads, on steaks, on PBJ sammies, in yogurt. These guys did an awesome job with this product, especially for the price. You will not be dissapointed.
I have had problems with high blood pressure so I changed to a low sodium diet. This product really helps me in making sauces and soups without sacrificing taste.

Bonne Maman has done it again - captured the natural flavor of the fruit. In the case of Bonne Maman Grape Jelly, the muscat grape flavor is so true that you almost feel you are using jelly Grandma made. The color of this jelly is a reddish-purple; it is a clear, fresh hue - exactly like that of the muscat grapes from which it is made. The consistency is not so firm that it does not spread easily, but not so runny as to flow off the sides of your bread/toast.

I have found Bonne Maman Grape Jelly at our local grocery stores. It sells there for $3.49 - $3.99 per 13 ounce jar; I have not yet seen it in some of the off-price retailers who generally stock a limited supply of Bonne Maman products.

If you are tired of the grocery store concord grape jellies which taste like sugar and little else, I recommend you try Bonne Maman Grape Jelly. It has a natural, true grape flavor and is worth the extra cost. I hope Bonne Maman will expand their product line further and introduce a concord grape jelly/preserve.

I bought this coffee at a local store.  It is truly the worst coffee I have ever had.  I first noticed the flavor was almost like burned plastic.  When I poured it out it looked pale, not dark. There were big pieces of what looked like pieces of grass or wood.  It had almost no aroma, but the bag was not broken.
I ordered this because I was looking for something to replace Millstone Foglifter after the price got so outrageous.  Wile not quit as rich it fit the bill will reorder

I took a chance on this coffee becaused the only rating gave it a one star.  I was pleasantly surprised.  I make my coffee one cup at a time with a mesh camping filter and drink it immediately thus getting all the benefits of the flavor before it leaves for the atmosphere.  Hopefully the quality control is such that your cup will also be pleasant.

This is the worst coffee I have ever gotten from amazon.
Not worth the time and effort I spent reviewing all the coffees at the site.

So, I tried some of this coffee , I made a pot about five Minuets ago Ill try to describe for you what i'm tasting . Its ok , Its light but, not to light ,well rounded and I slight Vanilla taste witch I usually sum up to poor quality coffee . I think some people would really like this one , I prefer the Jamaican blue but , This is Vary good also .Ill try this on some friends I know like this kind of coffee .Coffee is pretty much personal taste , although I like something better doesn't mean its not great coffee .

I ordered this bag of coffee just to get my order up to $25 for free shipping but I won't ever order it again.  It's hardly even on par with grocery store stuff, a little stale smelling too  - it's sure no Peet's Coffee!  Of course Peet's costs a fortune!

Hands down this is one of the best prepared soups out there. Add 4 1/2 to 5 cups of water.  After it's cooked (about 30 to 45 minutes), I add yogurt to the bottom of the serving bowl, pour in the soup and mix. The yogurt helps to enhance the other spices. I sometimes add salt to this soup.  Yum!  It really is a favorite in my home.  If you love soups...try it.  You'll be pleasantly surprised at how good it is.

I love Sadaf products in general and their soups are so yummy. Really easy to make and taste so good. Great dinner/ lunch for winter time and you don't have to go through few hours of prepration. I also took them to our ski trip last year and had the Ash ready for 20 people in 50 min.
I was looking for something with a good taste and less "chemical" ingredients so I decided to give this a try. BINGO! This is great tasting.

Good opportunity to sample some of the various Timothy's k-cup selections and find your favorites. You can't beat the convenience and consistency of the k-cup system. Since I don't see that Amazon provided a description of what's included in the variety pack.....

Includes two of each of the following varieties: Breakfast Blend, Kona, Parisian Nights, Espresso Extra Bold, Colombian Dorado, Italian Blend, Hazelnut, Colombian Decaf., Chai Tea, Green Tea ,English Breakfast Tea & Canarino.

Great mix of flavors. Just read the fine print. This pack also includes teas, decaf, and a lemon drink which is just horrible. My coworkers don't drink tea or decaf, so I won't be buying this mix again. For those that do, this is an excellent choice. The Timothy brand overall is our favorite for our Keurig.

While variety packs sound like a good idea, you should be aware that there is a reason you usually aren't told exactly what's in it. It's because almost always, the vendor throws in a bunch of flavors, blends, teas, and decafs that are not usually what you want. It can be a waste of money for most.

A much better solution, besides sampling a friends K-cup favorites, is to go onto the Keurig site ( http://www.keurig.com/KCupResults.asp?AllProducts=AllProducts&mscsid=HGR8G81WMFQB9NS0DN0EH4MKJREN8UAF ) and buy their low cost 5 packs. They usually cost under $3 and give you enough coffee to help decide what you might like. Plus, you'll know exactly what's in the smapler before you buy it.

It is also a great idea to visit the K-Cup Exchange on Yahoo http://groups.yahoo.com/group/K-CUP/ This site is an excellent source of K-Cup info and allows you to trade unwanted k-cups, and talk to others to find the best deals and brewing tips.

I too was shocked that a third of the k-cups in this product were tea or lemon beverages. Foolish me -- when I order a product called "Timothy's World Coffee K-Cup Variety Pack," I actually expect it to contain a variety of COFFEE k-cups. Having to order a minimum of two boxes from Amazon only compounded the problem.

I am giving this product one more star than it otherwise deserves because when I called the company to complain, they did send me one free box of just coffee k-pods. However, the combination of deceptive labeling and having to throw away a third of the contents of the box unused makes this a poor product choice in my opinion.

If this product contained only coffee k-pods, I would probably order it again because the coffee k-pods actually in it were pretty good, but I certainly don't recommend it now.

I have never ordered k-cups on-line before! Is it not deceptive, not informing consumers that the coffee is outdated, as mine was almost a year out of date. Now i am skeptical ordering k-cups again, also i have some more on the way as gifts, and hope these are not outdated!

Includes two of each of the following varieties: Breakfast Blend, Parisian Nights, Espresso Extra Bold, Colombian Dorado, Italian Blend, Hazelnut, Colombian Decaf., Green Tea ,English Breakfast Tea & Canarino.

NO KONA OR CHAI TEA,
they sent French Roast, Ethiopian Kimssa instead

It's hard for me the believe this myself but so far I have given 8 Keurig coffee makers away (five model B40s, two B60s and two B70s) as gifts and I always give this sampler to go along with the k-cups included with the machine. I feel that it includes a very good selection of coffees and teas. If someone does not like a particular beverage (some people NEVER drink tea for instance) the recipients have found that they can keep them on hand for guests. This does not include all of my favorites but it does have a very good mix. Here are some of the most popular:

Hazelnut: I don't know why but most of the women in my family (and many of the men) LOVE this one.
Rain Forest Espresso: If a person likes a full bodied coffee then this could be the one for them.
Breakfast Blend: A milder, medium blend that a lot of people enjoy.
Chinese Green Tea: This is becoming more and more popular in the US and my friends who drink tea like this K-Cup.
English Breakfast Tea: A classic.

And the not-so-popular ones:

Italian Hot Lemon Beverage: I have personally never met someone who liked this one. I am sure that someone does, just no one that I know.
Italian Blend: I usually like an Italian coffee but this one is not popular with my friends, family and guests for some reason.

There are others in this pack but in my experience these are the ones that the people in my life usually love and the ones that they avoid.

Hey, don't take the list of included flavors too seriously, I got different items in mine, and I suspect you will too... It was kinda fun to get the surprise flavors! Now if only they'd decide which flavors for which days, lol, I spend so much time just deciding which of the wonderful flavors to try each day!

p.s. Rainforest Espresso: way strong. Good, but strong. Consider having some flavored creamer around in case you find it to be too much (I usually don't, but was lucky I did today)

Great sampler just got better! They no longer have the hated "hot lemon beverage" and instead have replaced it with Kahlua flavored coffee! YUM! I just ordered 2 of these, arrived here in 2 days even with the free super saver shipping and here is what I was in the box:

-Parisian Nights extra bold x2
-Italian Blend x2
-Kona Blend x2
-Breakfast Blend x2
-Decaf Colombian x2
-Fair Trade Colombian Dorado x2
-Rainforest Expresso extra bold x1
-Hazelnut x2
-French Vanilla x1
-Kahlua coffee x1
-Original Donut Blend x1
-Mexican Organic x1
-Chai Tea x1
-English Breakfast Tea x1
-Chinese Green Tea x1
I love this coffee.  Timothy's is a good all-around coffee if you're not sure what to order.  It isn't too strong and the variety pack let me try all the different kinds.

I'm not what most people would call a coffee drinker. I love an occasional cup but I don't have to have coffee everyday. Being able to brew a single cup at home using my Keurig Brewer instead of running to St@rbuck$ saves a bunch of money. Timothy's World Coffee is some of the best tasting coffee around. I prefer the rich bolder blends. I got the variety pack, as it allows me to taste different kinds and find out what I like and what I don't. My shipment came very quickly and was well packed. I have been enjoying my occasional cup of java a bit more often since it arrived.

I do wish they would leave out the teas they included. I want coffee not tea. In addition, if I wanted decaf I would have ordered decaf. They could have left the decaf out too. Otherwise its a pretty good mix.

Yes, it does include tea, and a lemon drink, but now amazon does state that in the description.
What I found slightly disappointing was that I had mixed quantities of each item in the 48 pack. I had 2 of some drink and 4 or 5 of another. Makes me wonder if I was missing any flavors. Just be prepared for a true variety. I found Timothy's coffee's to be a much bolder, stronger taste than the Gloria Jean's variety I tried.
didnt know there was tea in the pack-wasnt specified anywhere. I dont like the tea that was in there,and wouldnt have ordered it. Some of the coffee pods were too weak.
This box contains a pretty good mix. I'm not a big fan of K-cup teas and could have done without those.
This box of k-cups has something for everyone: coffee in bold, medium, and decaf, plus tea. We opened it for Thanksgiving and everyone had fun choosing their own flavors.
I bought these for my parents. They LOVE them! There are at least 15 different kinds in each box. It's a GREAT variety of choices!

This is an excellent way to have a variety of different K cups rather than just having the same ones day after day. The selection is very good, includes a couple of de-cafs along with other blends. I like strong coffee and Timothy's blends are one of my favorites

I've had my keurig brewer for a few years now yet I've not had a chance to sample several of the varieties included in this pack. I especially loved getting to try the Kahlua (pass), Italian Blend (interesting), Kona (not as good as I expected), and Parisian Nights (definitely will buy) since those have piqued my curiosity for a long time. I just never wanted to order four dozen of each of those k-cups at a time. I was also curious on how well tea works in K-cups and have decided I will stick with Stash bags for now. This is a great way to find your favorite k-cups without buying box after box. It's also great to have for guests so they can have some variety to suit their palates. I wish all of the companies that make k-cups would do this.

*Previous lists don't mention the French Vanilla, which was incl.

I've enjoyed quite a few varieties of Timothy's (and others)K-Cups and had little to no problems with them. Cinnamon Pastry is one example of a coffee I really enjoy.

This variety pack however seems to be a mix of their least popular blends, or perhaps the batches that were slightly "off". And going off this experience I won't be trying any of the coffees in the pack on their own except for the Kona & Breakfast blends.

The tastes were dark (burnt), bitter and unappealing, each cup made me regret my choice to reach for the coffee mug. Not to mention the after effects were not pleasant, I actually could feel the crappiness of these blends for hours.

The French Vanilla was downright disgusting, I don't think they could decide if they wanted to make a soft vanilla flavor or a strong vanilla liquor experience and it's a horrible mix of the two.
