Also, as previously mentioned, nearly half the box is NOT coffee but tea's that sound... more interesting than appealing.

So if you're in for an adventure and don't really care about the taste of your coffee or tea, go for it!

Otherwise... consider sample packs directly through the coffee company, they cost less and give you better options.

The coffee was good, but there wasn't enough of it.  Ten of the 22 cups were tea or decaf.  A list of what's included needs to be added.  I wouldn't have ordered this had I known that there was so much tea in the pack.
Delicious cup of coffee anytime without the waste of making a full pot.  After searching other sites, found that Amazon.com had the best price.
Makes a great cup of coffee and the variety pack is fun because it offers you the chance to try flavors you normally wouldn't.  Timothy's is a high quality product.

I decided to try this variety pack, as I needed an assortment and it seemed my only option. It contains a nice variety of teas and coffees, but I was disappointed that there wasn't any hot cocoa. I don't really want to buy a whole box of cocoa but maybe that's my only choice. I'd like to see a variety pack of just teas or teas and cocoas but no coffee. Also, it would be nice if the amazon description told you what would be in the variety pack. I like Timothy's K-Cups very much.

1st off, this is what is in the box:

Two of each per 24 pack:
-Parisian Nights extra bold
-Italian Blend
-Kona Blend
-Breakfast Blend
-Decaf Colombian
-Colombian Dorado
-Rainforest Expresso extra bold
-Hazelnut
-Chai Tea
-English Breakfast Tea
-Green Tea
-Lemon drink

I bought this so my husband could try the teas (he is not a coffee drinker). I paid about $.33 per K-cup which is a good price, however I thought the coffees were not that great. I prefer the Green Mountain brand and I suspect for me, it will be worth it to pay a little more for them.

While I am getting over the sticker-shock of pod coffee, it's still cheaper than the coffee shop and I can keep my slippers on.

This will give you a chance to find the coffee style you like but the inclusion of tea makes this more expensive than it needs to be.

I recommend the Colombian Dorado. If you are a real fanatic, the Parisian Nights should tingle your taste buds.

If you can gauge how much you will use, Amazons subscription delivery gives you the best price.

Timothy coffee is my favorite brand of K-Cups. I have tried 20+ different K-Cup flavors and Timothy is the best when it comes to flavor and consistency. I subscribe to this variety pack and receive it monthly. I like the variety including the teas (the lemon stuff is weird). It is refreshing to have a different flavor everyday.

My wife loves the Keurig machine I bought her. I've tried the coffees and the K-cup system is the best coffee for the single-serve machines I've tried. Timothy's is very good coffee and at Amazon's subscription price it's more reasonable though still not inexpensive.

For me, I still brew single cups of Yuban with Melita paper filters. Way better & cheper.

This variety pack is AWESOME!  It is the best ever for my household.  It has 8 different coffee's and 4 different teas in it.  My only problem is that 1 of the coffee's is decaf, but my wife will drink those :)

I thought that I was getting a variety of coffee, not coffee, tea and hot lemon aid. There were very few products in this variety pack that I will use and I made the mistake of ordering the pack of 2.

terrific selection to get to know the product ... all different goodies ... coffee of various strengths & flavors ... several different types of teas & even an exotic hot lemon beverage ... great if you have a cold ... highly recommend !

I enjoy trying different kinds of k-cups, so this variety pack was perfect for me.  Not only were the coffees great, I also enjoyed trying the teas.  The lemon drink though, I'll save for adventurous guests.
pretty good selection and with the teas and the lemon drink, it provided something for someone who is not a coffee drinker.

Three of the 22 cups were TEA, not coffee...1 Chinese green tea,1 chai tea, 1 English breakfast tea.
Three more of the cups decaffeinated Columbian.
If I had wanted tea, I would have ordered tea. If I wanted decaf, I would not have ordered a coffee pack, I would have ordered decaf.

I enjoy that this product gave you a number of various flavors to try at once. I also liked that it wasn't one of each flavor (especially since there was two boxes) so that you could try them a couple of times to be sure that you enjoyed what you were getting or not.

I noticed a lot of people stated that there was a plastic taste to their beverages after having these. I have not noticed a plastic taste in the ones that I have tried so far. I'm wondering if older ones that have been stored for longer may get this plastic taste?

Someone else said that the Timothy's products had poor seals and would leak coffee grounds all over in the pot and into the drinking vessel when they were being used. I'm not sure if this is linked to a certain Keurig coffee pot or not but mine, the Mr. Coffee Keurig coffee pot does not do this. I have also not noticed poor sealing in this cups either.

I have also enjoyed the flavors that I have tried so far and I can't wait to try more of them.

We found this coffee
to be rather bland and fairly weak. For an assortment it all tasted the same. Won't buy it again.
Good starter kit, It helped me figure out what I liked and didnt like.  I wish they didnt have the decaf coffees and teas and a few more of the Extra Bold but that is just personal preference.

Very good coffee and tea. Had a very good
variety in package. I had 14 different blends
with 3 being teas. Perfect to see what you
will like. My favorite was Hazelnut. The Bolds
were strong. Even the Breakfast Blend was
plenty strong. I used the large cup on the
Bold and run a second cup when I was down
to a third of a cup and it was still strong
enough! I will be using my own coffee since
these are pricy.....use two to make a 10
cup regular pot!!

is a great sampler of different Timothy World coffee K-cups.
After trying Timothy's, prefer their brand over Green Mountain's (which is not bad), but Timothy's better.

This is a nice variety pack.  It gives you a chance to sample a lot of different coffees and tea.  I enjoy flavored coffee the best but also like to sample different styles of coffee and just use flavored creamer.  I really enjoy this pack and enjoy Timothy's brand.
My husband and I like the variety of coffees in this selection. Several have become favorites such as Parisian nights & the Hazlenut.

Just purchased this last week.  Would have given 5**** but, price seems to have gone up quite a bit.  Mine was only $23. Great box filled with over 16+ choices. Great sampler only a couple K cups were duplicates. Will buy again, BUT ONLY if price goes back down.

good variety.. not a tea or decaf drinker, so i won't be buying any more, but now i have figured out what i like and don't for later purchases.  thanks to those who posted the different flavors in the pack.
I like to purchase this variety pack because it has a little something for everyone. It gives guests choices from tea to really strong coffee.

I am not a big coffee drinker and I do not like to make huge pots of coffee for when I want 1 cup. In addition to that it is great when hosting because people love to go through the assortment pack and pick something out. They have a glimmer in their eyes like it is Christmas morning picking out a coffee/tea they know they will like instead of the same boring old cup of joe. It is a real hit having variety for people. Highly recommend.

I am giving it 4 stars because of the stupid Italian lemon beverage. That might be good if you get sick or something but I wanted a coffee/tea assortment pack!

Really good variety here in this pack.  Not only do they have flavored and straight coffee, but they also included three different teas that can be used in the Keurig brewer.  They also included some Decaf as well.  Nice variety and good flavors.

Just got a Keurig machine as a gift, and don't really know what coffees i would like. My favorite brands of regular coffee don't seem to make k-cups. I got this to try a bunch of different ones. Some were really good, some ok, some pretty bad. We kept a notepad by the coffee machine for my wife and I to keep track of how we felt about each one. Now we are going to order a few boxes of our favorites from this set.

If you are not sure what you will like in k-cups, or want to have a wide variety on hand for guests, etc, this is a good box to buy to get started.

As many other reviews have mentioned, there is not a clear description of what is included in the box. I will not bother to repost the lists others have made, however I can say the variety is MUCH greater than the Gloria Jean's or Green Mountain Coffee variety packs I've tried (both of which include only Four blends of coffee), which is a definite plus. And I always set my Keurig to the smallest cup-size setting and feel this is the right level for maximizing the flavor of each k-cup - haven't tested how these taste with larger cups. Good brand overall, you will not be disappointed.

Be sure to know that this package includes both TEA and DECAF COFFEE - you will be sorely disappointed if you're left with those at the end of the box because you didn't want them in the first place.

I was very please with the variety I received. It had everythong I like and gave my a good chance to try everythin.
Thannk you
I liked this because I was able to sample many of the flavors and then choose the ones I wanted to buy a whole box of.

Great variety in this box from Kona to extra bold blends to tea to decaf.  It gave me an opportunity to try other flavors without needing to buy them in bulk first.  I would recommend if you are interested in trying other flavors.
Wide assortment of coffee, chocolate and tea. All the coffee and chocolate were pretty good.  I'm not a tea drinker but tried one of them anyway. It was fine for tea, I guess,  but not for me.

This is an excellent starter or tester box of k-cups. I did like most of the coffees enclosed especially the Kona Blend. I also found that I like the Colombian Decaf. It came in handy when I was in the mood for coffee late in the evenings.  However, there were two that were to bold for my taste. I am glad I made this purchase. Now I know which coffee blends I favor over others. In my opinion, it would be great if all of the k-cup manufacturers would sell variety packs. Timothy's Variety Pack gets two thumbs up!
It is always nice to update our taste buds and see if there is a new coffee out there.

Great tasting coffee.  no bitter aftertaste.  Spoiled us to the point of taking our Keurig brewer with us when we go visiting, even just an evening playing cards with friends.  Now we are asked if we are bringing  the coffee.  Kind of created a monster.  Our house is now the Coffee House.  Can't say enough good things about the coffee.

I like this variety pack. There are a few items that I didn't enjoy drinking in the a.m. However, I may have guests that like them. This includes tea, which I like. Not everyone wants tea in his or her mix, esp. when the title of the box is coffee k=cups.
This variety pack contains a great sampling of Timothy's Products.  It was very enjoyable.

The variety was great.  I decided to go with the subscription plan, and the coffee and the pricing can't be beat. I received the 24-count boxes (Pack of 2) very quickly upon placing my order, and I am looking forward to receiving this order each month.  I have tried various brands of K-Cups, and Timothy's has always provided great taste.  It was nice to not only have the coffee but the tea as well in this order.  I highly recommend this product.  There are lots of sites for K-cups on the web, but I don't think this price can be beat.
Great variety for anyone wanted to test a lot of types of Timothy's coffee and teas. Very smooth and flavorful coffee.

Loved the variety of flavors to try before committing to a full box of a single coffee flavor. I found a new favorite that I will be reordering. I would have liked it more if the description gave you all the flavors in the box. Think they should have more flavors in the pack. Thanks Amazon for the fast delivery and high quality customer service.

I have always wanted to try Timothy's Brand Coffee. And decided as a gift I could sample as well as my co-workers. And so I bought this box of 24 for us. Everyone one was very delighted with this variety pack. We will no doubt order again!
It is a great cup of K-Cup coffee!
Coffees are ok, but 9 of the k-cups were tea. What a waste. I thought this was a coffee sampler pack. Won't buy again. Try Coffee People coffees instead...delicious!

Timothy's K-Cups are very good.  Timothy's and Green Mountain are my two favorite bands for my Keurig coffee machine.  There is a good variety of selection.  If you're a coffee lover, you'll like these.
Timothy's K-Cup variety pack is awesome way to try various coffees and teas without buying a box of everything. Good coffee.
While I really like Timothy's coffee- found the variety pack to have several K-cups I did not enjoy- far too many chai tea.
Received product and was pleased with quality and assortment. What a savings over local store prices! Will order again!

All of those thoughts will go through you head once you get this pack.

Go with the Green Mountain coffees. And go with bolds. Even if you like lighter coffees. These k-cups have a hard time delivering on larger water sizes (not all types do.) There is some not very good stuff in this pack... It would be great if they sold with just one of each so you could quickly figure out what you wanted without having a lot left over.

Timothy's World Coffees are always great.  Their selections are top notch, with coffee blends from mild to medium to extra bold.  The blends typify coffees from South America and Europe as well as the US.  There is a coffee for any time of the day or evening in regular or decaf.

MY GRANDSON SUGGESTED I BUY TIMOTHY'S VARIETY PACK THROUGH AMAZON AND THE PRICE WAS GOOD.
I ALSO THINK IT IS A GOOD IDEA TO GET STARTED, THIS WAY YOU CAN TRY ALL DIFFERENT FLAVORS TO SEE WHAT KIND OF COFFEE YOU LIKE WITHOUT HAVING TO BUY A ONE FLAVOR BOX AND BE LEFT WITH THE REST IF YOU DIDN'T LIKE IT!

I'm really sorry I didn't read the reviews before ordering Timothy's Variety K-Cup.  What a disappointment to find 9 out 24 that I won't drink. I also ordered Gloria Jean variety and will definitely order that again.

....buy a "sampler" pack that. a. Does not state what is in the box and b. Is waaaaaaay overpriced.  Are you kidding! $38.00+ for 44 coffee pods!  NEWS ALERT! - The going price is like $23.00 or less for 48-50 pods. Whoever orders this, deserves what they get. :|
Have not received this item so I can't write a review!  Where is it?

I received the plant right on the due date.
It package very protective and the plants very healthy.
Overall I am satisfy with my order.
I canot wait for it to flower (so that way I can tell that I received the colour I order or not).

I reviewed this before...I don't think it will live but 9GreenBox said to wait for awhile to make sure that
is not going to live and if it does not they will replace it....

This plant was in the budding stage when I received it and in full bloom shortly thereafter.  Several gorgeous red blooms adorned it's branches. Desert roses are beautiful plants.  Thank you 9GreenBox.

It took them a few days to fill my order but once it was filled it arrived the next day. Came in small plastic bag which was flat due to shipping. Had my pots and soil ready to go so planted them right away. Perked up the same day and I have new growth in just one week. They shouldn't even be surviving in my climate zone(North West AZ, its been 110 in the shade the last few days) but seem to be doing ok. Only get alittle morning and evening sun, full shade rest of the day. Please do your research about these plants, very toxic, I planted with surgical gloves to protect my hands from possible sap. Can't wait for my flowers to bloom.

We LOVE Ian's gluten free cookie buttons!  They are a great-tasting little snack for my kids who can't have gluten but like an occassional treat and I love the fact that the portion is very reasonable, too!  Bravo! 10 stars!

Ok , well first I did not get the variety I ordered , I got the Crunchy Cinnamon kind , and I was going to send them back. Until I saw they were all out of stock... things like these save me , when we need to be out and about , now that we cannot have wheat. So we tried them , the 8, year old says they taste like  mini muffin tops, the 12 year old says , they are good coverd in milk like cereal , the 14 year old , who eats nothing ,ate them , and the two older ones did too , but in all fairness they eat everything..  we all like them , and Ian's is a great company to support , with wonderful kid food ,  for kids who can't have wheat .

I'm trying to figure out what it is that tastes so very peculiar and unpleasant in these cookies. Could it be the soy flour? In any case, I get no taste of chocolate chips at all. Zero. Zilch. They might as well have left that out of the name. The texture isn't bad. It's crunchy and not overly gritty. But there are better gluten-free snacks out there. I hope.

These cookies not only taste great, but they are prepackaged so you can just throw them in a lunchbox.  When you have a child on a gluten-free diet, saving time on food prep is always appreciated.  They are definitely a favorite in my house.  We love them.  They are small in size, but are the best tasting chocolate chip cookie so far that we have found gluten-free.

These are great.  I like the fact that they are in portion controlled bags which make them easy to throw in a book bag, carry-on bag or lunch box.  They are a bit hard so they don't crumble easily before you get to them.  The taste is similar to cinammon graham crackers.

My three-year-old who can't eat gluten loves these cookies, and I've had them too and they're very good.  They're small, maybe 1/2 inch across, but they come packaged in bunches.  They're crunchy and sweet and you can definitely taste the chocolate.  A good product overall.

These are excellently portioned and very tasty.  My only complaint was that they are too hard.  I love them with coffee but for my daughter they were a too hard ---have to watch her VERY close when she is eating them.
Great GF cookie alternative.  My son loves them and he is a very picky eater.

I was so excited to find these in our local Whole Foods.  I loved the fact that they came in individually wrapped packages (great  for travel, lunch boxes, etc).  Unfortunately, the taste was quite disappointing.  The cinnamon flavored ones were even worse.  Neither myself, nor my youngest liked either of them.  Granted, we are both somewhat picky when it comes to store-bought cookies.  I'd have loved to have given them to my oldest son (who has a real sweet tooth and likes most GFCFSF cookies I buy), but they have both soy and corn in them and he is allergic to soy and corn in addition to gluten and dairy.  Fortunately, I hadn't bought them in bulk on Amazon ...  I was surprised to see that they got such good reviews.

This is a very delicious curry, and I loved the unique flavor it gave my eggs. It is spicy but you can adjust that to your taste. Went very well with basmati rice! The curry flavor overpowers the egg, but that is not a bad thing because it's so good! It tastes pretty much like any other Parampara curry though. I guess if you wanted to try out the recipe, you could add the eggs to any of the other Parampara curries, or even a generic red curry that you can make at home.

Read the reviews and decided to try this. We've gone through the first box and have subscribed for monthly delivery. It is absolutely delicious. To make it even better, I add a little Creme Brulee Coffee-Mate creamer. That boosts it up to the absolutely-awesome category. At the rate we're going, we may have to up our subscription delivery to bi-weekly!

I felt compelled to write a review here for 2 reasons.

#1 This is seriously, without a doubt, the best instant cappuccino I've ever had (and, perhaps, best cappuccino, PERIOD). Originally purchased in canister format, the single serve packets are even better, as it offers just the perfect amount for each serving, and you can take it w/ you on the go.

#2 The one and only review here is not indicative, informative, helpful nor is it relevant to the actual product for sale!

I've given out packets to friends and co-workers. All have come back w/ ecstatic responses. I highly recommended this product. You will not be disappointed!
NOT mentioned in the product description is that the top ingedients are SUGAR and HIGH FRUCTOSE CORN SYRUP!!! This is NOT a coffee drink.

I ordered this item once and received the sugar free version.  Then on the replacement order Amazon sent, it was still the wrong product.  However, customer service was great and they refunded me within 48 hours.
These are great cookies.  The price is reasonable and I like that they are delivered to my home.  I have also ordered the vanilla and cinnamon for myself and the arrowroot for my grandson.

We have been buying these for years now. My husband loves them in his lunch every day. They just reduced the size of the bag by 3 oz due to rising ingredient costs. Amazon had the best price on the smaller bags. The product is the same yummy chocolatey cookie as before, you just get less of it per bag.

All Natural the best cranberry sauce on the market!
You will not be disappointed ENJOY

I love these baked lentil chips w/hummus. Everyday after work , I have a snack of lentils & hummus before preparing dinner. I have alot of food sensitivities and allergies and these are a blessing for someone like me. Thanks again for a great product.
Carole

I have purchased these in the larger size and love them! This size is just perfect to keep in my purse for a snack, especially for those times when others are having a dessert or snack and I can't eat theirs because I must have gluten free. My spouse, who won't touch any other 'diet food', loves these!

I ordered these chips after buying a bag of lentil chips at a store and wanted more without going to the store all the time and found these on Amazon. I love the taste and crunchiness of it and its a healthy version of chips with protein which would leave you feeling satisfied instead of craving more. The cracked pepper has a slightly sweet hint which I find interesting and took a bit to get used to. I would buy again, its too bad you can't subscribe.

Saw these chips on Dr. Oz as an alternative to potato chips.  These chips work for me, but not my husband.  The chips have a light flavor, are crunchy and have a puffed texture.  I have just ordered my 2nd box of the 1 oz size to control my portion size because  I don't trust myself to stop eating before the bag is empty.  I hope this becomes a regular Amazon item that I can subscribe to and get Super Saver Delivery.  Perhaps Dr. Oz  should get a percentage for all the items and books that he introduces on his show that I end up buying on Amazon!

We discovered these as one of the snacks sent by a diet my husband was on. They're good enough we then looked them up ourselves. They're cheaper per ounce in the larger bags, but the 1oz bags are great for potion control. All three flavors available on Amazon are delicious; my husband's favorite is the cracked pepper. The rosemary is a reasonably strong taste, so I would recommend liking rosemary if you order it.

I make fat free 'hummus' to serve with them (no sesame/tahini or olive oil, so it's not quite traditional, but that's necessary to cut the fat). I just throw a can of chickpeas, juice from a lemon, salt, a handful of fresh cilantro, and varied roasted peppers & garlic in to the blender, until it's all mashed up good. Delicious combination.

I wish these were available on subscribe and save, since we would, in a heartbeat.
I loved these chips when i got first time from Dierbergs.... but this size is perfect. you can also try Simply 7 Chip Lentil Sea Salt 4 oz (Pack Of 12)

I tried this brand after having a successful experience with the 'Simple 7' brand and they didn't measure up. The baked chips are bland and they are coated in a film that changes their texture. They are to thick and just do not satisfy chip-craving. As the calorie in take is identical to that of the 'Simple 7' brand I'll stick with the latter, which is amazing.
These chips are very good.  Crunchy yet low in calories and fat.  I love the 1 oz size - perfect for my lunches.

These chips make a wonderful snack.  They give you the crunch and saltiness that you need at times, without a lot of calories.  They also contain protein to keep you from getting hungry again until meal time.  They came in a single serving size package which is nice when you are mindful of portion control.  I would order them again.

These chips are the *perfect* snack, especially for gluten sensitive snackers!  I keep these on hand, okay...I usually have 3 boxes (of 24) on hand because I can't bear to be without them!  :-)  They are tasty with just the right amount of sea salt - but wait!  You must try their cucumber dill and sea salt cracked pepper flavors too!  You will LOVE them!
I normally love these chips and buy them in the large bags. The individual bags tasted totally different - makes no sense. I through them out and bought the large bags which tasted great.

Boy, I feel like I hit the jackpot with these. I have been searching for a chip that doesn't have onion/garlic/or tomato in the ingredients,,,,and are more protein based, preferably without wheat or corn. And not only do these fit the bill, they are delicious! Are light, low calorie, and absolutely yummy! Great, great chips!
And an entire bag is only something like 100 calories! Wonderful. I think these may actually be the "perfect chip!". Have salt, but just the right amount. Whoever dreamed these up, did a great job and I am grateful, and grateful to Amazon for carrying them. Thanks, Mediterranean Snacks,,,,,,,!

I ordered Rosemary Lentil Chips. THEY SENT 24 BAGS of cracked pepper. I can't have pepper! Instead of saying they are out of stock, they figured they'd send whatever and I wouldn't notice. Then they say you can't return food BUT I DID NOT NOT order pepper chips, I wouldn't do that. So good luck if you order from them because you will NOT get what you ordered.

Dear Seller,
Thank you so much for the chocolates. My mother loved them, these chocolates were so good she almost cried tiers of joy.Thank you so much for the delivery.
very good treats for your dog, they are soft and small, good to put pills in and my dog loves them!!!

I found out about these dog treats from my Mother who used to work for a Vet. The Treats themselves are great and my dog loves them!
But I paid over $7 for these treats and later found out I can get the exact same size bag for $2.50 locally, So I will not order from here again
knowing I can get almost 3 times the amount for the same price.

My vet recommended these treats several years ago as a healthier alternative to the treats sold in supermarkets (like the treats shaped like fake bacon, sausages, steaks, etc). My dog LOVES these treats, probably more than she ever like the fake bacon variety of treat. She's not usually bribable, but these seem to do the trick. The only drawback to these treats from my point of view is that they're only available at the vet's office, so I'm thrilled to find them here online.

Just a note about one of the other reviews I read: I purchased 4 packages of these at a time at roughly $1.30 per package, and the shipping was still only $5 for all 4 packs. So, even with shipping, the per-unit cost is around $2.50 (which is better than the $5 I was paying at the vet). And I don't think the package is misleading- I've only found these treats in 1 size, and they all have the same picture of a dalmation on the front.

Finally, people have mentioned that these could be used to give pills. I think they're probably a little small for hiding pills (unless you're trying to give a 1/2 or 1/4 tab of a VERY small pill). If hiding pills is what you're going for, you'd be better off getting pill pockets (small, cup-shaped treats that you can mold around a pill or capsule).

These Lean Treats were initially recommended by my vet. I have a large dog, and the larger-sized treats, which I purchased for $6 (12 oz)  from my vet, are large enough to hide pills in, and also to tear into smaller pieces for training. I ordered these treats as replacements, thinking I was getting a bargain. HOWEVER the shipping cost was over $6 for a 4 oz pkg!!!! The pkg contents were not accurately described, as the size of the treats were appropriate for tiny dogs like chihuahuas. The pkg image is blurred, it shows a large dog, a dalmatian, and so further misleads the consumer. So, while the treats are great, the images and the descriptions need to be clarified. I won't order online again until this is cleared up. Perhaps if there were actual size pictures of the treats, that might help.
These treats are great.  The dog is crazy about them.  They are small but he really likes them.  You can also use them to conceal small pills if you need to give your dog medicine.
Impossible to find locally.  Can't be without them. Seller was very prompt in delivery.

I purchased these little gems last week on a whim, after researching the history of the Abbaye de Flavigny. They have been making these candies since the year 1591! Anise is an acquired taste, I think, akin to a delicate licorice, and those who enjoy it will absolutely love these anise drops. A fact I found quite interesting is that it takes fifteen days to make just one of these candies!

Each candy is roughly the size of a medium pearl, with a pleasantly smooth texture. They are not meant to be chewed, (the word "jaw-breaker" comes to mind!) but savored. The taste is exquisite: strong but not overpowering, herbal and sweet. At the heart of each drop is an anise seed, the texture of which contrasts beautifully with the hardness of the candy surrounding it. Very refreshing.

I am so glad that I stumbled upon these! They are a real treasure in a world where artificial flavorings and chemical-based sweeteners are the norm. There is something quite special about these Anise Drops from Abbaye de Flavigny.

As for the seller, Touch of Europe, I couldn't be happier with their service. My package arrived quickly, (two days before the estimated arrival time!) wrapped safely, and included a hand-signed letter thanking me for my business, which I thought was a nice touch.

My first thought when opening a pack of these...was wow! They have MUCH more filled then the classic ones do, and even more than like "Double Stuff" oreos do.

The cookie its self has a unique flavor that I can best describe as a sweet buttery shortbread type flavor. It's definitely not one of those cookies where you take them apart to get to the filling, and forget about the cookies lol. They are fantastic, and CERTAINLY worth a try if you have never had them. I am a huge chocolate fan, but not usually too big on sweets. But these have and always will be a classic and my favorite.

Pros: Everything.
Cons: I can eat a whole pack by myself. I blame Keebler fully for this.

The Keebler E.L. Fudge Sandwich Cookies, Double Stuffed are
very tastey, very satisfying. A high-quality product that I would recommend.

I ordered the Hershey's Sugar Free Chocolate Chips.  I received the order ONE:In an envelope - not something I would send a food Product in.  TWO: The product looked Old and Out Of Date, the bags were cut (yet the packaged shipped in was not)and everything looked like it was melted together.  When I contacted this seller - he called me a liar and did not believe I received the items this way.  When I said I would send a picture - suddenly he hung up. I was told I would be refunded (including the $9.00 shipping fee I was charged plus my $5.35 fee to ship back) I still have not received my full refund!

I recieved my package today, much quicker than I expected. The items in the set were so fresh; also I really enjoyed the festive packaging. I love Thai food, and have recently am trying to adopt a totally Asian way of cooking for health reasons, I am now in my third week, and have lost 15 pounds, and pain from my fibro and RA is gone. In addition to the health benefits from Thai cooking, is it satisfies my taste...I don't crave fatting spicy foods, or even sweets anymore...:). I encourge those that want to try, to give it a shot...it's not as hard as it looks. If you live in area, such as I do..and have limited access to Thai ingredients, this package will get you on your way..to health wholesome Thai foods...thanks for offering this product...Pam

There ain't really a whole lot to say about these things but I still wrote a review that I hope others may find helpful just in case they have a need for these things. I bought these ingredients because I always cook Tom Yum Soup specifically the tom yum seafood. I am from Asia and I love to cook and I would rather use the organic ingredients rather than the ready mix flavor. My husband is American and he loves Tom Yum. I brought some of these when I went back to Asia last December but I already ran out so I had to buy some.

When I received these product, they were in an excellent condition. Considering that these are perishables, I got them still fresh and got them the way the seller had described/advertised them. The packaging was neat and was absolutely done carefully. The price for me is reasonable because you just cannot find these stuff in some groceries at least here in Texas. Nice doing business with the seller. So over all rating, I give both the seller and the product a 5-star rating.

The package arrived on schedule and in good condition, with plentiful quantities of each fresh herb. No complaints, would definitely buy again. Perfect for lovers of Thai cuisine who want to try their hand at some home-cooked meals, but don't have an Asian market nearby to satisfy their needs.

I realize that vendor reviews are in a separate area, but when dealing with perishable items such as this, the vendor DOES make a difference as to the quality of the item, and therefore also to the review of the item itself. I was skeptical about ordering produce in this fashion, but the other positive reviews and my desire for the ingredients won out. I'm so glad I took the chance! :)

My order arrived two days before the earliest delivery estimate. In the high-90s heat we've been having right now, that makes a big difference, as did the fact that it was very well packed and obviously very fresh produce to begin with. The items were of excellent quality and generous portions. I can make an insane amount of Tom Yum soup now and have enough left over to throw together some other delicious dishes.

Give it a try. I think you too will be very pleased! :)

Unfortunately my order never arrived.  After 3 weeks of emailing, I was able to get in contact with customer service.  Mam with customer service was very helpful and apologetic.  She made everything right and reshipped the order the next day.
What more can I say? All the items were in great condition, tasted delicious, and made a great meal. I would highly recommend this product.

The ingredients arrived fresh and in only two days. I made the perfect green curry taught to me in Thailand on my travels. Just placed a second order.

A very happy customer

We received everything in the photo plus three unexpected Lemons.
Everything arrived fast and fresh.
We are going to freeze the excess veggies for future Tom Yum Gai Soup (Hot and Sour Soup).
Ate these in college in California---better than M&M's!  Can't wait to be able to order some (hopefully in less than 25 lb increment)

Note: these are hard-core choke hazards--NOT for small children!

Contrary to previous review, I found the bag to be clearly marked regarding allergens.

These are not "pebbles". The image shows them roughly all the same size--they are NOT. They range from M&M size to small eggs. They contain a variety of fillings, probably not everything Koppers makes, but a nice sampling (dried fruit, cordials, nuts, hard candy). Also be aware, they do not all have chocolate inside; some are candy coating all the way down to the filling. Better be VERY confident in your dental work before you bite! This is the only reason I did not give it 5 stars.

Actually kind of fun...not knowing what's inside. A nice introduction to Koppers products.

Wow, in this day-in-age, one would think that products containing nuts would be clearly labelled.  I purchased this product, thinking it was coated chocolate.  I was aware that it was manufactured in a facility that has nuts, but the description does it clearly state that these candies have various centers such as nuts, fruits and other things.  I used these for a children's gingerbread house decorating party, and there were kids that had nut allergies in attendance!  Thankfully, all went well, but it is outrageous that Koppers does not clearly describe this product. Although not the tastiest candy, the overall quality was good, not great.

This product is hard to find in my area, so even though I didn't need an entire case, I purchased them and handed some out to other family members over Thanksgiving. I love using the Corn Flake crumbs for anything that needs breading as it has a nice flavor even without spices and makes food extra crispy with just a very small amount of olive oil in the pan! Great on fish, twice baked ravioli and chicken to name a few. I have also used the crumbs in yogurt and on salads for a little extra crunch. Highly recommended!

This is my favorite breading for seafood, poultry, onion rings, etc.
To me, it comes out much more crispy and flavorful. It tastes more clean and natural.
It doesn't get soggy easily like regular crumbs from bread, it just doesn't seem to absorb all of the oil and lay limb.
If you like more crunch that allows the flavor on the inside to come through, this is just the right breading.
I also like to fry in this breading and then add to a pan of sauce and this coating still stays crunchy and crisp even through that.

The only mint I taste is natural flavor, that's not mint. What's up with sugar and honey in it too. This make it too sweet. If I want sweet, I'll get the Southern style tea. Try some organic mint for a change and see the different.

This was not a pasta salad kit as described. It is a kit for pasta stir-fry. Needless to say I was surprised and not very happy. I will use the pasta for something but, will not be ordering this product again.
I bought these on a special sale. The mix is sour and in many of the sticks, the mix has clumped together so that it's very hard to get it to dissolve into water.
Taste is sour- I use drink mix sticks every day and no matter how I mixed them, I just couldn't get them to taste good.

This is not an over-the-top sugary drink mix like Kool-Aid, as others pointed out it is on the sour side.  While not what I was expecting at first I still find it to be a refreshing mix.  I have just received my second "Subscribe and Save" shipment of this the other week shortly before Amazon removed it from that service.  In the first shipment I had received there were a number of packets where the powder had solidified a bit as another reviewer reported.  I think I calculated about 18-20% of the packets in that shipment had that problem.  The only issue this gave me was getting the mix out of the packet; some alternate squeezing of the packet would break up the chunk enough to drop out into my water bottle.  It took a little longer to dissolve but then was fine.  In the most recent shipment all packets felt and sounded to be in loose powder form.  The only other complaint I have is that the packets never seemed to tear open well.  As a result I find it easier to cut them open with scissors, not a problem for me as I drink these in my office cubicle.  When this shipment runs out I intend to order a restock, hopefully it is available again at the SnS discount.

I use this professionally and while it makes Ice Cream creamier, it also allows more air to be held in the finished Ice Cream, thus extending the time it stays frozen on the plate.  If you want to take your ice Cream to the next level, you need this product.
Made icecream with and without it using same recipe. When I used Cremodan everything is creamier, so I blame this particular product for a better icecream in my case. Thanks a lot!

The shipping from Amazon was great as usual.  However the product I received was not.  These truffles were almost past the expiration date and obviously had be stored in a non-climate controlled place.  The chocolate had been melted and the peanut butter nugat inside had melted down to blob in the bottom of the sphere.  These truffles were not a bargin at the price I paid for them. I will buy my next ones locally where I can be assured they will be what I am paying for and not something somebody is trying to get rid of.

I received my first box and when I opened it the chocolate had been melted. It was no longer smooth and creamy as Lindt truffles usually are. The weather had been cold and I accepted the package directly from the post women so I assumed it had arrived that way. I called Amazon and they gave me a replacement box which arrived in 2 days. Unfortunately it had also been melted and at that point I just gave up. I have two boxes of yucky chocolate.  I'm assuming that they melted while they sat around at amazon or Lindt provided a sub par product.  Do not order these. Buy them somewhere where you can inspect them first.

Thank you so much for being a source for the Lindt Peanut Butter truffles!  Yes, the Hazelnut are amazing, but my favorite by far are the peanut butter and there are fewer and fewer stores that carry them.  I just received my box of 120 count and they are fresh and in the best condition.  They just melt in your mouth.

This stuff is hot. You can use a third as much as you normally would and still end up with a hotter dish.  I don't know if it's so hot because it's fresher than what I've gotten in the grocery store or if it's because it's grown in different soil.  But, whatever it is, the product is both hot and flavorful.

Better than that stuff you get at the health food store.  Not sure why it's so better but IT IS. These 3 flavors go together really well. Getting compliments on everything I make. Going to buy more from Red Monkey soon.
This stuff tastes great!  I love that it is in glass bottles and not in plastic.  I highly recommend it.
This is the good stuff because it is R E A L so buy it, you'll like it just as I did. By the way, the other juices of Lakewood are great, too.

This is my third order of this pickled ginger. After trying another brand sold here, I almost passed on this ginger.

The pros:
+ This ginger is sliced thinly & there are no large pieces that need to cut before you can eat it. I use my ginger on my tossed salad to add a bit of kick & sweetness to the dressing.
+ The flavor is smooth, sweet, slightly hot, but not overwhelming & there's no unpleasant aftertaste.
+ The shipment arrives very quickly & is very well packed. :)

The cons:
- This ginger is a bit on the expensive side, but in my opinion, well worth the extra cost.

This is an excellent product.  It is difficult to find this brand very many places.  The ginger has the right amount of bite and tastes like the finest available in the sushi restaurants.  I highly recommend this for people who love pickled ginger.

I was furious when I found out the ingredients listed on the webpage are different from the product's true ingredients and it is  way different!  ASPARTAME is in this product and YUCK YUCK YUCK. I am so sorry I ordered this and even sorrier I believed the Amazon webpage. I wish they would correct this!

There are two Velveeta pasta and cheese dinners. This one, and Kraft Velveeta Original Shells & Cheese, 12 oz. They both use packets of cheese sauce, not packets of powder.

But sadly, this one's not that good. It's salty, and the tiny bits of broccoli are few and far between. And with all the sodium (1230 mg per serving compared to 940 mg for the regular Shells and Cheese), it's a long way from healthy.

Shells and Cheese is better. It's pure, creamy comfort food that goes down smooth and leaves no aftertaste. The pasta's ridged-shell shape makes every bite taste good, as dribbles of cheese seep into each piece and stick to its sides. It's much better than the broccoli version... and way more yummy (if more expensive) than the regular Kraft Macaroni & Cheese Supermac & Cheese Pasta and Sauce, 6-Ounce Boxes (Pack of 24).

I love Velveeta and I love the rotini and cheese; I have had it before but it is hard to find in the grocery stores I shop at...I found it not to be as good as I remembered....the broccoli was minimal at best.
Tastes good because, well, it's Velveeta.  But if you're buying it for the broccoli, don't bother.  The tsp of dried broccoli included in the package hardly makes it "with broccoli".

I came across this product in the store in the form of those little 2oz cups that Easy mac comes in (I don't know if it's 2 oz exactly but it's the small single serving cups that you can put in the microwave). I liked it so much I came to my best friend Amazon to see if I could buy more and was pleasantly surprised when I found that you could buy it in the larger size. Obviously there are no health benefits and the broccoli comes dried in a little packet so there's not much to be expected, but if you like Velveeta and broccoli give this a try! I love it. It's quick and easy and difficult to find in a store so this is the place to get it. It's everything you love about traditional Velveeta with the fun twisty rotini pasta and broccoli parts. Very happy.
these people are crazy I haven't met a person who didn't like this stuff, but it is about a dollar overpriced PER BOX on amazon.com

I received my order quickly and the exp date was far in advance!

The only con: packaging...some bags crushed as there were no plastic air bags to prevent crushing..carton flimsy.

Warning: these r addictive LOL!!!

Very easy to order.  This product is not offered in most retail stores but readily available online.  One thing that I would like to have seen on the product description is a reminder that this product is perishable and has an expiration date.  This should be known to the consumer but I wasn't thinking about that when I purchased it early in December for a Christmas present.  I would have waited a few more weeks.
This is A good product and it is good but can do with LESS SALT than it has, God bless.
I started eating chilicheese corn chips out of the vending machine when I was a young soldier in the Army. They were Delicious back then and they are Delicious today.

This is our favorite chip and the single serving bags help to keep the kids for wasting them.  They are good for those times when you have to grab something on the run.  I keep a couple of bags in my car for the kids.
Nothing has changed over the years: They were great 35 years ago and still are!

Knowing these types of snacks are unhealthy has me in a state of guilt, to purchase.
I hope they will soon have an organic variation. Cheetos, and Lays do!

i ordered the product on 8/29/09 and received it on 9/3/09.  64 single serve bags.  I was very pleased until i noticed the freshness expiration date on the bags was 10/6/09... way too soon compared to snack items that i would have found in a grocery store on 9/3/09. i doubt that i will order food products from amazon again... what a disappointment.

Big sporting events. . .I'm into them all. Super Bowl. BCS Championship. March Madness. NBA Finals. The World Series. Pay-Per-View Boxing. Wimbledon. . . .not. And when you're watching a bigtime sporting event, you need a bigtime snack with taste and crunch and texture to hold its own in all the excitement. You need a bag (or more) of FRITOS CORN CHIPS.

Just something about the original corn chip and sports. They go together like bacon and eggs. . .salt and pepper. . .Ginger and Mary Ann. Could be because FRITOS CORN CHIPS go great with brewskies--or pile them on top of a steaming bowl of chili. Mmmm, now you're talkin' Super Meal. And for dipping, nothing beats Fritos Scoopers (not available here, alas) into a bowl of Lay's Creamy Ranch Dip (also, alas, not available here).

So bring on the playoffs; usher in the buzzer beaters; welcome the wild card. As long as you have FRITOS CORN CHIPS, it's all good. Your taste buds will score.
--D. Mikels, Esq.

I got 100 bags at Sams Club for 16$......only hours after I placed this order for 62 bags at 42$ish. No way to cancel...next time I will pay closer attention to the fine print. Bottom line...these were. 56 per bag compared to Sams@ .18 per bag. Its hard to find multiple same chip bags do I just went for it. Haste makes waste.
Great variety.  Didn't have to go out searching and got all the flavors I was looking for at a great price.  My daughter is very happy with her easy and inexpensive summer treat.
I guess kids will eat just about anything, I don't know if I would like anything like this, but the kids sure did eat it up...

I've tried all the different flavors of bars that Fiber One offers and these are definitely my favorite. The caramel flavor is light and sweet and the fiber in these bars (a whopping 9g!) makes them a very filling snack or a quick meal on the go! I typically enjoy these in the afternoon to carry me through between lunch and dinner but have eaten them for breakfast on occasion as well and they keep me satisfied until lunch. Fiber is one of the hardest things for me to get enough of (25-35g is recommended daily) and these bars definitely help! Some people have reported digestive upset when eating these but I've never had a problem with them. I highly recommend this product!

I am always on the look out for high-end flavored coffee (I mean, Starbucks doesn't even offer it-insert raspberry here)!

This coffee is Ultra cinnamony! And I put a dried cinnamon stick in the coffee pot to spice it up even more. Not one of those pallid cinnamon flavored combinations with hazelnut or some such dilluter.

So terrific, I ordered FIVE pounds from Red Buffalo directly after my first brewed cup! I cannot wait to taste all their other infused flavors.
I've ordered this three winters in a row and we love it. Our house wouldn't smell like christmas with out it.  There other flavors are great also.  Thanks!!

My husband loves cinnamon and I have tried, time and again, to find good cinnamon coffee...He does not like the flavoring liquid; he wants it in the coffee..So we tried this and it was terrible...it's very strong coffee with an almost non existent cinnamon flavor (which is what I paid for)..I would definitely not buy this again...very disappointed...why is it so hard to get this kind of coffee.....

Just received my bags of yellow split peas.  The bags are 14 oz. bags and NOT 16 oz. bags as advertised.  I needed exactly 32 oz. for my soup recipe and now I am short.  I am returning the item for a full credit. Will shop elsewhere.

The product consists of an approximately 10 inch (25 cm) long piece of meat with 1 or 2 smaller (approx 1 1/2-2 inches, 3-5 cm) pieces thrown in. The meat is about 1/4 inch (6-7 mm) thick and comes in a fairly easy, peel open package. Taste is good though on the salty side (it carries more than 1/2 the daily recommended amount of salt). It does not actually taste like steak, just jerky, but the meat is pretty tender and I didn't feel like I was wrestling with shoe leather. I appreciate the fact that the pepper bits are not "loose" like some other jerkies, so crumbs are not much of a concern. Per the box, store in a cool, dry place.
Nutritional info:

Servings per container: 1
Calories: 120
Total fat: 2g (3%)
Saturated fat: 1g (5%)
Trans fat: 0g
Cholesterol: 50 mg (17%)
Sodium: 1360 mg (57%)
Total carbohydrates: 4g (1%)
Dietary fiber: 0g
Sugars: 2g
Protein: 22g

...in that it's chewy, beefy, and has a long shelf life. Jack Link's Peppered jerky is a tad too peppery for my liking, so I expected the teriyaki flavor to be just as robust. Instead, it is mild. Still really good, however! One word of caution, although it's addictive, eat in moderation, or your sodium levels will be off the chart.

I find the Jack Links Teriyaki Beef Steaks excellent in taste and loaded with protein without a lot of fat nor a lot of carbohydrates, and excellent choice for camping, trips etc. the price thru Amazon can not be beat.  I am very satisfied.

I love Jack Links Beef Steaks. These have a wonderful flavor with just the right blend of spices and hickory flavoring. I have trouble eating just one. It makes a great snack anytime. Before letting my grandkids know I have some, I make sure I hide a few first. Kids love them too.
this is the only kind of peppered beef steak i buy.it's always very fresh.and taste better than the other brands,if you like jerky i would recomend this product.

finished half of one steak, the other half dropped on my desk, so i picked it up, saw those nasty white mold on it. makes me sick.

i've seen other reviews saying it had mold issues, i didn't really take it serious since i lovED it.

now i see the problem, not over due, not under the sun, not in high temperature. white mold.

just found out this today, i usually don't write reviews. but this is really really.. i can't think about it anymore. just..

try not to buy it, or just buy the ones in 7-11 at least u can see it b4 u buy it.

When I bought this item the first time, I was happy then I "subscribed and saved". What a waste! Once they have their hooks in you, they give you the bottom of the barrel. I even gave them a second try the next month and they were all moldy AGAIN. Terrible company. "Subscribe and save" users should form a class action lawsuit like done against Netflix when they gave new subscribers the latest movies, leaving the old B movies to the long term customers. Shame on Jack Links. Pathetic.

I bought 2 boxes of these at the same time thinking I was getting a better deal than buying from the gas station. The first few I ate I didn't have any problems with. Since then, they either have mold or have been so hard that I cannot take a first bite through it (sidenote: I am an avid carnivore). They need to step up their quality control before selling this.

After trying the teriyaki flavor of these beef steaks, I decided I would try another flavor so I ordered these peppered ones.  The flavor is really like throwing a salt and pepper shaker into your mouth.  You never really get a chance to taste the meat since your tongue is overwhelmed by this cloyingly salty, stale pepper flavor.  The worst part? There is 1470mg of Sodium in a single package, which is a whopping 61% of your daily value of sodium for the ENTIRE day.

This is a sooo much better snack than crackers or chips.  I have blood sugar issues and a protein snack is just what I need.  I also quit smoking in Jan. 2007 and am still smoke free thanks to Jack Links 2 oz. Original Beef Steak.  I honestly love them.

These jerky packs are great.  They actually do fill you up or at least stop the grum bellies.  I stay away from all the products that are just different ways of eating sugar and corn syrup.  I have a boy with ADD and I don't have him on drugs so it is very nice to have a great tasting and filling snack that isn't just sugar with flavoring.  Since sugar and corn syrup are major contributors to that condition.  Keep up the good work Jack Link.

Just after one bite, I could really tell there was way too much salt in the jerky. After two bites, I simply couldn't eat more.
Nutrition Fact says one serving's Sodium Content is 1540mg - 64% of daily value.
I would not recommend this jerky unless you already know what it taste like.
This was a great product, shipped quickly and was hassle free. I will consider buying this on a regular basis.
Healthy treat for dogs and grandchildren.  I use them for training both.  Good behavior merits a Jack Link.  Give them a try.
This is a greasy product, but has good flavor.  The meat is soft, not too salty, and meaty.  I would buy again.

The Pepper Beef Steak is way too salty and tough. It's a shame they don't put the nutrition facts on the packaging, but I guess that's intentional, because if I knew, I wouldn't not have purchased.

Very disappointed.

Have seen mold on a couple of different flavors of this jerky. I keep it in a cool dry place and it doesn't expire for another year.

I've had it in the gas station before and it's fine. But the couple boxes I ordered from amazon had ones with mold on them. I personally like this jerky but molding product gets a 1 star review.

The product came quickly, one was great, but one of the boxes was dry and at the end of the pull date.
Thanks
Mike

Have order three boxes in total now. I bring one as a snack to work almost everyday. Soooo much cheaper to order from Amazon than to buy at a gas station. Some reviews say they've had 'moldy' packages. So far I've only had one single package that tasted a little off. The rest of the box was fine. Some jerky strips will have a bit of congealed grease on them, I just wipe it off. Perhaps those folks with the 'moldy' packages were mistaking grease for mold? I will continue to buy this product from Amazon and will always have a box on hand in my pantry. (Oh, of note, these strips are made from WHOLE strips of beef, not the "chipped, chopped, pressed and pattied" variety, and it is very lean. Lots of protein and only 70 calories a package. 'Beats a package of potato chips any day! They are a tad salty, but so are potato chips - and I always have something to wash them down with too!)

I was pretty disappointed with this. It's incredibly dry, to the point of being almost crumbly in your mouth. I also thought the flavor itself could have been better.  I've made jerky myself that tastes much better than this.

I subscribed and saved to this kind of jerky in the past, then had the subscription canceled for a time. Since jerky is more expensive by the piece, I recently restarted the subscription... only to cancel it after the second shipment. It's nasty. I got two boxes of it and don't know what to do with it. It's old, moldy and disgusting. I am very disappointed with this product and recommend people avoid this until the company steps up and improves the quality. It may be a better deal to buy it in quantity, but it's not when you can't even eat it.
Product not what is in stores, low quality. Taste and quality varies greatly between items in package. Stay away form these. Teriaki is plastic like and has a chemical taste
I do like how these taste but there is too much dietary salt. I also found that after eating two, I began to get stomach knots.
These things are terrible.  They have a waxy coating and some sort of chemical on top.  The taste of the chemical is very prominent.  I can't even give these things away.

These are perfect for my bf and myself. They are perfect size for a snack or for myself I have sugar issues so this is a good source of protein when my sugar is getting low. For the price and when you do the subscribe and save it is even better. They work great on the go or just when you need a quick snack and the flavor is tasty!
Over and over again I keep finding rotten or stinking beef steak in each carton . The quality control is very poor at Jack Link's

The best jerky I've found for a low price. I'd rather have the organic/free range/etc jerky but am a poor grad student, so this stuff works for me. The best deal I can find for jerky anywhere is here on Amazon.

They are so easy to carry around and are very filling. Sometimes they are a little tougher than others, but it's not so bad you'll rip your teeth out eating them. I only have 2 complaints - a ridiculous amount of sodium and a few other additives (like SUGAR) that I'd prefer not to be eating. But still... so good for what you pay for.
I bought 2 Jack Link's Beef Steak pack of 12. One of the two packs was open and had only 11 Beef Steaks. Also the meat is very tough to chew unlike when you buy from grocery stores.
This jerky is; tough, fat, has gristle, and does not taste like teriyaki. They do not even try to make it with the right flavorings. If you like teriyaki get another product.
I order this for my office and everyone seems to love it. After much taste testing, we chose Jack Links for the great taste, variety, and value.

I picked one of these up at a convenience store for a snack. It was just the right amount for a mid-meal bite. I bought a whole box from Amazon to keep in the office. Other reviewers said that they thought these were too salty, or old. The box I received wasn't old, and as for salty - it's beef jerky stuff, what do you expect? Calories and fat content aren't bad either.

I have not yet purchased this product FROM amazon, BUT as soon as my box from the Jack Link's Site is gone I will forever buy it from Amazon alone! This (Jack Link's ORINGINAL Beef Steak) is my absolute FAVORITE jerky and has been for years! I've spent way to much time and gas looking for it at near-by stores only to be disapointed and settling for either Jack Link's other products or O'Boy Oberto which are both fine, but for me it does NOTHING for my beef jerky cravings! It is true it is quite salty but what good beef jerky isn't???? My husband a fitness/gym nut LOVES this jerky as well as the high protein content! I also LOVE the extremly low fat content as I cannot stand chewing on leather or fat that never chews away! This product is not only healthy (aside from salt), filling, great tasting, and a great snack thats easy to eat it is also CHEAP! At least in my perspective! On Amazon it is an amazing $10.00+ cheaper (when including shipping cost) than the same box from the Jack Link's website(kicking myself in the butt for that)! I will absolutely be setting up auto shipping for this product!

It's tough to rate a food item as everyone has their own tastes. However, I think when it comes to store bought beef jerky, Jack Link's is about as good as they come. Most companies add a ton of extra garbage to their jerky, including sugar. You'll sometimes find 8-10 grams of sugar in some other brands. But with Jack Link's you are getting only 2 grams, and a taste that is comparable. And while all jerky is high in sodium, I realized these are a bit less than most competitors.

In a nutshell, this is just good beef jerky without all the hoopla. A perfect healthy snack for someone in need of a little extra protein during the day. It won't beat the stuff coming direct from a butcher, but it's better than most of the other one's you'll find at a convenient store.
Much happier with this product when purchased through Amazon. Meat appears older, less fresh when bought in the store.

It's a nice price for a good jerky. I try to keep loaded up on protein, and these jerkys are easy to just have lying around in case I feel like having one. They taste pretty good, they're very low in carbohydrates and fat...

But they're too salty. I don't mean in a "Gee that's more than the Surgeon General recommends" kind of way, but in a disgusting kind of way. Maybe if you have a really high tolerance for salt it's no problem, but I think most people would agree...anyway I get the Teriyaki flavor, with 440 mg of salt per oz. The Pepper and the original flavors, at 770 per oz, are just too salty for me to want to eat.

Amazon also has like alligator and elk and duck jerkey for sale...think I might give those a try once I run through this box.

I really like this jerkey because it's not too spicy, has a good meaty texture and taste and it's the right size snack for me.  These boxed sets are a good price and I don't have to spend time running to the store and paying extra for them.

I am in search of a good jerky and just had to try these. I guess I paid little attention to the label "Beef Steak" versus beef jerky. These pieces are thick and chewy and very peppery (in the original flavor). I [personally find that I have more of an affinity to the regular, thinner sliced jerky over these "beef steaks" ... but we bought two boxes and are certainly enjoying them.

These 2-ounce packs are filling, packed with protein and provide a great mid-day energy boost. They travel well and the Jack Links brand has not let us down. With so many varieties, we will be trying more. These were a pleasant surprise and were different.

Keep in mind that this is a thicker cut, 2 oz packs have 1280 mgs of sodium per serving. Quite a lot! Also, keep a toothpick or dental floss nearby, you'll need it!

Very enjoyable nonetheless.
The Jack Link's Beef Steak, Peppered are always nice to have in the pocket in case I get a bit hungry

I've picked up the smaller size at convenience stores and have always liked them.  I read some of the reviews and one person mentioned how very salty they were, but I bought this pack of 12 anyway.  I thought maybe he was just a little sensitive, but, wow, he was right!  I like the flavor, but cannot eat much of it at once. I eat only a small amount each time and close the package back up.  The small ones I get in the convenience stores don't seem this salty.

We all know Jack Link's is an excellent product. Dates were excellent and you will never find a better price anywhere so go ahead sign up for autoship and enjoy healthy protein anytime.Jack Link's Beef Steak, Teriyaki, 2-Ounce Packages (Pack of 12)

This is big! It's about a foot long and they has a pretty good girth to it (that's what she said)! It's not as soft as normal jerky you find in the bag - I think this stuff is made differently. It's tough and salty (that's what she said). It's not the best tasting Jerky I've ever had, but for the price it definitely exceeds my expectations. I've tried the Oberto brand jerky sticks and they were not very good at all. And with 23g of protein and only 2g of fat in each stick it's pretty good for you! One stick is pretty much a meal, though. I find myself working on it for about 30 minutes before I down it all (that's what she said).

Goodnight everybody - i'll be in town all week!
The shipping charge was free and the transaction was smooth and quick. the product is fresh and easy to order. will order again and recommend.
I've ordered this before and enjoy it, however wish it didn't have so much sodium.
peppered beef steak tastes better than other flavors offered by Jack Links......i actually have only tried the kc bar-b-q. but the other reviews say this flavor tastes the best.

Ive never tried kc bar-b-q so i didnt know what it was going to taste like. When i finally got it i took one bite and eewwwww not the greatest taste.......not like any bar-b-q ive tasted. Jack links should take this beef steak off the market.......maybe ok for older people that cant tolerate hot food.....my older friend really liked it so i gave it to him. try the peppered beef steak by jack links its the best by far.

I really liked the peppered flavor of the beef steaks.........i have yet to try them all but i hear peppered is the best flavor. spicey as far as pepper goes and tender. somethings you cant find in stores so i like shopping with amazon there great too.
The taste on these are just not right and what I was expecting. I thought it would taste just like the bagged jerky but its not. I would stay clear and stick with the bagged jerky.
Do U like BBQ beef snacks??? Then buy this one, I think you'll love it.

I've tried the hickory and peppered so figured I'd try the cajun too since I like spicy food. It has a nice kick to it but it's not too hot, at least in my opinion. The spicy taste lingers in your mouth for a bit but it's not a hot burn. It's not as tasty as I'd like but overall it's good and I'll order it again. My favorite is the peppered though, great taste and just a little spice from the pepper.

wow the taste in this is great,very good flavor.very fresh tasting.i cut this in small pieces, for my kids.my whole  family enjoys the chewy beef steak,i will buy again.great for on the road trips.a quick snack.

Not greasy like the typical gas station or convienence store sticks. These are meaty and very tasty. The 2 oz packs are a great size for a snack. The sodium level is a bit high but they are defitnetly one of the better beef jerky sticks available. I bought both the peppered and the hickory but I like the peppered better.
These were pretty good but the 2 oz ones taste better. Maybe I just got a bad box of these though. still great protein and energy.

I like the peppered flavor a lot better than the original or plain, it does have a good cracked pepper flavor. I also think the quality is better than most other brands that I have tried. I like the 1 oz. packages and great value compared to buying individually.
I like the quality of Jack Link products, this one is more sweet than hot to me, just a little hot. But overall the flavor is good. The price is very good compared to individual prices.

I like the peppered flavor a lot better than the original or plain, it does have a good cracked pepper flavor. I also think the quality is better than most other brands that I have tried. I prefer the 1 oz. packaged.

This product is pretty good. With 26 or 27 grams of protien and low in fat, it is great for gym enthusiasts or people who want to stay healthy by eating healthy. I personally am a body builder and I'm looking to eat as much protien as possible everday. I definatly noticed an upgrade in performance in the gym and during the day when I take this. Although the cajun flavor is a tade too spicy for me at times. Like my eyes will get red and my nose will start to run. Other than that it is delicous. I will probably try the Teriyaki next.
I'd definitely recommend this beef jerky to anyone. I'm buying this again for sure. They are high in protein and low in fat. Don't buy the garbage quality slim jims or another brand. Get these

Even though these are in sealed, individual packages, which is nice, it seems like they don't retain there freshness. A few of the sticks got like shoe leather and had little taste. I would not purchase them again. I think they should have more flavor since they are vaccummed sealed for freshness. Also the sticks get very hard.

Have never seen this in the stores, my favorite is Peppered but also ordered this at the same time.  Was glad I did.  Very good flavor, kind of spicy "after the fact".  Love the single serving packs so you don't eat too much and great source of protien!
If you like cracked pepper this is definitely good eats.  Not too overpowering, it's just right!
Awesome flavor, great texture, just the right amount of pepper to give you a great tingle to the taste buds.  Definitely one of the best.  It is real steak.  Highly recommended!
Great tasting jerky. Nice, thick, moist texture tears and chews easily. 1 oz size is a perfect hight protein, low fat snack. Sodium content isnt too outrageous either.

I love Jack Links Beef Steak and this has to top them all. I only ordered 1 box and will definately order more. I very highly recommend the peppered beef steak. A perfect blend of pepper and spices with a smoked flavor make this a great anytime snack.

Hickory is one of the top flavors when we asked US troops what they like.  They love the steak strips as they are a bit softer but very satisfying.  If being able to carry along a snack, and needing protein is part of your decision, this flavor in a steak strip cannot be beat !  You won't go wrong on this item.
Good quality jerky.  Not too hard.  Taste like real meat.  A little hot for my taste, so I gave it 4 stars.  I would get the plain.  It's pretty spicy.

Good brand. They must pay their sales people a lot tho. I saw these in stores for at least 50% more and convenience stores.... well, who has a wheelbarrow that big to haul around their change in?

Send a lot of Jacks Link's steak strips and jerky to the American GIs in the Sand and found ordering it this way to be much more pliable and easier on your jaw than the same brand in Mart type or warehouse membership stores. If you send any to the heat like that, this is a much better product so there's a little time allowed to still have decent jerky arrive. Steak strips and jerky are better liked than the nuggets tho..

I have a border collie and my husband started to give our dog a jacks beef steak every night as a treat. Now I buy boxes of 24 all the time and the vet says they are better to give then a raw hide or some of the treats in the stores .So I think they are ok in my book. Hard to find 1oz ones sometimes but they are worth the price.

I'll give Jack Links 4.5 stars on flavor and quality but a much lower rating on bulk pricing.  I order quite a bit of beef jerky online in larger quantities from many vendors.  To keep fresh remember to store this in a cool environment.  The 2 ounce package is a perfect portion size.

I usually buy the Sweet&Hot jerky strips at Walmart and love the taste. I decided to try the 2oz stick from Amazon and was disappointed for 3 reasons:

1. They came with expiration date only 48 days away. I've bought a couple of grocery items from amazon and this seems to be a common pattern. I've also read reviews complaining about the expiration issue on other Amazon grocery products. I love shopping from Amazon, but this reason alone may stop me from buying perishables from them again.

2. These sticks are not nearly as soft in texture as the strips. Maybe it's because it's almost reached its expiration date?

3. The flavor is not exactly the same as the strips. It tastes more or less the same as regular beef jerky. A bit of hot (as most jerkies are), but not much sweet. Again, is age a factor?

I've tried many brands and flavors, and Jack Link's Sweet&Hot is by far my favorite. Get it in strips.. and get it from you local grocer.

I would recommend to stick with the bagged beef jerky. I bought these because I thought it would be much easier to transport with me on the go like road trips but the taste is way off compared to the bagged jerky and I didnt care for it. Very dissapointed in the taste.

I thought this was similar to the Jack Links Peppered Beef Jerky, boy was I wrong.  This stuff is like eating pure SALT.  Nasty as hell.  One package serving is 57% of your recommended daily intake of Sodium.  This is one of the highest content of sodium I've found in Beef Jerky.  I don't recommend this unless you really really like SALT.
This Customer is quick about sending out their product, this is the 2nd order of jerky I have received and will be ordering again in the near future.  Thanks

This tea is easily one of the best in Davidson's line. An intoxicating blend of rich cherry and scrumptious almond, this tea also has the honey note that makes it sweet at brewing. The scent alone is enough to make anyone smile, but the taste is perfection at any temperature. I've tried it from very hot to using it in iced tea and I am delighted with the results every time.

Highly recommended!

I've been GF for two years, and have tried several different brands of mixes, flours, and prepared foods. Nothing has even come close to how amazingly delicious these are. I added cinnamon and cardamom, and vanilla extract, but they would taste just as good plain. My daughter really missed having sand tarts, as they are her favorite cookie. She was in absolute heaven at her first hesistant nibble...she's a very picky eater, but she loves these.

On the Bob's Red Mill site, they have recipes for variations such as snickerdoodles, and directions for how to use this mix as the basis for a cookie "cake".

I highly suggest trying these, but be aware that they are meltaway soft, so they won't ship well. Be sure to follow the directions on the bag. I thought the dough was too crumbly and was about to add more butter, until I read the instructions. It is a dry, crumbly dough until you mix it by hand. Also, definitely cool them on a wire rack, otherwise condensation will ruin them.

These can easily pass for a "regular" cookie...no one will guess they are GF!

Only good thing about these cookies were the lightness and just alittle bit of a sugar taste. Call for a good amount of work in doing these cookies. Not that impressed with the texture of the cookie. Wish it was better in this area.

Our daughter's school always has a gingerbread booth as part of their annual fundraiser and we wanted to offer a gluten free version for the kiddies, like our daughter, who can't have gluten.

I figured this mix would be a great base to start with, as shortbread cookies are crunchy and often cut with a cookie cutter into a special shape. It did work great for gingerbread cookies with just a few modifications on our end.

We followed the instructions exactly except that we used 1 whole egg, a 2nd yolk, and saved the extra egg white if the mix seemed too dry (it will indeed be dry as the instructions say, but if it's so dry that it flakes apart when trying to move it to the cookie sheet, absolutely add more egg white!) We then added an extra tsp of vanilla, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1/2 tsp of nutmeg to alter the flavor to be more like gingerbreads. You can add powdered ginger if you want, however, our daughter prefers this milder "spice" recipe than when we add ginger, so we didn't use any.

There was tons of positive feedback about the GF gingerbread cookies from both Gluten free folks and regular people - the recipe was a great success! We also thought they were incredibly tasty.

Tip: ABSOLUTELY use the parchment paper when making these cookies! put it as a liner on the cookie sheet, also use it to roll out the dough on and also as a layer between the dough and the rolling pin. It made a huge difference! I've also heard that if you refrigerate the dough for an hour before rolling it out that it works better - we didn't try this though.

So! whether you want to make G.F. shaped cookies for Halloween, the winter holidays, or whatever, this is a great mix to adapt!

Happy Gluten Free Baking!
I love this cookie mix.  I add in a handful of pecans and they are like the gluten filled "pecan sandies" that I used to eat.  Easy to make and so good.

Even if you aren't GF, this is an amazing cookie mix!  It is very crumbly when first mixed, but when you work it together with your hands is forms a ball that can be (very carefully) rolled out.  While getting the cookies cut and to the pan may be challenging (from simple bumps causing the uncooked cookie to break), once cooked and cooled (absolutely use a cooling rack), these are a wonderful treat.  Buttery, flaky, mouth watering shortbread.

All I have to say is my husband didn't know that the shortbread cookies I made with this mix were gluten-free. That should say it all!

Bob's Red Mill Gluten Free Shortbread Cookie Mix is awesome. This cookie mix has great taste and very easy to make. Snip the bag, pour into the bowl, add a few other ingredients and they are ready to bake. Although I did cheat and make them as "pan cookies," they turned out great!
